text: Cut to a shot from behind Zuko and Iroh as they walk away. Someone's feet step out in front. Cut to a close-up of Jet staring angrily at the two firebenders.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Look at them, firebenders living right under everyone's nose.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Longshot and Smellerbee walk up to Jet from an alley.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet, you saw a man with a hot cup of tea. It doesn't prove he's a firebender. And what if he is, are we supposed to attack themâ? I thought we were starting over here, changing our ways.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: We are. When I get the evidence I need, I'll report them to the police and let them handle it. [Walks forward a bit and turns his head to face the pair.] Okâay?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Smellerbee and Longshot exchange glances. Cut to a shot of the Middle Ring, where Joo Dee is continuing the tour in the carriage.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: This is the Middle Ring of Ba Sing Se, home to the financial district, shops and restaurants, and the university.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to side-view of carriage. Aang and Sokka looks out of the windows, bored.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Yeah, we met a professor from the Ba Sing Se University. He took us to an ancient underground library where we discovered information about the war that is [Cut to inside carriage. Leaning toward Joo Dee, losing his patience.] absolutely crucial for the Earth King to hear!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Smiling; excitedly.] Isn't history fascinating? Look, here's one of the oldest buildings in the Middle Ring, Town Hall!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The carriage stops and Joo Dee exits. Sokka stares at her, annoyed.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Is that woman deaf? She only seems to hear every other word I say.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: It's called "being handled". Get used to it. [Crosses her arms as everyone else glares sadly at Sokka.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The scene changes to a small tea shop in the Lower Ring, with Jet leaning against the shop's wall. He turns around and peeks inside the window, spotting Zuko and Iroh speaking with the shop's owner. Cut to Jet's view.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Well, you certainly look like official tea servers. [Cut to close-up of Pao.] How do you feelâ?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to Zuko and Iroh wearing aprons. Iroh desperately attempts to tie the string behind his back, but his effort is in vain.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Annoyed.] Ridiculous.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Uh, does this possibly come in a larger size? [Cut to a view behind Iroh with the apron strings not quite long enough to tie.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to side-view of the threesome.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: I have extra string in the back. Have some tea while you wait!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Pao pours some tea in two cups, hands them to his new employees, and heads to the back of the shop. Cut to frontal view of Iroh and Zuko. Iroh takes a sip from his cup, but his face contorts in disgust.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Quickly holds the cup at a distance.] Blech! [Looks at it in disgust.] This tea is nothing more than hot leaf juice!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Iroh closely examines his cup. In an annoyed tone.] Uncle, that's what all tea is.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Angrily.] How could a member of my own family say something so horrible?! We'll have to make some major changes around here.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Iroh angrily takes the tea pot and heads over to the window Jet is spying through. Jet gasps and moves away just in time as Iroh dumps the tea out the window. Jet slowly stalks around the corner of the shop and leaves. The scene changes to the carriage in which Team Avatar is touring in, which is now in the Upper Ring.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The Upper Ring is home to our most important citizens. Your house is not too far from here!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Fade to the carriage passing by another wall with a tall gate. Behind it, the roof of an enormous building can be seen.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up.] What's inside that wall?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a closer view of the tall gate. Three men are standing in the gateway, wearing dark robes and wide brimmed hats turn their eyes toward the group, looking somewhat hateful at them. Cut to inside the carriage.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: And who're the mean-looking guys in robes?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Inside is the Royal Palace. Those men are agents of the Dai Li, the cultural authority of Ba Sing Se. They are the guardians of all our traditions!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view. Bored and annoyed.] Can we see the king now?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view.] Oh no, one doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Overhead view of inside of carriage. Aang nods his head, sadly. Cut to a shot of sky, with Momo flying, and descending and landing on the roof of a small house.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Here we are! Your new home.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to behind the gang looking down at Joo Dee. A messenger comes, gives Joo Dee a scroll, and leaves.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view.] More good news! Your request for an audience with the Earth King is being processed, and should be put through in about month. [Cut to behind the gang looking down at Joo Dee.] Much more quickly than usual!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view of Team Avatar. Surprised.] A month?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view. Smiling widely.] Six to eight weeks, actually. [Closes her eyes and grins.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The scene changes to a brief shot of the house before cutting to the inside.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up side-view.] Isn't it nice? I think you'll really enjoy it here.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Cut to view of entire room from the back.] I think we would enjoy it more if we weren't staying for so long. Can't we see the Earth King any sooner?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view over Sokka's shoulder. Smiling.] The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world! [Close-up on Sokka, as an annoyed expression covers his face.] But he will see you as soon as time permits.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Cut to Momo and Aang. Aang turns to look out the window determined.] If we're going to be here for a month, we should spend our time looking for Appa. [At the sound of Appa's name, Momo wakes up.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of Aang with Joo Dee behind. Bows.] I'd like to escort you anywhere you'd like to go.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Cut to Katara and Toph. Annoyed.] We don't need a babysitter.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to view of room from the back. Toph gets up and walks toward the door.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Oh, I won't get in the way. [She takes a step, blocking Toph's path.] And to leave you alone would make me a bad host! [Close-up of Toph, from behind, with Joo Dee in front.] Where shall we start?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Toph turns around in annoyance. The scene changes to a brief overhead shot of the city before changing to a bowl of food tied to a pole. Momo jumps on the bowl and starts to eat, but is scared by a cat owl, who screeches at him. Cut to a shot of the room, where Team Avatar, accompanied by Joo Dee, is in a pet store and speaking with the owner at the counter.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up shot.] I'm sorry, but I haven't heard anything about a flying bison. I didn't even know there were any.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Cut to shot of Aang and Sokka, Joo Dee lurking behind.] If someone wanted to sell a stolen animal without anyone knowing, where would they goâ?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Slightly frustrated.] Where's the black market? Who runs it? [Pointing at him accusingly.] Come on, you know!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up shot. Nervous and perspiring.] Uh ... [Looks at Joo Dee, who is standing behind Sokka and Aang, shaking her head.] That would be illegal. You'll have to leave now; your lemur is harassing my sparrowkeets.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a shot of Momo eating the birds' food while defending himself from the sparrowkeets. The scene fades to an overhead shot of Ba Sing Se University, and cuts to Team Avatar standing in front of a student. A few students are walking around.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Hmm ... I've never seen any sandbenders or nomads around here. [Frontal shot.] You should ask Professor Zei, he teaches the class on desert cultures.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Annoyed.] Right. And which of your professors could we ask about the war with the Fire Nation?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Nervously.] Uh ...

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The student looks at Joo Dee, behind Sokka, who shakes her head at him. Sokka notices this from the corner of his eye, but she quickly stops before he can see it fully.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up shot. Still very nervous.] I don't know. I'm not a political science student ... I've got to get to class.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: He stands up and goes away, but trips, dropping his scrolls. He quickly picks them back up, and hurries to go. Joo Dee waves at him, smiling.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Well, I'm sorry no one has seen your bison. Why don't you go get some restâ? [Smiling.] Someone will be over with dinner, later.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: As the carriage drives off, Sokka, followed by the rest of the gang, notices a man in the house across from them peeking through a window at them. Close-up shot of the man's door as his head recedes back. Cut back to the gang from behind.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [He gestures to the rest of Team Avatar to follow him.] Hey, come with me.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Everyone follows Sokka across the street. Cut to a shot of Sokka knocking on the front door. The same man appears and opens the door, smiling at them.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You're the Avatar! [Side-view of gang.] I heard you were in town. [Overhead view.] I'm Pong.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of gang. Smiles.] Nice to meet you, Pong.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: So, Pong, what's goin' on with this city? Why is everyone here so scared here to talk about the war?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. Shifts his eyes to the sides.] War? Scared? What do you mean?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. Slightly annoyed.] I can feel you shaking.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] Look, I'm just a minor government official. [Looks to the sides to confirm that no one is present except them.] I've waited three years to get this house. I don't want go get into trouble.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Tight side-view of the gang and Pong.] Get in trouble with who?!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Puts his finger on his mouth, and whispers.] Shh, listen, you can't mention the War here. [Overhead view.] And whatever you do, stay away from the Dai Li.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: As he closes the door, everyone looks at each other's faces in confusion. Fade to a shot of some apartments. Jet spies on Zuko and Iroh, from a balcony in the shadows, hiding behind a clothesline in the apartment across theirs.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Would you like a pot of tea?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up of Jet.] We've been working in a tea shop all day! [View from the outside in to the window where Zuko lays on a bed.] I'm sick of tea!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Pan across to Iroh through another window.] "Sick of tea?" That's like being sick of breathing! [He rummages through the cupboard beneath the counter, where he is standing. Close-up view of kettle.] Have you seen the spark rocks to heat up the water?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view. Whispering to himself.] They're not there. [Opens his fist to show some emerald colored rocks. Close-up side-view.] You'll have to firebend, old man. [He sees Iroh going inside, and narrows his eyes.] Where're you going?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [View through window. Coming back to the counter.] I borrowed our neighbors'. Such kind people.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Close-up of kettle. He strikes the rocks near a pile of twigs below the teapot, and creates a flame. Jet, frustrated, ducks behind the clothesline and leaves.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: I got it! I know how we're going to see the Earth King!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] How are we supposed to do that? [Mimicking Joo Dee.] "One doesn't just pop in on the Earth King!"

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of her and Aang. Reading from the papers.] The king is having a party at the palace tonight for his pet bear.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You mean, platypus bear?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: No, it just says 'bear'.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view. He is lying upside down.] Certainly you mean his pet skunk bear.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] Or his armadillo bear.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] Gopher bear?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of room.] Just ... bear.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: This place ... is weird.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Growing excited again.] The palace will be packed. We can sneak in with the crowd!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Lies down.] Won't work.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. Slightly confused.] Why not?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Over Katara's shoulder view.] Well, no offense to you simple country folk, but a real society crowd will spot you a mile away. You've got no manners! [Takes a pastry from a bowl and eats it.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] Excuse me? I've got no manners?! You're not exactly "lady fancy fingers!"

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Burps. Over Katara's shoulder view.] I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it. [Throws the half eaten pastry to the side.] You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late. [She picks her nose and flicks the snot off her finger.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of room. Excitedly.] Aha, but you learned it! You could teach us!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Yeah, I'm mastering every element. How hard could manners beâ?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang grabs a nearby curtain and puts it around himself like a noble's robe, and talks in a very sophisticated manner.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Good evening, Mr. Sokka Water Tribe, Ms. Katara Water Tribe, Lord Momo of the Momo Dynasty. Your Momo-ness. [Frontal view of Momo as he peeks at Aang from under the carpet and slightly bows.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Stands up also wearing a curtain like a robe. Mimicking a typical high class person.] Avatar Aang, how do you do? Go on.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang bows to Sokka, and Sokka, trying to outdo Aang's bow, bows back. Aang tries to further out do Sokka's bow with a deeper bow and Sokka returns this bow with an even deeper bow. Both of them try to bow at the same time, but they knock each other's foreheads' together and fall down.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Katara might be able to pull it off, but you two would be lucky to pass as busboys!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to Sokka and Aang, who are still on the ground with curtains still on top of them.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: But I feel so fancy! [Toph's snot falls on Sokka's forehead.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The scene changes to a shot of house, at dusk, and changes to inside the house, where Sokka and Aang are playing a game. Close-up of their hands.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Closing his hands into a fist.] Earth!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Wriggling his hands.] Fire!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Sokka grumbles at losing the game, while Aang raises his hands, triumphantly, and flicks Sokka's forehead while grinning. Katara and Toph enter the room from a door, wearing makeup, exquisite Earth Kingdom dresses, and holding a fan each. Toph and Katara stare at the boys calmly before giving in to a fit of giggles. Aang blushes and stares dreamily at the sight of Katara.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Stunned.] Wow, you look beautiful.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Sokka flicks Aang's forehead. Katara opens her mouth to reply to Aang's compliment, but is stopped by Toph placing her fans in front of her mouth.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Don't talk to the commoners, Katara. First rule of society.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a view of the room as Aang and Sokka watch the two girls leave.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [To Sokka and Aang.] We'll get in the party, and then find a way to let you in through the side gate.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The sound of a gong is heard as Momo walks past them, wearing one of the curtains as a cape. Aang looks at Sokka, who merely shrugs.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet, we need to talk.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Whatâ? Oh great, it's you guys. Where have you beenâ? [Overhead view of alley.] I could use some help with surveillance here!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: We've been talking, [Cut to side-view of the threesome, tea shop in background.] and we think you're becoming obsessed with this. It's not healthy.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up shot.] Oh, really? You both think this?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Frontal view of Longshot and Smellerbee. Longshot places his arm on Smellerbee's shoulder in agreement with her statement.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: We came here to make a fresh start. But you won't let this go. Even though there is no real proof!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Well, maybe if you'd help me!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of threesome.] Jet, you gotta stop this.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Maybe you've forgotten why we need to start over. [View of Longshot and Smellerbee from behind Jet. Longshot and Smellerbee look down, guiltily.] Maybe you've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homelessâ. How they wiped out all the people we loved. If you don't want to help me, I'll get the evidence on my own. [He goes toward the tea shop.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to outside of tea shop, before switching to its interior, where Iroh is pouring tea to a customer.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: This is the best tea in the city!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] The secret ingredient is love. [He waves a hand through the steam coming from the teapot and walks toward the back of the shop where the owner is, while Zuko gives him a disgusted look.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view. Turning to Iroh.] I think you're due for a raise.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to the door as it is suddenly slammed open by Jet; he enters.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: I'm tired of waiting! [Pointing an accusing finger at Iroh and Zuko.] These two men are firebenders!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet unsheathes his hook swords and prepares to fight. View from behind Jet. Iroh and Zuko quickly exchange a look, not knowing what to do. Cut to view of Iroh at the back of the tea shop with Jet at the entrance.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: I know they're firebenders, I saw the old man heating his tea!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. Bleakly.] He works in a tea shop.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] He's a firebender! I'm telling you!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. Stands up, along with another man.] Drop your swords, boy. Nice and easy.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. To Zuko.] You'll have to defend yourself. Then everyone will know. Go ahead, show them what you can do.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet slowly walks toward Zuko and Iroh with his swords. Just as one of the customers is about to draw his swords, Zuko steps in front and grabs them instead.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You want a show? I'll give you a show!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Zuko takes the customer's broadswords and enters a fighting stance. He pulls a table in front of him with his foot and kicks it at Jet, who slices the table with his swords and jumps over it. As he lands, he swings both hook swords at the Fire Nation prince, who deflects the attack and jumps backward on to another table, which is sliced in half by Jet, swinging one sword through the middle of the table. Zuko steps onto one half of the table and balances on one foot. Jet continues his attack by cutting the legs on the half of the table Zuko is standing on. Zuko quickly jumps up, and as he lands, he swings both broadswords at Jet's feet, and Jet somersaults away and lands in a crouching position before charging forward at Zuko again. Zuko swings both of his swords at Jet. Just as both weapons clash together, the scene freezes and cuts to the Ba Sing Se Palace. Several high class citizens are lined up and being admitted inside by a guard, who is checking the invitation of one group before letting them pass. Toph and Katara are next in line and approach him.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Invitation please.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Formally.] I think this will do.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Toph shows the official seal of the Beifong family to the guard. The camera cuts to a closer, detailed shot of the seal, before cutting to the guard.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: No entry without an invitation. Step out of line, please.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Irritated.] Look, the Pangs and the Yum Soon Hans are waiting in there for us! I'm going to have to tell them who didn't let me in.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Unyielding.] Step out of line please.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: As the guard points his finger to the side, Katara and Toph move out disappointedly, when Katara notices a carriage, from which Long Feng comes out, and two Dai Li agents bow to him. Katara has an idea, and she, along with Toph, go to the leader of the Dai Li.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view.] Sir, I'm sorry to bother you, but my cousin lost our invitations. [Whispering.] She's blind. [Again, normally.] Do you think you could help us? Our family's inside and I'm sure they're very worried.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up view as he smiles and bows his head.] I am honored, please come with me.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Long Feng walks toward the guard at the entrance with Toph and Katara following him. The guard bows to him and the three of them go into the palace. As they are walking in, Toph and Katara stick their tongues out at the guard while his back is turned. The scene changes to an overhead shot inside the palace. At one end of the table is Bosco the bear eating a steak, his drool dripping of his chin. Seated to either side of him are two guests.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: He's taking all the good stuff!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Quiet! You don't know what I had to do to get seats this near the bear!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Bosco slightly hits the younger guest before pouncing onto the table and eating a large plate of meat in front of him. Cut to a close shot of the bear gorging. As he moves his head, Toph, Katara, and Long Feng walk into the hall.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: It's beautiful, isn't it? [Close-up shot. Turning to the girls.] By the way, I'm Long Feng. I'm a cultural minister to the king.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [View of her and Toph.] I'm Kwa Mai, and this is ... Dum. [Toph frowns and pulls a string hanging from Katara's headdress, causing her pain.] Ow!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up shot.] Now where is your family? I'd love to meet them.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view. Feigning looking around.] Uh ... I don't see them right now, but I'm sure we'll find them soon. [Smiles.] Thanks for all your help.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: As they walk away, Long Feng appears in front of them.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Don't worry, as your escort it would be dishonorable to abandon you ladies without finding your family first. We'll keep looking. [He turns around and leads the two girls, while Katara glances at Toph, nervously.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to outside the palace. Aang peeks around the pedestal of a statue of a lion. Cut to a shot of Aang and Sokka peeking around both sides of the pedestal.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Worried and nervous.] Where are they?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang and Sokka duck behind the pedestal.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Look, I came up with a back-up plan. [He picks Momo up.] We dress Momo like a ghost, okay? [Moves Momo in a circle.] He flies by the guards, creating a distraction. Then, we blast a hole in the wall-

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang stands up and looks over the pedestal, and points to some busboys, as Sokka stands up. Cut to some busboys unloading supplies from a carriage and taking them inside.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Or we could go in as these guys. Toph said we might pass as busboys!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a shot of Aang and Sokka.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Okay ... [Rolls his eyes.] But remember that Momo ghost plan. I think it's a winner. [Smiling, he and Aang sink behind the pedestal.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The scene changes to outside the tea shop, as Zuko bursts out through the door and tumbles onto the street. Jet runs after him and strikes at Zuko with both swords. Zuko defends the strike and both combatants lock swords.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up shot with a sinister grin.] You must be getting tired of using those swords. [Close-up shot of Zuko with a look of annoyance.] Why don't you go ahead and firebend at me?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: View behind the fighters as they move off screen to reveal Zuko at the door to the tea shop.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Please, son, you're confused! You don't know what you're doing!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut back to Jet and Zuko, fighting. Zuko swings at Jet, but Jet stops Zuko's broadsword with the ends of his hook swords, spins around and deflects it to the side. Zuko spins with his swords and tries to counterattack, but Jet hooks the ends of his swords together and begins to swing them at Zuko in large circular motions. Zuko retreats back a few steps to defend himself.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Bet you wish he'd help you out with a little fire blast right now.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: As Jet swings at Zuko's feet, Zuko stabs one of his broadswords through the hilt, pinning it to the ground. Jet looks at it with annoyance before focusing back on Zuko.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You're the one who needs help.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Both the combatants lose a sword, and continue fighting with only one. He turns in a circle and tries to swipe at Zuko, but Zuko quickly advances and swings his sword at Jet. Jet pulls his attack just in time to bend backward and avoid Zuko's blade, cutting the straw sticking out of Jet's mouth in half. The scene replays, but the second time, zooms in on the straw. Jet regains balance, and jumps backward onto the edge of a well.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You see thatâ?! [Aerial view.] The Fire Nation is trying to silence me. [View behind Zuko looking at Jet.] It'll never happen.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet begins to attack again, hooking his sword to the top of the well and sending a flying kick toward Zuko.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [A little worried.] Where are Toph and Katara?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Forget about them! Just keep an eye out for the king. [He grows slightly annoyed as Momo's tail, which has been sticking out of Aang's hat, begins to wag in his face.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Slightly nervous.] I don't know what he looks like.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You know, royal, flowing robe, fancy jewelry. [He grabs Momo's tail, still wagging in his face, and vigorously stuffs it back into Aang's hat.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The camera pans around the room to show the party guests, all fitting Sokka's description. They are all adorned in fancy, flowing robes and headpieces, chatting and eating food.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: That could be anyone!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut back to Aang and Sokka as the camera pans right to show Toph, walking up to the duo.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Trying to speak in a fancy voice.] Another crab puff, please. [Sokka leans in, eyes closed, with his tray to hand her a puff, unaware it's her.]

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Surprised and happy.] You found us!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Back to her normal voice.] I'd know your little footsteps anywhere, Twinkle Toes.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Katara catches up to the group, and Aang blushes when he sees her.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Opening his eyes, realizing who they are. Sarcastically.] Thanks for letting us in!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up of her face.] Sorry, but the guy who escorted us in won't let us out of his sight!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The camera pans out to show all of the party guests, none of which seem to be following them.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Slightly confused, not seeing anyone following them.] What guy?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to an overhead shot of the group. As they look around for Long Feng, Joo Dee approaches the group, and is anxious to see them.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: What are you doing here? You have to leave immediately, or we will be in terrible trouble!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Joo Dee tries to push Sokka, but he blocks her with his tray.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Not until we see the king.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Close-up of her face.] You don't understand. You must go.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Joo Dee shoves Sokka on Aang, causing him to spill the water inside the pitcher he was carrying on a guest.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aarrrh! Oh!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Sorry. No, don't shout.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang uses his hands and foot to airbend a gust at the guest. His hat is blown off, along with Momo. It dries the water on her, but also turns her hair, clothes, and makeup into a mess, leading Aang to smile sheepishly. The guest is briefly shocked, but smiles in amazement.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Amazed.] The Avatar! I didn't know the Avatar would be here.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: All the guests' attention is now focused on Aang. Joo Dee's large, happy smile quickly turns sour and is replaced by a frown and a look of dread. Aang looks around at the guests as Momo hides back under the hat on the floor and slinks away. Aang blushes and waves at the crowd, laughing nervously, as Sokka leans in toward Aang.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Whispers.] You keep their attention while I look for the king.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [View of Aang from above.] Watch this, everybody!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Wide-view of the room. Aang jumps out of his busboy clothes and lands on the long dining table as Sokka walks off into the crowd. Aang swings his arms over the guests' drinks, waterbending the liquid out of the cups. He jumps onto a pitcher and balances on top of it, while continuing to waterbend. Aang brings the liquid above his head and creates a swirling multicolored ball. The crowd cheers and claps as he spins around. Bosco growls with delight at Aang's antics.'

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Drop your weapons.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aerial view. Zuko and Jet step away and face each other. Zuko lowers his sword, as Jet points at Zuko and Iroh.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Arrest them! [Frontal view.] They're firebenders!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Panning view from behind Jet facing Iroh and Zuko.] This poor boy is confused. We're just simple refugees.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Pointing to Jet.] This young man wrecked my tea shop, and assaulted my employees!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: It's true, sir. We saw the whole thing. This crazy kid attacked the finest tea maker in the city.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view. Blushing.] Oh, ho, ho. That's very sweet.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The two Dai Li agents walk up to Jet, who looks at them angrily.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Come with us, son.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet swings his hook sword at the agent, who catches the sword with his rock gloves. The guard disarms Jet, and both guards pull the boy's arms behind his back, binding his wrists together using their rock gloves' stones. Cut to Jet as the guards drag Jet away toward a wagon designed for holding captured criminals.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You don't understand! They're Fire Nation! You have to believe me!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The crowd begins to disperse. Cut to Jet in the wagon, on his knees, as he looks up as the doors are shut. The people left in the street watch the wagon go away. Longshot and Smellerbee look on, hidden within the crowd, and silently walk out of sight.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang! The Earth King!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a shot of Aang, who is entertaining Bosco with waterbending bubbles. Aang notices him and bends an air scooter, whisking down the table.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Greetings, Your Majesty.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Side-view of three guests pulling their food and drinks off the table before Aang can run over them with his air scooter. Cut back to overhead view of the procession of guards and the Earth King. The platform is carried off while a line of guards walk up to the long dining table. Sokka exits the crowd and tries to follow the king, but two Dai Li agents grab him and begin leading him away, pulling his arms behind his back.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Hey, let me go!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a shot of a Dai Li agent stepping out from a pillar in the hall throws his hands out, causing his rock gloves to fly forward. Cut to Katara and Toph. While Katara is looking away, the gloves of the agent grab Toph and pull her backward, covering her mouth to keep her silent. A second later, another pair of gloves grabs Katara and pulls her back the same way as Toph. Cut to a Dai Li guard standing watch. The camera shifts down to show Momo still hiding under the busboy hat and trying to sneak past, his ear and tail sticking out from under. The agent reaches down and pulls the hat off, with Momo looking up, surprised. Shot cuts back to Aang who has reached the other end of the dining table on his air scooter, knocking over several dishes. He dismounts the scooter and holds his arms up in triumph. Long Feng walks up to Aang from behind the line of guards.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Avatar, it is a great honor to meet you. [He bows.] I am Long Feng, Grand Secretariat of Ba Sing Se and head of the Dai Li. I'd like to talk to you. Your friends will be waiting for us in the library.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Long Feng gestures Aang to follow him, as he goes into the library. Aang hesitates for a moment before hopping off the table and following. Cut to a shot of the library's large double doors shutting. The camera zooms out to show Aang and his friends facing Long Feng, who is sitting in front of a hearth that illuminates the area with a green flame.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Why won't you let us talk to the king? We have information that could defeat the Fire Nation!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The Earth King has no time to get involved with political squabbles and the day to day minutia of military activities.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: This could be the most important thing he's ever heard.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The camera shifts behind Aang's party and pans slowly to the right. Long Feng is visibly seated in front of them as the camera passes by each member.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: What's most important to his royal majesty is maintaining the cultural heritage of Ba Sing Se. All his duties relate to issuing decrees on such matters. It's my job to oversee the rest of the city's resources, including the military.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] So the king is just a figurehead.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Angry.] He's your puppet!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] Oh, no, no. His Majesty is an icon, a god to his people. He can't sully his hands with the hourly change of an endless war.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of room.] But we found out about a solar eclipse that will leave the Fire Nation defenseless. You could lead an invasion ...

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Stands up, annoyed. Shot changes briefly to a confused Sokka.] Enough! I don't want to hear your ridiculous plan. [Cut back to Long Feng.] It is the strict policy of Ba Sing Se that the War not be mentioned within the walls. [Scene changes as he talks to the two Dai Li agents dragging Jet into a dark room, making him sit on a stone chair.] Constant news of an escalating war will throw the citizens of Ba Sing Se into a state of panic.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You have to believe me, they're firebenders! They won't stop until they win the War.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Several square stones from their rock gloves circle Jet's head and clamp down on his skull, holding it in place.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Frontal view.] Calm down, you're safe now.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: The agent stands in front of Jet, surrounded by a metal track. From behind him appears a small orange lantern attached to the track. It travels around the track and passes the camera, causing a white flash that cuts back to Long Feng.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Our economy would be ruined, our peaceful way of life â our traditions â would disappear.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: There is another similar white flash and the scene shifts back to the lamp circling the Dai Li agent.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: There's no war in Ba Sing Se.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: What're you talking about? [Camera changes to an aerial view zooming out.] Where do you think all the refugees come from? You can't hide it!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Close-up view of Jet as he watches the lamp continues passing by his face. The screen flashes white and cuts back to Long Feng.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: In silencing talk of conflict, Ba Sing Se remains a peaceful, orderly utopia: the last one on Earth.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang and his friends stare at Long Feng with a mix of shock and horror at this revelation. The screen flashes white again. Cut to a close-up of Jet. A circle of stones covers his mouth, muffling his protests. The lamp passes by his eyes again. Cut to a shot of the Dai Li agent standing within the circular track as the lamp continues revolving.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: There is no war within the walls. Here we are safe. Here, we are free.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Jet's eyes widen and his protests become silent, and the brainwashing begins to affect him. The screen flashes, and cut to Team Avatar.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: You can't keep the truth from all these people. They have to know.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Stepping forward, pointing a finger at Long Feng.] I'll tell them! I'll make sure everyone knows!

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Side-view of room.] Until now, you've been treated as our honored guest. [Cut to side-view of Long Feng and Aang. Long Feng steps forward and bends down to look Aang in the eye. Aang stares back at Long Feng, angrily.] But from now on, you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents. If you mention the War to anyone, you will be expelled from the city. [He turns around and walks over to the hearth with the green fire.] I understand you've been looking for your bison. [View of Long Feng turning slightly to look at Aang.] It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest. [Aang appears frightened, but his expression soon changes to that of anger. Cut to an overhead shot of the room. Long Feng sits down, as Joo Dee opens the doors and walks toward the group.] Now, Joo Dee will show you to your home.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a shot from behind Joo Dee as she faces Aang's party. The group looks at her with surprise.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Come with me, please.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: [Surprised.] What happened to Joo Dee?

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Cut to a shot of Joo Dee's face.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: I'm Joo Dee. [Bows her head.] I'll be your host as long as you're in our wonderful city.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Joo Dee smiles cheerfully at the group in the same artificial way. Fade to credits.

title: City of Walls and Secrets
text: Aang

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene fades to an exterior shot of Team Avatar's house. Shot cuts to a mirror, in front of which, Aang, whose head is covered with shaving cream, shaves his head with his shaving tool. Camera pans left to show Sokka in the mirror to show he has little facial hair, which he cuts off using the end of his machete. He clicks his tongue. Camera pans left again to show Katara in the mirror as she fixes together her hair loopies. Once they are placed, she smiles and the shot cuts back to show the whole room, with them all in front of the mirror. Scene changes to a dark room, where Toph lies on her bed, her blanket sloppily lying over her and her hair in a mess. Light cuts through the darkness as the door opens, and Katara enters the room and gasps at the sight.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Toph! Aren't you gonna get ready for the day?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Toph gets up, causing her messy hair to fly around. She spits on a nearby vessel which spins upon impact. Cut to Katara's face as she looks shocked, before cutting back to Toph as she gets to her feet and brushes a large amount of dust off her sleeping dress.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I'm ready.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: You're not gonna wash up? You've got a little dirt on your ... everywhere, actually.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: You call it dirt, I call it a healthy coating of earth!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Hmm ... [Thinking.] You know what we need? A girl's day out!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Do I have to?!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: It'll be fun!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Cut to the outside of a large building, where Toph and Katara stand near the entrance. Two women in robes walk out and smile at each other.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The Fancy Lady Day Spa? [Sarcastically.] Sounds like my kinda place.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Are you ready for some serious pampering?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Sure, Katara, whatever you say. As long as they don't touch my feet.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The two girls walk inside the building. Cut to inside of the building, where Katara sits smiling, having her feet scrubbed. Shot cuts again to a close-up of Toph's dirt-filled foot as the attendant tries to scrape the massive amounts of dirt off her feet. Shot cuts to a close-up of Toph's angry face.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Well, that wasn't so bad. I'm not usually into that stuff but I actually feel ... girly.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I'm glad. It's about time we did something fun together.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Cut to a shot of the two crossing a bridge over a creek. As they do, they pass three girls going the other direction. Shot cuts to Katara and Toph from behind the girls.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Wow, great make-up.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Thanks.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: For a clown!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The three girls laugh, Toph's smile is replaced by a frown as she and Katara stop walking. Katara puts her arm over Toph's shoulder, attempting to console her.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Don't listen to them, let's just keep walking.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to the face of Star, who is one of the three girls.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I think she looks cute. Like that time we put a sweater on your pet poodle monkey.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Good one, Star.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Angrily.] Let's go, Toph.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Sarcastically.] No, no, that was a good one. Like your poodle monkey. [She laughs.] You know what else is a good one? [She earthbends the bridge, removing a circular part above which the three girls are standing, causing the girls to fall into the creek below. Cut to Katara's face from the hole.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Now that was funny.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Katara waterbends a wave that sweeps the girls as they scream. Cut to a shot of Toph walking away from the bridge as Katara jogs to catch up.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Those girls don't know what they're talking about.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: It's okay. One of the good things about being blind, is I don't have to waste my time worrying about appearance. [Cut to a close-up of Toph's face.] I don't care what I look like. I'm not looking for anyone's approval. I know who I am. [She stops walking, and she cries a bit.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: That's what I really admire about you, Toph. You're so strong, and confident, and self-assured. [Toph sniffs.] And I know it doesn't matter, but ... [Keeps her palm on Toph's shoulder.] You're really pretty.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Turning to Katara, smiling.] I am?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Yeah, you are.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to show both of them walking.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I'd return the compliment, but I've no idea how you look like. [Katara laughs.] Thank you, Katara. [She punches Katara's shoulder, her way of showing affection.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Ow!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to an overhead shot of a marketplace in Ba Sing Se. Cut to a shot of the street, as Iroh goes toward a shop to buy a basket, and examines a basket kept.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: If this is for a romantic picnic, may I suggest this lavender one? [He points to another basket.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: No, it's not a romantic picnic, but it is a special occasion. [He hands a coin to the owner, and takes the basket. As he goes, he sees a vase that contains a moon flower. He slides the vase into the shade, which causes the flowers to bloom instantly.] The moon flower likes partial shade. [He bows to the shop owner and walks away.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to Iroh examining another shop which sells musical instruments. The sound of a crying child catches Iroh's attention and he turns around to see a boy sobbing the middle of the street and his mother trying to console him.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shhh. It's okay. Shhh.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He takes an instrument from the shop, and starts singing, walking toward the boy. Iroh gets down on one knee near the boy as he begins to sing.] Leaves from the vine, falling so slow. Like fragile, tiny shells, drifting in the foam. Little soldier boy, come marching home. Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The boy's frown instantly turns to a smile as he reaches up and pulls Iroh's long beard, causing Iroh to groan while the boy laughs. Iroh smiles and pats his beard. The boy's mother takes her son by the hand and leads him away as Iroh stands and looks at them with a smiling look on his face.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Hey!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and seek to restore honor.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Loud noises are heard and all five of them look up, startled. Shot cuts to show the window as a very large body and head are visible through the hole.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Angrily.] When I'm through with you kids, the window won't be the only thing that's broken.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: But not this time. Run!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Iroh and the kids run away in all directions. Shot cuts to Iroh, running down the marketplace street quickly. He hides in an alley, places the basket down, and the shot changes to a shot of him looking around the corner to see if he is being chased. He is surprised to hear someone talking to him. Shot cuts to behind Iroh, where a man holding a knife is trying to mug him.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: You, give me all your money!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Camera pans down to show Tycho's poor stance.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Confused.] What are you doing?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I'm mugging you!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Confused.] With that stance?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Looks at his stance in a confused manner.] Huh? What're you talking about? Just give me your money, old man!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He shakes his head.] With a poor stance, you are unbalanced, and you can be easily knocked over. [He quickly grabs the arm of the mugger and disarms him, while pushing his attacker and knocking him to the ground. He smiles, while twirling the dagger in his hand, and helps Tycho to his feet.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Hands the knife back to Tycho.] With a solid stance, you are a much more serious threat. [Iroh demonstrates a proper stance, which Tycho attempts to imitate, but is still not assuming the correct form. Iroh walks over to him and holds his head still while he adjusts the man's stance with a light kick.] Much better! But to tell you the truth, you do not look like the criminal type.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I know. I'm ... [He sighs.] I'm just confused.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to a close-up of Tycho's hands holding a cup, while Iroh pours some hot tea for the man.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: So you really think I could be a good masseur?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Of course!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to show the two still in the alley, sitting on the ground sharing some tea and talking.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: This is so great. No one has ever believed in me.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Smiling.] While it is always best to believe in oneself, a little help from others can be a great blessing.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to a shot of a tree on a hill within the city as the sun is setting. Leaves fall from the tree as Iroh approaches it. Iroh places the basket he had purchased earlier down and removes his hat. He rests on his knees and piles some rocks at the tree's base. He removes several things from the basket and places them at the bottom of the tree, near to the pile of stones. He pulls out a sheet of paper and looks at it for a few seconds, closing his eyes, before placing it down as well. Finally he pulls two incense sticks, and lights them with his fingers by firebending. Shot cuts to show that Iroh has made a small memorial for his deceased son, Lu Ten.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Happy birthday, my son. [Cut to his face, as he starts to cry.] If only I could have helped you. [He sings, but his voice cracks due to him crying.] Leaves from the vine, falling so slow. Like fragile, tiny shells, drifting in the foam. Little soldier boy, come marching home. Brave soldier boy, comes marching home.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The camera zooms out, and fades to a message saying, "In honor of Mako," referring to Mako Iwamatsu.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to an overhead shot of Ba Sing Se, as Aang flies on his glider, searching for Appa. Shot cuts to a street, as Aang lands on it, twirling his glider back into a staff. Shot cuts to Aang walking down the street, which is lined on both sides with various cages and pens built into the rock. Aang passes each pen and looks in to see different creatures looking sad and depressed, his expression matching theirs. He stops for a few seconds and looks up into a cage with a group of dragon flies. Shot cuts to him looking down into another pen which is a pit to see an elephant mandrill lying on the ground, very bored. Shot cuts to a tigerdillo gnawing at the bars that keep him in. It looks up as Aang approaches.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Kneeling on one knee and holding his hand out.] Hey there, fellow. You look hungry.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The tigerdillo roars, causing Aang to jump back in surprise. The creature curls up into a ball and rolls in its pen as the zookeeper, Kenji, walks behind Aang, sweeping.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: They are hungry. [Shot cuts to Kenji and Aang walking around in the zoo.] The Dai Li won't give me any money because the kids stopped coming. And the kids won't come because my zoo's nasty and broke.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Looking at a cage.] What kinda animal is that? [They both stop walking.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Oh, that's a rabaroo. I wish I could get her a big open prairie like she likes. [Shot cuts to the depressed rabaroo.] I'd let her hop away to happiness.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Smiling.] Let's do it!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Surprised.] Say again?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: There's a big open space right outside the walls of the city.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: But how're you gonna transport all these wild critters?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Don't worry, I'm great with animals.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to a vessel being broken with a loud crash by some hog monkeys, who are wreaking havoc in one of the shops in the city, throwing pottery and breaking things. The owner comes in swinging a broom in an attempt to save his shop and manages to send one of them flying. Shot cuts to the creatures fleeing the shop and into the street just as an elephant mandrill comes stampeding down it while people run for their lives. Another group of people come running out of an alley covering their heads to escape the dragon flies that fly over them. A platypus bear enters the street and stands on its hind legs, swinging and growling as more people scream and run away. It pursues a group down an alley, as a tigerdillo comes rolling in and runs off in another direction. Cut to a shot of the rabaroo devouring cabbages from a pile. The shot cuts back to show that the creature is eating from the cabbage merchant's cart who is desperately trying to save his cabbages.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: My cabba- [He is interrupted by a rabaroo looking at him with a cabbage in her mouth. She chews it, and returns to the cart to eat more. The merchant throws down the cabbages he holds in his hand, and goes back.] Oh, forget it.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to some dragonflies harassing people on a street, as Aang runs from the rooftops of the houses, descends onto the street, and helps the people using airbending.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He scratches his head.] This was so much easier in my head.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Aang suddenly gets an idea, and snaps his fingers, as he pulls out the bison whistle from his shirt. He throws the whistle into the air, and using airbending, inhales a great amount of air. He catches the whistle, and blows it. Shot cuts to an overhead shot of Ba Sing Se to show a soundwave being emitted from where Aang is and through the city as the whistle's sound spreads. Shot cuts to the hog monkeys wreaking havoc, who hear the sound and run off. The dragonflies, who are harassing people, hear the sound and go to its source. The rabaroo, still devouring cabbages as the cabbage merchant sobs in the background, leaves the cart as she hears the whistle as well.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: But you have to open this gate.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Or what?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He points to a large stampede of creatures following Aang.] Or that!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Cut to a brief shot of the creatures following Aang.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Yelling.] Open the gate!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Both the guards run in opposite directions, as the gate is opened. Shot cuts to show the gates opening from the street, as Aang flies down with the animals, before cutting to an overhead shot of the same. Aang stops blowing the whistle, jumps off his air scooter, on onto his glider, as the animals go out through the gate. The creatures go through the opening as he soars up and over the wall. On the other side, the creatures are shown coming out of the opening and starting to spread out in all directions as they run. Shot cuts to show Aang soaring down behind the running animals and hopping onto his air scooter again. As he rides, he punches the ground causing a large wall of earth to rise as he rides in a large circle creating a pen to block the running animals. Once he finishes, he jumps off his scooter and lands in the center of the pen he made. He earthbends again, causing a square portion of the ground to descend and creates a small pit. He turns around and brings his arms up high to cause some large pillars of earth to rise, making plateaus, turns, and punches outward which makes more walls to separate the animals.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Well, Mr. Zookeeper, how do you like your new facilities?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Excellent job, Avatar. You should think about working with animals for a living.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Aang looks behind him as a guest's voice catches his attention.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Pointing into one of the pens.] Mommy, Miss Snowflake got out of the house again.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Cut to a shot of a hissing cat in one of the pens.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Fluffykins? [Cut to a guest's face.] What are you doing down there?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to show Fluffykins hissing at the elephant mandrill it is sharing the pen with. Cut back to Kenji and Aang.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: On second thought, you should probably stick to saving people.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Aang laughs at Kenji's statement.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to Sokka walking down a candle-lit street at night. Bored, he pulls his boomerang from its sheath, throws it into the sky, and catches it as it comes back. Shot cuts to him walking past a building and into the alley beside it. Sokka passes through some men struggling with their ostrich horses, and by the windows of the building, as he hears voices from inside. Intrigued, he turns and sticks his head inside the window.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: What's this?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The shot cuts to show that the room is the Five-Seven-Five Society's classroom. There is a lady on the stage reciting her haiku to the rest of the ladies.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Through all the long night, winter moon glows with bright love, sleet her silver tears.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Looking pleased.] Ahh, poetry.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Shot cuts to the alley, as the ostrich horse, who is still struggling with his handler, kicks backward and hits Sokka in his back, sending him through the window, and inside the room. The ladies look at him and shriek, startled.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Collecting himself and removing the window frame.] I am so sorry. Something struck me in the rear. I just ... wound up ... here.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The ladies laugh, and clap at Sokka's unintended haiku. Sokka first looks surprised, but grins widely. Their teacher, Macmu-Ling, gets up.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Five, seven, then five, syllables mark a haiku. [She bows her head.] Remarkable oaf.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Thinking for a moment.] They call me Sokka, that is in the Water Tribe. [Counting five syllables on his fingers.] I am not an oaf. [The ladies laugh at his haiku.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Tittering monkey, in the spring he climbs treetops, and thinks himself tall. [She narrows her eyes.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Oooooh!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: You think you're so smart, with your fancy little words, this is not so hard.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Oooooh!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [She walks up to the stage.] Whole seasons are spent, mastering the form, the style, none calls it easy.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Oooooh!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I calls it easy. Like I paddle my canoe, I'll paddle yours too! [Turns around and paddles his behind, as the ladies laugh.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: There's nuts and there's fruits. [She takes a plum from her sleeve, drops it to the ground, and squashes it.] In fall the clinging plum drops, always to be squashed.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Making arm movements.] Squish, squash, sling that slang. I'm always right back at ya, like my ... [He draws his boomerang.] boomerang! [The class laughs.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: An annoyed Macmu-Ling walks off the stage and back to her seat as Sokka turns to the class again and raises his arms up to silence the laughter, as he unsheathes his boomerang.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Making more arm movements.] That's right, I'm Sokka, it's pronounced with an "okka", young ladies, I rocked ya!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: This time, however, his "haiku" is not cheered at, instead being met with silence. Sokka stares at the class, as the annoyed and angry class does the vice versa. Cut to the ladies' angry faces. Cut back to Sokka, as he counts the number of syllables in his "haiku", and realizes that his last line contained six syllables instead of five by counting on his fingers. A large security guard approaches and catches him by the collar.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Bringing Sokka to his face.] Uh, that's one too many syllables there, bub.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Picking up Sokka completely, he throws him head first across the room and out the door. Outside, he hits the ground with a thud and sits up holding his head.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Poetry ...

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to an exterior shot of the Pao Family Tea House. Cut to a shot of the inside where Zuko walks down the shop with a tray of cups, and looks behind at a girl. He walks up behind his uncle who is on a ladder, stacking things on a shelf behind the counter.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Uncle, we have a problem. [Iroh descends from the ladder.] One of the customers is on to us. Don't look now but there is a girl over there at the corner table. [Cut to a shot of a girl sitting in the corner of the shop, drinking tea.] She knows we're Fire Nation. [Iroh looks at the girl, but is quickly pulled back by Zuko.] Didn't I say don't look?!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Cut to a shot of the girl.] You're right, Zuko. I've seen that girl in here quite a lot. Seems to me she has quite a little crush on you.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Bewildered.] What?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [She hands Zuko some coins, which he puts on a table.] Thank you for the tea. What's your name? [Iroh slightly smiles at the question.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Turning back.] My name's Lee. My uncle and I just moved here.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Hi Lee, my name's Jin. Thank you and ... well, I was wondering if you would like to go out sometime. [Zuko is stunned.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Before the stunned Zuko can respond.] He'd love to!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Great. I'll meet you in front of the shop at sundown.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Jin walks away, as Iroh throws his arms on a bewildered Zuko's shoulders, with a large smile as he glares at him. Cut to an exterior shot of the tea shop at evening, as Zuko comes out, his hair combed. He walks out into the middle of the street and looks around as Jin emerges from an alley beside the shop and walks up to him.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Hey. Well, look at you. [She ruffles his hair.] You look so cute.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He stops Jin from ruffling his hair.] It took my uncle ten minutes to do my hair.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Jin grabs Zuko by the arm and drags him as he glances once back at the teashop. Cut to a town square where several people stand around doing various activities. Cut to the Zuko and Jin who are eating at a restaurant, Jin sipping tea while Zuko pokes at his last meatball with his chop sticks, not looking at Jin.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: So, how do you like the city so far?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: It's okay.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Sipping tea; intrigued.] What do you like to do for fun?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Nothing.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Addressing Zuko.] Excuse me, sir. Would you and your girlfriend care for dessertâ?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He yells in an assertive tone, pounding the table.] She is not my girlfriend!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: The restaurant becomes silent as everyone's attention focuses on Zuko. The waiter walks away and Zuko laces his fingers and looks at Jin, who is slurping down a large bite of noodles from a bowl. Zuko stares at the sight in surprise for a moment.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: You have ... quite an appetite for a girl. [He fiddles his thumbs awkwardly.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Uncomfortably.] Umm ... thanks? So, Lee, where were you and your uncle living before you came here?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Umm ... well, we've been traveling around for a long time.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Oh. Why were you traveling so much?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: We were ... uh, part of this traveling circus.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Really? What did you do? Wait, lemme guess. [She thinks for a moment and quickly points at him.] You juggled!

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Zuko folds his arms and looks annoyed.] Yes, I juggled.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I've always wanted to learn how to juggle. [She holds out some objects.] Can you show me something?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Zuko looks awkward and worried, but he takes the objects in his hand, and throws them one by one in the air. He is unable to catch them, and one of the objects falls on his head, breaking into many pieces.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I haven't practiced for a while. [Wipes the pieces of the objects from his hair.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: It's all right. Hey, I want to show you one of my favorite places in the city.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to a street in the city, with Jin leading Zuko.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I'm so excited for you to see the Firelight Fountain. The lamps make the water sparkle and reflect in the pool in the most beautiful way.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: She leads Zuko into an open area with a large fountain and several posts with candles on top surrounding it in a circle. However, the candles are not lit.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I can't believe it! They aren't lit.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Cut to a brief overhead shot of the fountain, before cutting to Zuko and Jin. He looks at her before looking at the fountain.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Close your eyes, and don't peek.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Jin closes and covers her eyes as Zuko walks out, holds his hands together, and closes his eyes as he prepares. A close-up of Zuko's face shows his eyes opening, as he begins firebending. Using his pointer and middle fingers on each hand, he shoots small bursts of flame in all directions at the candles to light them. Once finished, he stands straight and looks at Jin, still with her palms covering her eyes.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Okay, now you can look.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Removes her palms from her eyes.] Oh, wow, [Cut to a shot showing the candles lit. Jin looks at Zuko, amazed. She walks up to him, looking at the candles.] What happened? How did they light? What did you? [She looks at a smiling Zuko.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: They both turn to look at the fountain. As Zuko looks at them, Jin brushes her hand through her hair, smiles at him, and holds his hand. Zuko turns to look at the girl smiling at him. They both turn to be face to face and as Jin begins to lean in for a kiss, Zuko quickly draws a piece of paper which he holds between their lips.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: I've brought you something. [Jin becomes surprised.] It's a coupon for a free cup of tea.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Lee, this is so sweet.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [He takes a few steps back.] Don't thank me â it was my uncle's idea. He thinks you're our most valuable customer.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Your uncle is a good teacher. [She walks close to him and turns his head toward her.] I have something for you too. Now it's your turn to close your eyes.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: As Zuko closes his eyes, Jin goes closer to him and kisses him before pulling back slightly. Zuko returns the kiss, but immediately jumps back away from her. He stands for a second, looking at her before turning his back and beginning to walk away.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: What's wrong?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: [Stops for a moment.] It's complicated. I have to go. [He walks off, leaving a disappointed Jin.]

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Scene changes to the tea house, as Iroh is looking out from the windows at the street, waiting for Zuko. The door opens, as Zuko walks inside, being silent.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: How was your night, Prince Zuko?

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Zuko walks into a room and slams the doors shut behind him without replying to Iroh. Iroh looks after him for a second with a confused look before turning back to the window to continue his work. He turns back when he hears Zuko opening the doors. Shot cuts to show Zuko's face in the crack between the two doors.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: It was nice.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: He closes the doors again. Shot cuts to a smiling Iroh, who resumes his work.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
character: Scene changes to a very tall tree, so tall that it towers above the clouds. Appa flies up through the clouds and over to the tree. Shot cuts to show many fruits hanging from vines on the tree. Appa hovers underneath these and Momo, who was sitting on the sky bison's head, flies up and begins eating some fruit and tosses some down to Appa who eats them. As Momo continues to chew on one of the fruits, Appa suddenly roars very loudly.The screen flashes white and shot cuts to Momo asleep on the windowsill of Team Avatar's house. Startled by the thunder that woke him from his dream, Momo leaps up into Sokka's Earth Kingdom bag that is hanging nearby. After some seconds, he pokes his head up and realizes he has some white fur lying on his head. Momo sniffs the fur, and shot cuts to a shot of Appa and Momo flying to indicate this is what Momo is thinking of. Appa roars again, and shot cuts back to Momo, as he chatters and realizes to whom the fur belongs.
text: Cut to a shot of the house form the lawn, with Momo visible through the window. A shadow that is very similar to Appa's crosses the ground. Cut back to Momo as he wraps the bunch of fur around one of his front legs, and soars out the window of the house and into the yard to investigate if this shadow belongs to the sky bison. As he emerges from a tree he flew up into, he realizes that the shadow is a cloud's. Disappointed, he holds his arm up and looks at the fur tied to it, but chatters a bit as he notices something. Shot cuts to show that on the other side of a house's roof, is what appears to be the head and horns of Appa. When Momo flies closer, however, he finds out it was only a tree with white leaves and branches sticking out in a way similar to Appa's horns. Momo lands on one of these branches and his ears drop in disappointment.

title: The Tales of Ba Sing Se
text: Aang

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The episode begins with the camera panning up from the sandy desert to the library and Appa. The words "FOUR WEEKS AGO ..." fade on and off the camera. Cut to Toph holding up the sinking library.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: No! Stop sinking!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to Appa growling as sandbenders tie him with ropes. One sandbenders tugs on a rope tied to Appa's head. Appa lifts his head, sending the sandbender flying and tumbling through the sand. Two more sandbenders let go of their ropes and scatter to avoid Appa's tail. Appa becomes more annoyed.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Don't make me put this down! [Lets go of the library and sends a slice of sand at the sandbenders, which misses completely. She grabs the library again.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Put a muzzle on him!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: One sandbender throws a rope around Appa's mouth, but Appa breaks it and makes the sandbender fall down. Another sandbender throws a rope around Appa's horn and Appa's sends the sandbender that tried to put a muzzle on him flying through the air. Appa takes off, but a sandbender throws a rope around Appa's leg and uses sandbending to secure his feet. The other sandbenders follow his lead and they all force Appa to the ground. A sand-sailer sails next to Appa. The sandbenders use their sandbending to drag Appa with three sailers. Cut to Toph, still holding onto the library.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Regretfully.] I'm sorry, Appa. [She sniffles and closes her eyes.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The camera pans to the right to show Appa. Cut next to Appa, who lowers his eyes. Fade to the sun and pan down to the sailers crossing the desert. On one of the sailers, Ghashiun lowers his mask and signals them to stop.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Ransack his saddle. Who knows what treasures are stashed in there!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Two sandbenders run up to Appa, who growls when they approach.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: He's tied up good. He can't hurt you.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The two sandbenders jump onto Appa's saddle, stirring some sand. Appa sneezes, sending the center sailer into a sand dune. Cut to Ghashiun and a sandbender, who talk while, in the background, two sandbenders throw the contents of Appa's saddle in the background onto the ground.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [To Ghashiun.] What's your father gonna do when he finds out we lost a sand-sailer?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Nothing. It's the one we stole from the Hami Tribe. [To the two sandbenders on Appa's saddle.] Did you empty the saddle? [Walks up to Sokka's club among a sleeping pad and parasol.] That's it? Nothing but garbage!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Jumps off Appa with the other sandbender and kicks a box.] Doesn't matter. We'll still make a profit from selling him to those beetle-headed merchants.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The other sandbender picks up the parasol and opens it. Cut to a small camp of merchants which the sandbenders bring Appa to using the two remaining sand-sailers. Three merchants walk around Appa's head to bargain with Ghashiun.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Walks to the side of Appa's head.] How's his temper?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Uh, pretty good. [Appa roars, startling two of the merchants. Ghashiun chuckles.] Most of the time.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: I bet someone will pay a fortune for him in Ba Sing Se.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: All right, you've got a deal.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to Ghashiun with two sandbenders on either side of him. He is handed a box which he opens and closes before walking to the side. A large beetle drags Appa onto the merchants' caged sled. Cut to an overhead view of Aang gliding over the desert.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa! Appa! [Closer shot of Aang, who blows his bison whistle.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
