text: Appa's eyes widen and the camera switches to his point of view as he hears the high-pitched whistle. Aerial view of Appa rocking the sled.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Sailing away with his sandbenders.] He's your problem now! [Laughs.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: What?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa slams his tail against the ground, and starts flying.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: We need the shirshu spit darts!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Pulls a dart out of his robe.] Got 'em! Okay big fella, you're gonna take a nice little snoozle. [Blows three darts at Appa's feet.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa collapses to the ground cut to Aang, who lands his glider.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa! [The camera pans up to the empty desert. Aang's eyes start watering and he closes them.] No. [Opens his eyes with anger.] No! [Slams his glider against the ground, using airbending to send sand up into the air.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Further shot as the sand forms a giant mushroom cloud. The camera shows the tiny mushroom sand cloud from Appa's point of view from far away. Appa's sighs as two merchants begin to talk.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: We've gotta get rid of this one. He's too much trouble.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Appa's vision starts blacking out.] We could sell it for parts.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Sighs.] I understand [The camera fades from black to show a circus trainer standing outside a cage.] you've had a rather hard time lately. That's too bad. You probably felt you had no choice but to behave outrageously, like a wild animal. [Cut to outside the cage, where the trainer pats Appa on the head.] But don't worry. You won't anymore. [Frontal shot. Darkly.] Because I am going to break you.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The shot changes to show Appa's cage next to other animal cages. Fade to a large circus tent. Inside, the trainer rolls a cart of cabbages and gives one to a platypus bear. He passes Appa, who tries lifting his chained legs and biting off the chains. The trainer gives a cabbage to a lion vulture.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Hungry? [Walks up to Appa.] Don't worry, I'm going to feed you too. [Shows a cabbage to the drooling Appa.] But not yet. [Takes away the cabbage as Appa tries to slurp it up. Walks up to the lion vulture.] First, I'm going to show you how you'll earn it. [Gives the cabbage to the lion vulture and opens the cage.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The lion vulture flies around the room and the trainer uses a fire whip to control it. Appa pays little attention to the man and looks at the cart of cabbages. He uses air suction to bring the cart closer to his cage and sucks up a cabbage. Cut to the lion vulture flying through two hoops and making loops. It grabs the third ring with its beak and throws it at the trainer, who catches it. Appa continues sucking cabbages into his mouth while the trainer's back is turned.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Of course, when you perform, the hoops will be flaming. And if you are careful, you won't get burned. [Appa belches loudly and the circus trainer quickly turns around.] You're about to be sorry. [Firebends a whip and creates a fire in front of Appa's cage, causing Appa to panic.] It's obvious that whoever your previous owner was, he had no idea how to handle you properly.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to the circus tent at night as carnival music plays and people gather round the entrance. Cut to tent flap opening where people walk past outside. A small boy walks past, but walks back when he sees Appa try to suck up a bale of hay in the tent. The boy looks questioningly at Appa, who licks the bar of the cage. The boy looks understandingly at the sky bison and the boy's father walks behind him.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [To the boy.] I'm gonna to go get a bag of sizzle crisps. [Pointing at the ground.] Stay here and [Pointing at Appa.] stay away from that monster. Behave yourself or [The boy flinches slightly.] you'll regret it.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The boy runs into the tent and rolls the bale of hay right up to Appa's cage. Appa licks the boy's face in appreciation and starts munching down the hay. The shot changes to above Appa's head, and the boy runs away once he hears voices.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Walking in front of Appa with the circus master, Shuzumu.] He's a difficult creature, stubborn and willful. I need more time with him. It's too risky right now.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Closer shot of him and the trainer.] Too risky? What are you talking about? [Raises his hands up.] This is the circus, home of fear and danger. [Points at Appa.] I want the wind buffalo to perform tonight.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Turns to Appa.] If you don't behave yourself, you'll regret it. [Firebends a flame in front of Appa, causing the bison to reel back in fear, and walks away.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The boy peers out the tent flap at Appa, reassuringly smiling.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Grabs the boy's shoulder.] Let's go.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Waves at Appa.] See you later, buddy.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa sighs and puts his head on the cage floor. Fade to the circus tent, still at night. Cut to inside, where two women perform by holding three spinning plates in each hand and five men in the background with painted faces form a human pyramid. The two women walk to the sides to reveal two platypus bears balancing on balls. Cut to the applauding crowd. In the front row, the boy from earlier tries to get some sizzle crisps from his father, but the man holds it away from the boy.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Voice-over.] Ladies and gentlemen, now for something truly special. [Frontal shot. Creates two flames with his hands.] A noble beast, so magnificent and rare, it hasn't been seen by human eyes in generations. I give you ... the wind buffalo!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Shuzumu gestures toward a curtain which drops to show Appa dressed in a costume complete with make-up. The audience laughs at the creature, while the boy looks at it with concern. Appa walks onto the center ring.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Up. [Appa shakes his head and turns around in a circle. The audience laughs.] Up, you insolent cow! [Summons a firebending whip and snaps it at Appa.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Stands up.] Run away! Get away from him! [His father makes him sit back down.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa flies up into the air, swirling. The crowd gasps and starts clapping.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Fabulous!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa flies through a fiery ring and stands on a platform with one leg. Cut to the boy, who looks concerned. Appa flies through a second ring and his costume catches on fire. Appa knocks down the next ring with his tail. The ring hits the trainer on the head and knocks him down. Appa lands and looks at the laughing crowd. He focuses on the young boy and sees Aang laughing in a flashback. Appa shakes his head, and his costume hair falls off.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Go, you can do it.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa takes off, but a blast of fire stops him.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Get back here, you stupid beast! [Creates a fire whip.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa knocks the man up into the air with his tail. Cut to outside the circus tent, where the trainer flies out. Appa flies out of the tent through the ceiling, leaving his costume behind. The boy looks up at Appa flying away and smiles. Appa flies over the desert and sees a large crater. Cut to Appa's flashback of the library which had been there before. Cut back as Appa lands in the center of the pit and looks around. He tries digging with his chained feet, but gives up and falls asleep.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Choose well. A sky bison is a companion for life.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Further shot of the sky bison family landing and Iio throws the mother an apple. Shot of Appa and the camera pans to the younger Aang, who offers the apple. Appa sniffs the apple and Aang gives it to him. Aang hugs Appa, who returns the affectionate gesture by knocking Aang down to the ground and licking his face.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: I guess this means we'll always be together. [Laughs as Appa continues licking his face.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to Aang, who is dreaming while camping at the Serpent's Pass. He laughs and holds his arms out in the same manner as seen in Appa's dream.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Always.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Camera pans to the side and fades to Appa waking up.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Wielding a pitchfork.] Ahhh! It's some kind of monster!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa stands up and the farmer backs away. The farmer's wife enters the barn and holds up a torch. Appa backs away from the flame, standing on his forelegs. The farmer and his wife run away screaming. Appa breaks a hole in the ceiling to escape. Cut to the farmer and wife as they watch the sky bison fly away. Cut to Appa flying over the Serpent's Pass. Cut to a ship and cut to a shot of Iroh looking overboard. Iroh gasps when he sees Appa fly overhead.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Sitting up on the deck floor.] Uncle? What are you looking at? Is there something out there?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Nervously.] Uh, it's nothing. Go back to sleep. [Zuko lies back down and Iroh sighs.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to a forest. Appa flies down and crash lands in front of a tree growing over a passage. He bites some grass and stands up when he hears squealing from the passage. Cut to in front of the passage where a boar-q-pine runs out of the shadows and toward the camera. Appa roars at the boar-q-pine, which tackles him and they fall down a cliff. They stop rolling when they reach a clearing, Appa's fur being prickled with some of the boar-q-pine's quills.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Must have been some fight.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Wait, let me see that. [The Kyoshi Warrior hands the clump of fur to her.] No, it couldn't be. [The camera pans up to show Appa's trail of fur on the cliff. Suki follows the trail and gasps when she reaches the top.] Appa? Oh, no. [Close-up of Appa, who backs away into the passage in fear as Suki walks up. She stops and kneels down, putting several berries and an apple on the ground.] It's gonna be okay, Appa. [Stands up and back away.] I have to leave, but I'm gonna be back soon with help.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Suki walks down the cliff. Appa walks up the fruit and looks at it. Cut to a later time where Appa rests in the passage. The camera pans down to Suki leading five Kyoshi Warriors up the side of the cliff.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: No sudden movements. He's been lost for a while and he looks like he's hurt. [Closer shot of the Kyoshi Warriors.] He's shy around people and scared. Stay low and stay quiet.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: I can't believe you found the Avatar's bison. Didn't you just see the Avatar a few days ago?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Yes, so he can't be too far from here. [Walking up the hill.] It's our responsibility to get Appa back to him safely. This could be our most important mission yet. [The Kyoshi Warriors peer over the top of the hill at Appa, who growls and shakes his head at the intruders.] Give him some space! [The other Kyoshi Warriors take a step back. Suki takes a step forward.] Appa, it's me, Suki. I'm a friend. [Appa growls and Suki slowly approaches Appa.] I want to help you. You're hurt. We can help you feel better. [Appa growls in response.] And we can help you find Aang. [Appa softly growls and Suki places her hands Appa's nose and Appa lies down with Suki kneeling in front.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to Appa's shackles and boar-q-pine quills on the ground and pan to Appa surrounded by the Kyoshi Warriors. Appa licks one of the warrior's faces. Close-up of Appa's ear as he hears footsteps thundering. Lightning strikes a nearby tree, causing it to fall down and blocking the pathway. Mai, Azula, and Ty Lee arrive on mongoose lizards.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Holding a clump of Appa's fur.] My, my, you're easy to find. It's really astounding my brother hasn't captured you yet.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The camera pans down to show the Kyoshi Warriors standing in front of Appa. Appa growls at Azula and the Kyoshi Warriors draw their shield fans.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: What do you want with us?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Who are you? The Avatar's fan girls?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Beat.] Oh, I get it. Good one, Azula.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: If you're looking for the Avatar, you're out of luck.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Aerial view; Mai sighs.] I knew this was a waste of time.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: No Avatar, huh. Well, that's okay. Any friend of the Avatar [Jumps off the mongoose lizard.] is an enemy of mine! [Firebends at Appa, who the Kyoshi Warriors protect by moving their shields together.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Azula firebends at Appa. The Kyoshi Warriors protect him by moving their shield fans together. Ty Lee and Mai jump off their mongoose lizards. Mai faces two Kyoshi Warriors and throws three shurikens, pinning a Kyoshi Warrior to a tree.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Huh? [Looks at the weapons on her right arm in confusion.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: You're so colorful, it's making me nauseous. [Throws a bunch of darts at the second Kyoshi Warrior.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The Kyoshi Warrior unsheathes her sword and uses it to deflect the darts. She swings at Ty Lee, who manages to get behind the Kyoshi Warrior and perform chi blocking.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: You're not prettier than we are.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Cut to a side-view from the woods. Suki defends Appa from Azula's firebending blasts with her fan shield. Closer shot of Azula summoning blue fire. Shot changes to Appa and Suki. Suki takes the blast and deflects it to the side where it sets the fallen tree behind them on fire. Appa looks frightened at the flames.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Afraid of fire, I see. That's good. You should be.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Unsheathes her sword.] Go, Appa! Fly away from here!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa flies up and Suki charges Azula with her sword. Slow motion shot of Azula jumping up and knocks the sword out of her hand and into a tree. Azula fires another blast at Suki, who blocks it with her shield. Suki tries kicking Azula, but Azula uses the opportunity to knock down Suki. Cut to Appa flying overhead, who looks down and flies back. Cut to Azula, preparing to strike another firebending blast. A Kyoshi Warrior in the background throws her fans at Azula, who ducks and kicks a firebending blast at the other Kyoshi Warrior and pursues her. Suki stands up and waves a torch at Appa.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Get out of here! You have to find Aang! We'll be okay!

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa backs away from Suki and flies away. A blue firebending blast hits Suki's shield. Suki steps back and wields her fan.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Calmly.] Don't you know fans just make flames stronger?

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: They charge at each other, Azula firing another blast and Suki deflecting it. As they clash, the scene action freezes. Cut to Appa flying near the tree tops, which fades to an aerial view of a river, which Appa flies over with a flock of birds. Fade to Appa flying through the rain. Cut to a fleet of Water Tribe ships while Appa flies through the sky in the distance. On one of the ships, Hakoda looks up and watches the sky bison. Frontal shot of Appa flying through the mountains and soon reaches the Eastern Air Temple. Appa walks inside and the scene flashes back and pans up to show the calf Appa and his siblings running through the air temple. Cut to the present where he continues walking and finds a circle of railing. Fade to the past, where Appa and his siblings gnaw at the railings. Fade to the present where Appa gnaws the now dusty railing and coughs. Fade to outside the air temple, where Appa crosses a bridge. Appa reaches a balcony and sees a man meditating and looks over-joyed. Appa runs over to the man knocking him down and licks the man's face.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: [Blinks in confusion.] Hello. I am Guru Pathik. [Aerial shot as Appa flies to the back of the balcony and closer shot as he growls at the guru.] I know I'm not the person you expected. And I didn't expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now. [Side shot of Appa and Pathik on the balcony.] The world is full of surprises.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa growls at the guru. Pathik lies down and closes his eyes. Later, he opens his eyes and looks at Appa, who growls in return. Pathik closes his eyes again and later opens one eye at Appa. Appa snorts in return. Fade to night time, this time Appa asleep and snoring. Pathik stands up and rubs his hands together. He walks over to Appa and places his hand on Appa's upper stomach.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Oh, dear. You've been through so much recently. Hurt and betrayed. So twisted up inside. [Moves his hand.] You're still full of love. Ah. But fear has moved in where trust should be. [The camera shows a further shot of the balcony and pans up to the Air Temple; voice-over.] I've been expecting you and the young Avatar for quite a long time. I had a vision many years ago of helping him. That's why I came to the Eastern Air Temple. [Closer shot of Appa and Pathik.] Oh, your emotions are so turbulent. Like swirling storm clouds. [Puts his hand on Appa's forehead.] Let the clouds in your mind be gentle, peaceful ones. [Appa purrs and the shot fades to black.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa wakes up and looks around hostilely. He notices some fruit right in front of him and gobbles it up and follows a path of fruit. Cut to a raised platform which Appa approaches on top of the platform, Pathik feeds a bird some seeds while another bird perches on his head and two squirrels.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Someone looks very well rested, [Cut to Appa, whose fur on one side of his head is slightly messed up.] judging by your bed head. [Appa growls and shakes away the bed head.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Fade to the moon and pan down to Pathik meditating. Appa paces behind him twice and collapses. Pathik opens his eyes and places his hand on Appa's side. He stands up, holding a scroll.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: I have prepared a message for Aang. May I attach it to your horn? [Appa mutter in agreement and Pathik ties the scroll to Appa's horn. Cut to the leaves falling overhead and pan down to Appa and Pathik.] You and the Avatar's energies are mixed. You have an unbreakable bond. By reading your energy, I can sense where Aang is. [Appa licks him.] Funny, what invisible strings connect us all. [Places his hand on Appa's forehead. Further shot of the Air Temple as a path of light illuminates a pathway.] I'll see you again, great beast. [Closer shot of Pathik and Appa.]

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: The camera fades to white. Cut to Appa flying toward Ba Sing Se at night. He flies over a wall. Another shot of Appa shows two Dai Li agents on the roof who descend once they see Appa. Appa continues flying over the city and his eyes widen when he hears a high-pitched whistle. Shot changes to three pygmy pumas standing on a roof top as Appa descends. Cut to Aang's bison whistle. A further shot shows Aang asleep with his bison whistle and a curled-up Momo at his sides.

title: Appa's Lost Days
text: Appa

title: Lake Laogai
text: The episode opens to Team Avatar's place of stay in Ba Sing Se, where Sokka is drawing inaccurate pictures of Appa for missing posters. Katara and Aang enter.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Cheerfully.] We found a printer to make our posters! [Reveals the poster and Aang smiles and points at it.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Hey, I thought designing the lost Appa poster was my job. I've been working all day on my Appa! [Shows his crudely drawn picture of Appa with a proud smile. Cut to an exasperated Aang while Katara tries to hold back her laughter.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Sokka, the arrow is on Appa's head.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Dismayed.] This is his head. [PointsÂ to the sketch.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Takes the picture from Sokka, looks confused.] Why are feet coming out of it?

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Snatches back the picture indignantly.] Those are his horns. [Hangs his head.] I haven't seen him in a while, okay?

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Mockingly.] It looks just like him to me!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Thank you, I worked really- [Suddenly remembering that she is blind.] Why do you feel the need to do that?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Let's just stick with the professional version.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Sokka angrily rips up his drawing.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Excitedly.] Come on, let's get busy! [Holds up some pamphlets.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Cut to Aang and Momo dropping dozens of posters all over Ba Sing Se. One poster falls in front of the camera, and the scene changes to tea shop where Zuko and Iroh are working. Iroh serves tea to two customers, who enjoy it. They approach him.

title: Lake Laogai
text: So, you're the genius behind this incredible brew. The whole city is buzzing about you! I hope Pao pays you well.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Good tea is its own reward.

title: Lake Laogai
text: But it doesn't have to be the only reward. How would you like to have your own tea shop?

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Frontal view. Pao looks around, concerned.] My own tea shop? This is a dream come true!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Quickly moving to stand between the group.] What's going on here? Are you trying to poach my tea-maker?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Sorry Pao, but that's business for you, am I right?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Mushi, if you stay, I'll make you assistant manager. Wait, senior assistant manager!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'll provide you with a new apartment in the Upper Ring. [Cut to Zuko, who was busy putting empty tea cups on a tray, but now looks up and glances over his shoulder to follow Quon's offer more closely; voice-over.] The tea shop is yours to do whatever you want, [Cut back to frontal shot of Quon.] complete creative freedom.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I even get to name the shop?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Of course!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Uh, senior executive assistant manager?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Iroh hands him the pot of tea and bows to the customer, agreeing to the terms. Zuko walks by, as Pao walks away sadly.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Did you hear, nephew? This man wants to give us our own tea shop in the Upper Ring of the city!

title: Lake Laogai
text: That's right, young man, your life is about to change for the better!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Sarcastically.] I'll try to contain my joy. [Walks outside, slams door shut.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: As he walks outside, he grabs a falling Appa poster. He climbs to the top of a house and notices several of them falling, searching the skies for any sign of the Avatar. He glances down again at the Appa poster. Camera zooms in as he looks up from the poster with a determined look on his face.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I just finished dropping all the leaflets. Has anyone come in with news about Appa?

title: Lake Laogai
text: It's only been a day. Just be patient. [Aang sits, unenthused.]Â

title: Lake Laogai
text: A knock at the door and Aang jumps up and runs to the door.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Wow, you're right! Patience really pays off! [Opens the door, revealing the "original" Joo Dee has returned.] Joo Dee?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Hello, Aang, and Katara, and Sokka, and Toph.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [They approach as Joo Dee enters.] What happened to you? Did the Dai Li throw you in jail?

title: Lake Laogai
text: What? Jail? Of course not. The Dai Li are the protectors of our cultural heritage.

title: Lake Laogai
text: But you disappeared at the Earth King's party.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Oh, I simply took a short vacation to Lake Laogai, out in the country. It was quite relaxing. [Sokka glares at her skeptically.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: But then they replaced you with some other woman who also said her name was Joo Dee.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Surprised.] I'm Joo Dee.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Why are you here?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Dropping fliers and putting up posters isn't permitted within the city. Not without proper clearance.

title: Lake Laogai
text: We can't wait around to get permission for everything.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You are absolutely forbidden by the rules of the city to continue putting up posters.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Angrily yelling; during this brief argument, Aang is shown as a chibi and his head turns scarlet red.] We don't care about the rules and we're not asking permission! [Camera cuts to Joo Dee's horrified face. She slowly backs out of the house as Aang continues to yell at her.] We're finding Appa on our own and you should just stay out of our way! [Slams the door as she exits.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: That might come back to bite us in the blubber.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Calming down.] I don't care! From now on, we do whatever it takes to find Appa!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Yeah, let's break some rules! [Takes out a side of the house with earthbending.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'm very disappointed in your work with the Avatar and his friends, Joo Dee. I had hoped that you would be able to control this situation.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I am so sorry, but they don't trust me anymore. [Starts getting upset.] I don't think I can keep working like this! [Begins to sob.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Joo Dee, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Camera zooms toward her eye as its iris dilates; in a monotone voice.] I am honored to accept his invitation.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Nods.] Good. Now go await further orders. [Joo Dee nods and begins to exit. Long Feng gets up and moves to the fireplace.] If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Should we take care of him?

title: Lake Laogai
text: No. It's much too dangerous for us to confront him directly. Let's see if we can still handle this quietly.

title: Lake Laogai
text: At Iroh and Zuko's place of stay, which is about to change. Zuko enters Iroh's room. Iroh is packing his clothes.

title: Lake Laogai
text: So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Shows Iroh the flyer.] The Avatar is here in Ba Sing Se and he's lost his bison.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Grabs the flyer.] We have a chance for a new life here. [Cut to Zuko looking out a window.] If you start stirring up trouble, we could lose all the good things that are happening for us.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Turns to Iroh.] Good things that are happening for you! Have you ever thought that I want more from life than a nice apartment and a job serving tea?

title: Lake Laogai
text: There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I want my destiny.

title: Lake Laogai
text: What that means is up to you. [Zuko walks away. Continues brainstorming names for his new tea shop.] The Tea Weevil! No, that's stupid.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Cut back to Team Avatar, who are working to put up more posters.

title: Lake Laogai
text: We'll split up to cover more area. Toph, I guess you should just come with me.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Peevishly.] Why? Because you think I can't put up posters on my own?! [Angrily takes the paintbrush of glue from Sokka and throws glue on the wall. She slams a poster on it, but it is backward. Awkward pause.] It's upside-down, isn't it? I'll just go with Sokka.

title: Lake Laogai
text: They all go their separate ways, with Toph following Sokka. Cut to an open square, where Katara is putting up a poster on a stone plinth near a flowing water stream. Suddenly, behind her, she hears a familiar voice call out.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Katara?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet is seen emerging from an alleyway at the edge of the square. Katara wheels around with a startled gasp.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Walks closer. Smiling confidently.] I think I can help you. [Katara's shocked blush transforms into a look of pure outrage. With a sweep of her arms, she bends up water from a lake directly at him while screaming in rage. Jet looks at the wave in fright.] Katara, I've changed!

title: Lake Laogai
text: The wave hits Jet, sending him back quite a distance.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Bending up remaining water from the wave.] Tell it to some other girl, Jet! [Turns the water to ice, which sends Jet back to a wall.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Blocks the ice with his swords.] I don't want to fight you, I'm here to help!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Throws his swords down, and reaches for something behind his back. Katara quickly fires more ice crystals, which pin him to the wall. The rest of the team approaches.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Katara, what is it?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet's back. [Close-up of Jet's face. Cut to aerial view before switching to a closer view of the group.] We can't trust anything Jet says.

title: Lake Laogai
text: But we don't even know why he's here!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I don't care why he's here, whatever the reason is, it can't be good!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'm here to help you find Appa! [Opens his hand and reveals he is holding a missing Appa poster.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Turning from the leaflet back to Katara.] Katara, we have to give him a chance.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I swear, I've changed! I was a troubled person and I let my anger get out of control, but I don't even have the gang now! I've put all that behind me!

title: Lake Laogai
text: You're lying!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Walks up to Jet and feels the wall he is pinned to.] He's not lying.

title: Lake Laogai
text: How can you tell?

title: Lake Laogai
text: I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Katara, we don't have any leads. If Jet says he can take us to Appa, we have to check it out.

title: Lake Laogai
text: All right. [Points and looks angrily at Jet.] But we're not letting you out of our sight.

title: Lake Laogai
text: She stabs her finger at Jet once more for emphasis, eyes narrowed. Cut to Jet entering a dimly lit warehouse, which sits empty except for a few sacks and a pile of canvas and rope.

title: Lake Laogai
text: This is the place I heard about.

title: Lake Laogai
text: There's nothing here.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Preparing to waterbend in defense.] If this is a trapâ

title: Lake Laogai
text: I told you, I work nearby! Two guys were talking about some giant furry creature they had, I figured it must be Appa!

title: Lake Laogai
text: He was here! [She shows them a clump of Appa's fur.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Sadly.] We missed him. [An old white haired man with a push-broom crosses behind the slumping Aang.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: They took that big thing yesterday. [Aang straightens with a shocked look.] Shipped him out to some island. About time, I've been cleaning up fur, and various, uhhh ... leavings all day.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Aang swiftly moves closer to the man.] What island? Where's Appa?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Foreman said some rich royal type on Whaletail Island bought him up. Guess for a zoo or such. Though, could be the meat that'd be good.

title: Lake Laogai
text: We've got to get to Whaletail Island! [Pauses.] Where's Whaletail Island? [Dejectedly.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Looking at map.] Far, very far. [Puts the map on the ground as they all gather round.] Here it is. It's near the South Pole, almost all the way back home.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Aang, it will take us weeks just to get to the tip of the Earth Kingdom. And then we'll need to find a boat to get to the island.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I don't care. We have a chance to find Appa! We have to try!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Must be nice to visit an island. I haven't had a vacation for years.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Don't you have some more hair to clean up?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Shuffle on, I get you. No more need for Old Sweepy ...

title: Lake Laogai
text: You're right Aang, right now our first concern has to be finding Appa. We can come back when we have him.

title: Lake Laogai
text: All right, let's get moving.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'll come with you.

title: Lake Laogai
text: We don't need your help!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Why won't you trust me? [Walks after Sokka and Aang.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Gee, I wonder.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [After Jet walks away.] Was this guy your boyfriend or something?

title: Lake Laogai
text: What ... no! [She folds her arms and looks away defiantly.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Smiles.] I can tell you're lying ... [Katara runs away from her, embarrassed.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Back within the city

title: Lake Laogai
text: We can take the train out to the wall but then we'll have to walk.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Don't worry, on the way back we'll be flying!

title: Lake Laogai
text: We're finally leaving Ba Sing Se. [Spreads her arms outward in celebration.] Worst ... city ... ever!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Smellerbee and Longshot appear in the background and notice Jet.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Surprised.] Jet!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Looks at Jet angrily.] I thought you said you didn't have your "gang" anymore!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Turns to look at Smellerbee, confused.] I don't!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Runs up to Jet and hugs him.] We were so worried. How did you get away from the Dai Li? [Camera quickly zooms in to Katara's shocked face.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Shocked.] The Dai Li?!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I don't know what she's talking about!

title: Lake Laogai
text: He got arrested by the Dai Li a couple of weeks ago. We saw them drag him away!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Why would I be arrested? I've been living peacefully in the city!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Feeling the ground between Jet and Smellerbee.] This doesn't make any sense. They're both telling the truth.

title: Lake Laogai
text: That's impossible.

title: Lake Laogai
text: No it's not! Toph can't tell who's lying because they both think they're telling the truth. Jet's been brainwashed!

title: Lake Laogai
text: That's crazy! It can't be! [Glances to the sides.] Stay away from me!

title: Lake Laogai
text: They all surround him. Cut to the moon in the night sky. Cut to a Dai Li agent walking the streets. Zuko, disguised as the Blue Spirit, runs by.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Out of my way, skinny!

title: Lake Laogai
text: The agent prepares to use his rock glove, but pauses when the disguised man turns into an alley. The agent runs to the alley and sees a figure that appears to be him. He fires his rock gloves at the figure's chest and head, knocking off the stuffed figure's head and knocking it down.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Huh?

title: Lake Laogai
text: There is the whisper of a drawn blade behind him and Zuko, still disguised, captures him and places one of his swords to the agent's neck.

title: Lake Laogai
text: If you don't want to end up like him, you'll do what I say.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Back in an unknown building, Team Avatar, Longshot, and Smellerbee all surrounding a seated Jet.

title: Lake Laogai
text: The Dai Li must have sent Jet to mislead us, and that janitor was part of their plot, too!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I bet they have Appa here in the city. Maybe he's in the same place they took Jet! Where did they take you?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Nowhere! I- I don't know what you're talking about!

title: Lake Laogai
text: We need to find a way to jog his real memories.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Teasingly.] Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Maybe you should kiss him, Sokka!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Hey, just an idea!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Jealously.] A bad one.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Ooh, wait! I've got it!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Sokka plucks a straw from his mattress, pokes it into Jet's mouth in trademark fashion and regards him thoughtfully.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I don't think it's working. [Spits it out.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Try to think of something from your past that triggers your emotions.

title: Lake Laogai
text: The Fire Nation! Remember what they did to your family!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Close your eyes. Picture it.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet closes his eyes, while sweat beads start to form on his forehead. His eyes suddenly snap wide open and he sees images of himself at a younger age watching his town burning down and Mongke looking back at him.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Sweating.] No! It's too painful!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Maybe this will help. [Takes water and puts it around his ears, using healing to clear his mind.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet looks up from the floor and sees an image of Long Feng standing above a lake. Long Feng stares at Jet, and Jet sinks down under the lake into an underground room. He sees an image of a Dai Li agent shining a spinning light in his face.

title: Lake Laogai
text: They took me to a headquarters under the water. Like a lake!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Wait! Remember what Joo Dee said? She said she went on vacation to Lake Laogai!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Stands up.] That's it! Lake Laogai.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Fade to an aerial shot of Lake Laogai. The camera pans down to show Team Avatar, Jet, Longshot, and Smellerbee standing at the edge of the lake.

title: Lake Laogai
text: So where's this secret headquarters?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Under the water, I think.

title: Lake Laogai
text: There's a tunnel right there by the shore.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Toph points to the side and whistles as she walks to the edge of the shore. She uses her earthbending to bring up a slab of rock with an entrance. She moves the rock out the way with the same technique. They all look down at the tunnel and Momo flies away. Cut to them inside the secret headquarters. Jet checks to make sure the coast is clear and they walk down a long hallway.

title: Lake Laogai
text: It's all starting to come back to me!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet walks past a room where a member of the Dai Li brainwashes a group of women.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Simultaneously.] I'm Joo Dee. Welcome to Ba Sing Se.

title: Lake Laogai
text: We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Simultaneously.] We're so lucky to have our walls to create order.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I think there might be a cell big enough to hold Appa up ahead. I think it's through here! [Opens a door.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Cut to Appa chained up as a door opens in his cell and Appa wakes up. Cut to Zuko standing at the door, disguised as the Blue Spirit.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Expecting someone else?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet opens the other door. An overhead shot reveals several Dai Li agents waiting on the ceiling. The door closes suddenly behind them. Lights turn on, revealing the agents.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Now that's something different.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You have made yourselves enemies of the state. Take them into custody.

title: Lake Laogai
text: The Dai Li agents jump off the ceiling and surround them. Two agents fire rock gloves, but Toph breaks them up and sends the two agents flying through the air with rock pillars. Jet runs toward the agents and breaks two other gloves fired by agents with his swords, and trips another. A full battle ensues. Aang deals with a pair of Dai Li agents. Sokka and Katara destroy two Dai Li gloves, but a second pair grabs them.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Knocks away two agents with airbending.] Long Feng is escaping!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet and Aang chase him. They head into another part of the headquarters with many pipes of all sizes sticking out of the walls, with some of them pouring out water, but are sealed in by Long Feng.

title: Lake Laogai
text: All right, Avatar, you've caused me enough problems. This is your last chance ... if you want your bison back.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You do have Appa! Tell me where he is!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Agree to exit the city now, and I'll waive all charges against you and allow you to leave with your lost pet.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Gets in a fighting position.] You're in no position to bargain.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Am I not?

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Gets into a fighting position.] You're definitely not!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet, the Earth King has invited you to Lake Laogai.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Close-up of his eye, his iris dilates. In a monotonous voice.] I am honored to accept his invitation.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet attacks Aang. Cut to Appa growling at the disguised Zuko. Appa tries to strike Zuko, but his chained feet hold him back.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You're mine now.

title: Lake Laogai
text: The door opens and Zuko gets into a fighting stance. Iroh enters.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Uncle?

title: Lake Laogai
text: So, the Blue Spirit. I wonder who could be behind that mask ...

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Sighs and takes off the mask.] What are you doing here?

title: Lake Laogai
text: I was just about to ask you the same thing. What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?

title: Lake Laogai
text: First I have to get it out of here.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Starts yelling.] And then what!? You never think these things through! [Points at him.] This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I would have figured something out!

title: Lake Laogai
text: No! If his friends hadn't found you, you would have frozen to death!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I know my own destiny, Uncle!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Stop it, Uncle! I have to do this!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Zuko screams loudly, throwing down his swords and Blue Spirit mask. Cut to the brainwashed Jet continuing to swing at Aang.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet, it's me, Aang! [Runs back.] You don't have to do this!

title: Lake Laogai
text: I'm afraid he no longer has a choice.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet resumes his attempts at attacking Aang, who dodges them and uses airbending to knock him back. Jet uses his hook swords to stop himself and he pants heavily.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet, I'm your friend! Look inside your heart!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Do your duty, Jet!

title: Lake Laogai
text: He can't make you do this! [Cut to a close-up of Jet's face as he hangs his head, while panting and sweating.] You're a Freedom Fighter!

title: Lake Laogai
text: At these final words, Jet straightens in shock. Everything goes white and he has a rapid flashback of his past as a Freedom Fighter, seeing Longshot, Smellerbee, Pipsqueak and the Duke, and him with Katara. The Freedom Fighters cheer fades to him with Smellerbee and Longshot, before showing him sitting down with Iroh and Zuko. Fade to him giving the passengers food, and quickly to him being dragged away by the Dai Li. Fade more rapidly to Jet's brainwashing, and to Long Feng on Lake Laogai. Cut to his burning village, to Iroh, to him with Zuko, to him with Katara, to him watching his burning village crying. Cut to him in a Fire Nation camp, to him with Katara, and to him being brainwashed. Cut back to him crying while watching his village burn as Mongke watches. The flashback ends and Jet's irises return to normal.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Do it! Do it now!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Jet fires a sword at Long Feng, which misses. Long Feng counters with an uplifted rock which strikes Jet down. Aang runs toward Jet as Long Feng escapes through a pipe in the wall.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Escaping upward to a pipe.] Foolish boy. You've chosen your own demise. [Exits.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Weakly.] I'm sorry ... Aang.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Sadly.] Don't be.

title: Lake Laogai
text: The rest of the group arrives, all struck with sorrow and shock as they gather around Jet. Katara stares open-mouthed at Jet, her hands hovering near her mouth in shock. Snapping out of it, she withdraws water from her water skin, with which she covers her hands, and it begins to glow as she kneels down next to him. Cut to a shot from over her shoulder, with Jet glancing at her while she rubs her hands over his chest in an attempt to heal him. After rubbing his chest three times, the glow fades, the water stains Jet's clothing, and Katara looks back over her shoulder toward the rest of the group.

title: Lake Laogai
text: This isn't good.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You guys go and find Appa. We'll take care of Jet.

title: Lake Laogai
text: We're not going to leave you.

title: Lake Laogai
text: There's no time. Just go. We'll take care of him. He's our leader.

title: Lake Laogai
text: They stare at Longshot in surprise.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Don't worry, Katara. I'll be fine. [Smiles a little.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Katara closes her eyes in painful sadness and opens them again as she rises. Team Avatar begins to exit.

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Whispering to Sokka.] He's lying ...

title: Lake Laogai
text: Appa's gone! Long Feng beat us here.

title: Lake Laogai
text: If we keep moving, maybe we can catch up with them!

title: Lake Laogai
text: They find an exit back to the beach. As they make their escape, several Dai Li agents jump out from behind them.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You think we can outrun them?

title: Lake Laogai
text: I don't think it's gonna matter!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Another group of Dai Li agents, plus Long Feng, stand in front of them. All the agents box them in, lifting up the ground on both sides. Dai Li agents stand on all three walls. Momo flies to Aang.

title: Lake Laogai
text: What is it, Momo?

title: Lake Laogai
text: Momo flies to the sky and chirps excitedly. Suddenly, Appa flies down. Cut to the overjoyed looks on Team Avatar's faces.]

title: Lake Laogai
text: Appa!

title: Lake Laogai
text: Appa smashes through the rock walls, scattering the Dai Li agents. Aang and Toph use earthbending to knock other nearby agents off a cliff and into the lake. Appa confronts Long Feng.

title: Lake Laogai
text: I can handle you by myself.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Long Feng charges at Appa, but Appa grabs his leg and hurtles him skipping into the lake. Appa spits out Long Feng's shoe. The team cheers and they run toward Appa.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Yeah! Appa!

title: Lake Laogai
text: [Happily crying.] I missed you, buddy.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Appa closes his eyes. A teary-eyed Katara somberly looks over Lake Laogai as they fly over it on Appa. Aang places his hand on her shoulder. The team all gathers in a group hug. Zuko and Iroh emerge from the Dai Li headquarters.

title: Lake Laogai
text: You did the right thing, nephew. [Zuko looks at his Blue Spirit mask as Iroh rests a hand on its shoulder.] Leave it behind.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Zuko walks to the edge and tosses the mask into the water, where it slowly sinks to the bottom of the lake. Fade to credits.

title: Lake Laogai
text: Aang

title: The Earth King
text: The episode opens just outside the vast waters of Lake Laogai. Team Avatar has stopped on a tiny islet in the center of the lake. Aang is embracing Appa, happy upon reuniting with him.

title: The Earth King
text: I missed you more than you'll ever know, buddy. [Momo flies into Appa to hug him too. Appa licks Aang, which causes Aang to laugh.]

title: The Earth King
text: Sokka approaches Katara and Toph.

title: The Earth King
text: Look, we escaped from the Dai Li. We got Appa back. I'm telling you, we should go to the Earth King now and tell him our plan. We're on a roll.

title: The Earth King
text: One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.

title: The Earth King
text: We can build on it. If we want to invade the Fire Nation when the eclipse happens, we'll need the Earth King's support.

title: The Earth King
text: What makes you think we'll get it? I don't know if you've noticed, but things don't usually go that smoothly for our little gang.

title: The Earth King
text: I know, but I've got a good feeling about this. This time will be different.

title: The Earth King
text: Sokka, Long Feng is in control of the city. His conspiracy with the Dai Li is too powerful. I think we should just keep flying and leave this horrible place behind us.

title: The Earth King
text: I'm with Sweetness. I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se. [Raises arms and opens eyes wide.] And I can't even see!

title: The Earth King
text: Aang flies into the shot.

title: The Earth King
text: But now that we have Appa back, there's nothing stopping us from telling the Earth King the truth. About the conspiracy and the War.

title: The Earth King
text: See? Aang's with me. [Puts his arm around Aang and smiles.] It's the whole reason we came here in the first place. We have to try.

title: The Earth King
text: [Thinks for a moment.] Well, I guess if the Earth King knew the truth, things could change. [Sokka and Aang smile.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Stands up.] I don't trust the new positive Sokka. [Points at Sokka in an accusing manner.] Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?

title: The Earth King
text: Aang notices a few ships in the lake.

title: The Earth King
text: That's probably the Dai Li searching for us. [To Katara.] So?

title: The Earth King
text: Katara thinks for a moment before looking at Sokka.

title: The Earth King
text: [Determined.] Let's fly!

title: The Earth King
text: They fly toward the Palace, now with no saddle, holding onto Appa's fur for dear life, especially Toph.

title: The Earth King
text: Can we please buy a new saddle? Riding bareback is terrifying! [Buries face in Appa's back.]

title: The Earth King
text: They get closer to the palace.

title: The Earth King
text: There it is! That whole thing is the palace! The Earth King's chamber should be in the center!

title: The Earth King
text: We have to be careful. Long Feng's probably warned the king that we're coming.

title: The Earth King
text: Why would you assume that? If you ask me, I think we're just gonna sail right in and- [A giant rock almost hits them.] Aahh!

title: The Earth King
text: What was that?

title: The Earth King
text: Surface-to-air rocks! [Sees more being launched.] More incoming!

title: The Earth King
text: They dodge a few more rocks. One gets launched right at Aang, but he destroys it with his hand. Another is launched at them head on, but Aang slices it cleanly in two by swinging his staff at the rock to augment his earthbending. He launches himself from Appa to the front of the palace and slams his staff into the ground, generating a massive earthen wave to knock back the palace guards. Appa lands and roars at the captain's ostrich horse, which causes it to drop the captain and run off. As they continue toward the Earth King, more guards appear and launch earth cubes at the gang. Toph and Aang use earthbending to block the attacks, while Katara uses waterbending to subdue the guards.

title: The Earth King
text: [Water whips two guards.] Sorry!

title: The Earth King
text: Katara turns around and strikes down more guards with her waterbending, though closes her right eye in a sympathetic flinch for a moment as she does so. As more guards rush toward them in an attempt to halt Team Avatar's progress, Toph uses her earthbending to flip the tiles of the walkway, trapping them between them and ensuring a clear passage for the team.

title: The Earth King
text: Sorry! We just need to get through to see the Earth King!

title: The Earth King
text: More guards appear on the opposite end of a bridge and launch two giant statues at them. Toph and Aang create an earth igloo to block the statues. Katara creates an ice ramp to jump to the other side of the bridge and water-whips the guards into the water. Aang freezes them in the water as the rest all jump across. More surface-to-air rocks appear as guards are coming down a giant staircase. Toph uses earthbending to change the stairs into a ramp, causing them all to fall. She and Aang use earthbending to escalate themselves up the stairs.

title: The Earth King
text: Seriously, we're actually on your guys' side! [Pauses for a moment.] Sorry.

title: The Earth King
text: More guards come and Aang and Toph push them away with earthbending.

title: The Earth King
text: In there! [They enter the palace.]

title: The Earth King
text: They come to an area with three doors. More guards appear and Toph easily defeats them all.

title: The Earth King
text: Toph, which way to the Earth King?

title: The Earth King
text: How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.

title: The Earth King
text: Toph defeats more guards while Sokka opens the doors to find the Earth King. The first room is empty, as is the second; outside the second door, a royal guard goes flying to the right off-screen. Sokka bursts into a third room, startling a woman.

title: The Earth King
text: Burglar! [Tries to run, trips, and falls flat on her face.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Shuts the door.] Sorry. Wrong door.

title: The Earth King
text: Meanwhile, Zuko and Iroh return from Lake Laogai. The former seems ill.

title: The Earth King
text: You did the right thing. Letting the Avatar's bison go free.

title: The Earth King
text: I don't feel right. [Gets dizzy and passes out.]

title: The Earth King
text: Zuko! [Rushes to him.]

title: The Earth King
text: Back at the palace, the team arrives at a pile of rubble. Sokka climbs atop it and sees a gigantic door.

title: The Earth King
text: Now that's an impressive door. It's gotta go somewhere. [Drops down from the rubble and attempts to kick the door open.] Yaaah! [The door does not move even slightly. Sokka starts trying to push it open, but to no avail. Toph and Aang jump in from behind and bust the door down, knocking Sokka forward in the process. He starts rubbing the back of his head.] A little warning next time?

title: The Earth King
text: They arrive in the Earth King's chamber with Kuei sitting in his throne. Long Feng and his Dai Li agents stand in their way. The team takes fighting stances against them.

title: The Earth King
text: We need to talk to you.

title: The Earth King
text: [Turns to face the Earth King.] They're here to overthrow you.

title: The Earth King
text: No, we're on your side. We're here to help.

title: The Earth King
text: You have to trust us.

title: The Earth King
text: [Stands up with a rising aggravated tone.] You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?

title: The Earth King
text: He has a good point.

title: The Earth King
text: If you are on my side, then drop your weapons and stand down!

title: The Earth King
text: They look at each other for a moment. Aang drops his staff, Katara puts her water whip back in her water skin, Sokka drops his machete, and Toph drops the boulder she is levitating.

title: The Earth King
text: [Smiles.] See? We're friends, Your Earthiness. [Gives a slight nervous chuckle.]

title: The Earth King
text: The king says nothing and just continues to frown grimly. Long Feng signals the Dai Li to cuff their arms with rock gloves.

title: The Earth King
text: [Smiles sinisterly.] Detain the assailants!

title: The Earth King
text: The Dai Li rush behind Team Avatar.

title: The Earth King
text: But we dropped our weapons. We're your allies.

title: The Earth King
text: Make sure the Avatar and his friends never see daylight again. [The king looks at him shocked.]

title: The Earth King
text: The Avatar? [Points at Sokka.] You're the Avatar?

title: The Earth King
text: Uh, no. Him. [Nudges his head at Aang.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Effortlessly breaks free of his earth cuffs and raises his arms.] Over here. [Re-attaches the cuffs.]

title: The Earth King
text: What does it matter, Your Highness? They're enemies of the state.

title: The Earth King
text: Perhaps you're right. [Sees Bosco sniff and lick Aang, who laughs, and smiles at Long Feng.] Though Bosco seems to like him. [Looks back at the team.] I'll hear what he has to say. [Long Feng glares at Aang.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Walks forward.] Well, sir, there's a war going on right now. For the past one hundred years in fact. The Dai Li's kept it secret from you. It's a conspiracy to control the city, and to control you.

title: The Earth King
text: A secret war? That's crazy!

title: The Earth King
text: Completely!

title: The Earth King
text: Long Feng didn't want us to tell you, so he stole our sky bison to blackmail us. And blackmail is the least of his crimes; he brainwashed our friend!

title: The Earth King
text: [Quickly turns to face the king.] All lies. I've never even seen a sky bison, Your Majesty. Frankly, I thought they were extinct.

title: The Earth King
text: [Sits down.] Your claim is difficult to believe. Even from an Avatar.

title: The Earth King
text: [Whispers in his ear.] These hooligans are part of an anarchist cell that my agents have been tracking for weeks. [Kuei looks shocked at what Long Feng is telling him.]Â If you listen to them, you're playing right into your own destruction.

title: The Earth King
text: [Thinks for a moment.] I have to trust my advisor.

title: The Earth King
text: The agents start taking the team away, but Sokka stops for a moment.

title: The Earth King
text: Wait! [Turns to face the king with a big smile.] I can prove he's lying. Long Feng said he's never seen a sky bison. Ask him to lift his robe.

title: The Earth King
text: What? I am not disrobing! [The king looks thoughtful before looking at Sokka suspiciously.]

title: The Earth King
text: Aang and Sokka smile slyly and nod at each other. Aang blows a large gust of air at Long Feng's legs, lifting his robe and revealing a bite mark left by Appa.

title: The Earth King
text: Right there! Appa bit him!

title: The Earth King
text: Never met a sky bison, huh?

title: The Earth King
text: [Lowers his robe.] That happens to be a large birth mark. [Sarcastically.] Thanks for showing everyone.

title: The Earth King
text: Well I suppose there's no way to prove where those marks came from.

title: The Earth King
text: Of course there is!

title: The Earth King
text: The group gets Appa and brings him in. He opens his mouth. Aang points at the bison's teeth and at Long Feng's mark.

title: The Earth King
text: Yup. That pretty much proves it. [Team Avatar cheers.] But it doesn't prove this crazy conspiracy theory. [Team Avatar becomes downcast.] Though, I suppose this matter's worth looking into. [Team Avatar look at each other approvingly, while Long Feng glares at the king before walking away with his agents.]

title: The Earth King
text: Back in Iroh and Zuko's apartment, Zuko is asleep. He wakes up.

title: The Earth King
text: You're burning up. [Dips a cloth in water.] You have an intense fever. [Places the cloth on Zuko's forehead.] This will help cool you down.

title: The Earth King
text: So thirsty. [Sits up, but Iroh makes him lie back down.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Grabs a bucket with a spoon in it; takes out the spoon.] Here's some clean water to drink. [Sits him up slightly.] Stay under the blankets and sweat this out.

title: The Earth King
text: Zuko grabs the spoon from Iroh and drinks the water. He tosses the spoon aside and grabs the bucket. He drinks from it, while spilling some out. He tosses the bucket aside and lies back down. Iroh pulls the covers more over him. Meanwhile, on a train, passengers are shocked to see the Earth King, who is standing in the middle of the cart surrounded by guards.

title: The Earth King
text: [Feeling strange from exposition.] So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.

title: The Earth King
text: So you've never been outside the Upper Ring before?

title: The Earth King
text: I've never been outside the palace. [Katara and Sokka look at each other; the Earth King looks outside and sees Aang flying on Appa.] Now that's the way to travel. [Looks at Katara and Sokka.] So, may I ask where we're going?

title: The Earth King
text: Underneath Lake Laogai, Your Kingliness. To the Dai Li's secret headquarters. You're about to see where all the brainwashing and conspiring took place.

title: The Earth King
text: Cut to the shores of Lake Laogai. The team stand on the shore beside the Earth King and his guards. Toph steps to the edge of the water, and with a hop, reveals the the secret path to the hatch door entrance, though discovers it has been destroyed.

title: The Earth King
text: It's gone!

title: The Earth King
text: Oh don't tell me-Â ! [Gives a thumbs up and a fake smile.] That's okay. Still got my positive attitude.

title: The Earth King
text: The Dai Li must've known we were coming and destroyed the evidence!

title: The Earth King
text: [Looks suspicious.] Hm ... [Sarcastically.] That seems awfully convenient.

title: The Earth King
text: Hey, if anything, this proves the conspiracy exists even more. [Smiles and nods.]

title: The Earth King
text: Long Feng was right. This was a waste of time. [Turns to leave.] If you'll excuse me, I'm going back to the palace.

title: The Earth King
text: [Smiles with realization.] The wall. They'll never be able to cover that up in time.

title: The Earth King
text: Oh, yeah. [Hops to in front of the king.] If you come with us to the Outer Wall, we can prove to you that the secret war is real.

title: The Earth King
text: No Earth King has ever been to the Outer Wall. [Walks past Aang.] I don't have any more time for this nonsense. [Aang looks depressed.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Runs up to them.] If you come with us, this time you can ride on Appa. [The Earth King stops as Appa lows in the background. A pleased smile grows on his face.]

title: The Earth King
text: En route to the Outer Wall. The Earth King is riding on Appa, holding on for dear life and screaming at the top of his lungs in fear, his clothes flapping in the wind.

title: The Earth King
text: First time flying?

title: The Earth King
text: It's both thrilling and terrifying!

title: The Earth King
text: Yeah. [Smiles.] I hate it, too.

title: The Earth King
text: I have to be honest with you: part of me really hopes that what you're telling me about this war isn't true.

title: The Earth King
text: I wish it wasn't.

title: The Earth King
text: Meanwhile at the apartment, Iroh again places the moist cloth over his feverish nephew's forehead. Zuko is having a dream that he is the Fire Lord, with no scar on his eye. One red and one blue dragon appear and start circling around the pillars on each side of him. The blue dragon starts circling around Zuko.

title: The Earth King
text: [In Azula's voice.] It's getting late. Are you planning to retire soon, my lord?

title: The Earth King
text: I'm not tired.

title: The Earth King
text: [Into Zuko's ear.] Relax, Fire Lord Zuko. Just let go. Give in to it. Shut your eyes for a while.

title: The Earth King
text: Zuko slowly starts to shut his eyes but widely opens them upon hearing the other dragon.

title: The Earth King
text: [In Iroh's voice.] No, Fire Lord Zuko! Do not listen to the blue dragon. You should get out of here right now. Go! Before it's too late! [Both dragons are poised to either side of Zuko.]

title: The Earth King
text: Sleep now, Fire Lord Zuko.

title: The Earth King
text: The dragons disappear, and the room they're in, as well as the guards watching Zuko, crumble to nothing. The blue dragon reappears in front of him. Two golden eyes appear, followed by the face of the blue dragon, which closes rapidly.

title: The Earth King
text: Sleep. [Voice grows louder and more hostile as it continues talking.]Â Just like mother!

title: The Earth King
text: Charges at Zuko and opens its mouth. Inside the dragon's mouth, Zuko sees his mother, Ursa. Within that darkness, the camera draws closer to Ursa, who drops her hood.

title: The Earth King
text: Zuko! Help me! [A distraught Zuko is seen in her eyes.]

title: The Earth King
text: Zuko disappears through the floor. The sleeping Zuko starts sweating. Meanwhile, Team Avatar arrives at the Outer Wall and sees the drill.

title: The Earth King
text: [Points at the drill.] It's still there!

title: The Earth King
text: [Shocked.] What is that?

title: The Earth King
text: It's a drill. A giant drill [Cut to the drill.] made by the Fire Nation to break through your walls. [Cut to a close-up of the king who looks horrified.]

title: The Earth King
text: On top of the wall, they're looking down at the drill.

title: The Earth King
text: I can't believe I never knew. [He looks to his right as he hears something.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Appears on an earth elevator with two Dai Li agents.] I can explain this, Your Majesty. [Walks toward the king.] This is nothing more than ... a construction project. [Gestures his hand to the drill.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Sarcastically.] Really? Then perhaps you could explain why there's a [Points to the drill as Kuei follows to where she is pointing. Cut to the Fire Nation insignia clearly shown on the drill.] Fire Nation insignia on your "construction project".

title: The Earth King
text: [The king looks at him suspiciously.] Well it's imported of course. You know you can't trust domestic machinery. [Looks at them worried.] Surely you don't believe these children instead of your most loyal attendant?

title: The Earth King
text: [Looks at Team Avatar, who stare back innocently, then at Long Feng, who is glaring back.] Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.

title: The Earth King
text: Long Feng and Team Avatar look shocked. The two agents behind Long Feng share glances, launch shackles onto his arms and pull him in.

title: The Earth King
text: You can't arrest me! You all need me more than you know! [He is taken away.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Happily.] Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one. [Aang smiles at him andÂ Katara gives him an unimpressed look.]

title: The Earth King
text: That night at the Palace, the Earth King is talking with Team Avatar.

title: The Earth King
text: I want to thank you, young heroes, for opening my eyes. All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool. [Buries his face in one of his hands.] We're at war. With the Fire Nation.

title: The Earth King
text: That's why we came to Ba Sing Se, Your Highness: because we think you can help us end the war.

title: The Earth King
text: [Momo climbs up Kuei's arm.] We don't have much time. There's a comet coming this summer. Its energy will give the firebenders unbelievable strength. They'll be unstoppable.

title: The Earth King
text: But there is hope. Before the comet comes, we have a window of opportunity: A solar eclipse is coming. The sun will be completely blocked out by the moon, and the firebenders will be helpless.

title: The Earth King
text: What are you suggesting, Sokka?

title: The Earth King
text: That's the day we need to invade the Fire Nation. [Cut to a close-up of the king. Cut back to Sokka.] The Day of Black Sun.

title: The Earth King
text: I don't know. That would require moving troops out of Ba Sing Se. We'd be completely vulnerable.

title: The Earth King
text: You're already vulnerable. The Fire Nation won't stop until Ba Sing Se falls. You can either sit back and wait for that to happen, or take the offensive and give yourself a fighting chance.

title: The Earth King
text: [Thinks for a moment as everyone waits anxiously.] Very well. You have my support.

title: The Earth King
text: Team Avatar celebrates. Someone else arrives.

title: The Earth King
text: Your Majesty. [Walks up to Team Avatar and bows to the king.] I apologize for the interruption.

title: The Earth King
text: [To Team Avatar.] This is General How. He's the leader of the Council of Five, my highest ranking generals.

title: The Earth King
text: We searched Long Feng's office. I think we found something that will interest everybody. [Team Avatar look at each other.]

title: The Earth King
text: In Long Feng's office, a soldier is carrying a box of papers to the desk.

title: The Earth King
text: There are secret files on everyone in Ba Sing Se. Including you kids.

title: The Earth King
text: Secret files?

title: The Earth King
text: [Takes out a scroll and reads the side.] "Toph Beifong." [Hands the scroll to General How, who hands it to Toph, who hands it to Katara.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] It's a letter from your mom. Your mom's here in the city. And she wants to see you. [Toph's eyes widen with shock.]

title: The Earth King
text: Long Feng intercepted our letters from home? [Shakes her head.] That's just sad.

title: The Earth King
text: [Takes out another scroll and hands it to Aang.] Aang?

title: The Earth King
text: This scroll was attached to the horn of your bison when the Dai Li captured it.

title: The Earth King
text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] It's from the Eastern Air Temple.

title: The Earth King
text: Is there a letter for me and Sokka by any chance?

title: The Earth King
text: [Looks in the box.] I'm afraid not.

title: The Earth King
text: [He and Katara become downcast.] Oh.

title: The Earth King
text: But there is an intelligence report that might interest you. [Hands a scroll to Katara.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Opens the scroll and reads it.] "A small fleet of Water Tribe ships."

title: The Earth King
text: [Shocked. Appears on Katara's side.] What? That could be Dad!

title: The Earth King
text: [Reads the report with excitement.] "Protecting the mouth of Chameleon Bay. [Her and Sokka's eyes widen.] Led by Hakoda." [Katara and Sokka turn to each other in excitement.] It is Dad!

title: The Earth King
text: Meanwhile at the apartment, Iroh is pouring tea.

title: The Earth King
text: You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea. [Feeds Zuko the tea.]

title: The Earth King
text: What's happening?

title: The Earth King
text: Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body. [Feeds Zuko more tea.]

title: The Earth King
text: What's that mean? [Coughs continuously and lies down.]

title: The Earth King
text: You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it, [Takes a cloth and wipes Zuko's head.] you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.

title: The Earth King
text: Back in Long Feng's office.

title: The Earth King
text: I can't believe it. There's a man living at the Eastern Air Temple. He says he's a guru.

title: The Earth King
text: What's a guru? Some kind of poisonous blow fish?

title: The Earth King
text: No, a spiritual expert. He wants to help me take the next step in the Avatar journey. He says he can teach me to control the Avatar State.

title: The Earth King
text: And I can't believe we know where our dad is now.

title: The Earth King
text: I know what you mean. My mom's in the city. And from her letter it sounds like she finally understands me.

title: The Earth King
text: This is all such big news! Where do we even start?

title: The Earth King
text: I hate to say it, but we have to split up.

title: The Earth King
text: [Worriedly.] Split up? We just found Appa and got the family back together! Now you want us to separate?

title: The Earth King
text: You have to meet this guru, Aang. If we're going to invade the Fire Nation, you need to be ready.

title: The Earth King
text: Well, if I'm going to the Eastern Air Temple, Appa and I can drop you off at Chameleon Bay to see your dad.

title: The Earth King
text: Someone has to stay here with the Earth King and help him plan for the invasion. [Stands up.] I guess that's me.

title: The Earth King
text: No, Sokka. I know how badly you wanna help Dad. You go to Chameleon Bay. I'll stay here with the king.

title: The Earth King
text: [Overjoyed with tears welling in his eyes. Stands up and dances happily.] You are the nicest ... sister ... ever! [Throws his arms around Katara and kisses her on the cheek.]

title: The Earth King
text: Easy there, big brother ... [Gives a slight chuckle.] Though you're right. I am.

title: The Earth King
text: Outside the Palace, Team Avatar is preparing to leave. The king walks down to them. Katara is petting Appa. Aang turns to face her.

title: The Earth King
text: Katara? I need to tell you something. [Starts blushing.] I've been wanting to say it for a long time.

title: The Earth King
text: What is it, Aang?

title: The Earth King
text: [Rubs the back of his head.] Katara, I- [He is cut off by Sokka.]

title: The Earth King
text: [Throws Aang in a headlock.] All right. Who's ready to get going on our little men-only man trip? [Noogies Aang. Katara looks at him, annoyed.]

title: The Earth King
text: Aang and Sokka, [They look at him.] I wish you a good journey. Ba Sing Se owes you its thanks. We look forward to your safe return. [Aang, Katara, and Sokka bow.]

title: The Earth King
text: Sokka starts climbing atop Appa. A soldier walks up to the king.

title: The Earth King
text: Your Majesty. There are three female warriors to see you. They're from the island of Kyoshi.

title: The Earth King
text: [Shocked.] That's Suki! [Falls off Appa.]

title: The Earth King
text: You know these warriors?

title: The Earth King
text: [Gets up.] Oh yeah. The Kyoshi Warriors are a skilled group of fighters. Trustworthy too. They're good friends of ours.

title: The Earth King
text: Then we shall welcome them as honored guests.

title: The Earth King
text: [Aang turns to Appa.] Wait. Aang. [She hugs him, which startles him, then kisses him on the cheek, causing him to blush.]

title: The Earth King
text: I'm really gonna miss you guys.

title: The Earth King
text: [Hugs Toph with Aang. Sokka looks away, crossing his arms.] Me too.

title: The Earth King
text: Yeah.

title: The Earth King
text: [Everyone goes to hug him.] Aahh! Great. That's enough. [Smiles.] Okay, we love each other. [Pats Aang and Katara on the head.] Seriously.

title: The Earth King
text: Appa flies off. Back at the apartment, Iroh and Zuko are asleep. Zuko wakes up and walks into the bathroom. He washes his face with water. When he looks in the mirror, he sees himself with no scar, no hair and an arrow tattoo on his head, resembling Aang. He looks horrified. He screams himself awake and breathes heavily. He touches the scar on his face and closes his eyes. Meanwhile, Appa is flying Sokka and Aang. Sokka is resting across Appa's back.

title: The Earth King
text: You see, Aang? A little positive thinking works wonders. We got the king on our side, we got Long Feng arrested, and when we get back, Suki's waiting for me.

title: The Earth King
text: [Dreamily.] Yeah. Girls are waiting for us. Thanks, positive attitude.

title: The Earth King
text: Everything is gonna work out perfectly. From now on and forever. [Aang turns around and smiles at him.]

title: The Earth King
text: In a prison, Long Feng is sitting in his cell. A Dai Li agent appears outside of the cell.

title: The Earth King
text: [Slides a tray of food underneath the door.] Dinner. [Long Feng grabs some food.] The Council of Five and the military are loyal to the Earth King, [Long Feng looks at him.] but the Dai Li remains loyal to you, Long Feng, sir. [Walks away as Long Feng eats his food while smiling sinisterly.]

title: The Earth King
text: Meanwhile, at a random house, Toph is outside. She exhales deeply and knocks on the door. It opens on its own.

title: The Earth King
text: [Enters.] Hello? Mom? Anyone home? [Walks to the center of the room. She senses something, but is quickly captured in a metal box. In a scared voice.] Hey! Who do you think you're dealing with!?

title: The Earth King
text: Xin Fu and Master Yu appear.

title: The Earth King
text: One loud-mouthed little brat who strayed too far from home.

title: The Earth King
text: Back at the palace, three Kyoshi Warriors are walking up to the king and bow.

title: The Earth King
text: In our hour of need, it is with the highest honor that I welcome our esteemed allies, the Kyoshi Warriors!

title: The Earth King
text: The warriors look up.

title: The Earth King
text: We are the Earth King's humble servants.

title: The Earth King
text: The middle warrior is shown to have gold eyes, showing that it is really Azula, Mai, and Ty Lee disguised as Kyoshi Warriors, whom they have previously defeated.

title: The Earth King
text: Fade to credits.

title: The Earth King
text: Aang

title: The Guru
text: The episode starts with a view of the exterior of Zuko and Iroh's apartment. Cut to the interior. Iroh is preparing food when Zuko awakens.

title: The Guru
text: What's that smell?

title: The Guru
text: It's jook. I'm sure you wouldn't like it.

title: The Guru
text: [Sniffs.] Actually, it smells delicious. I'd love a bowl, Uncle. [Holds a bowl up.]

title: The Guru
text: Now that your fever is gone, you seem different somehow.

title: The Guru
text: [Optimistically.] It's a new day. We've got a new apartment, new furniture, and today's the grand opening of your new tea shop. [Moves to a table and sits.] Things are looking up, Uncle. [Starts drinking the jook.Â Iroh's shocked expression changes to a smile.]

title: The Guru
text: Aang and Sokka fly on Appa to a Water Tribe camp, where Hakoda is.

title: The Guru
text: You haven't seen your dad in over two years. You must be so excited!

title: The Guru
text: [Almost throwing up.] I know I should be, but, I just feel sick to my stomach. [Holds his stomach.]

title: The Guru
text: Don't be nervous. He's going to be so happy to see you! [He puts his hand on Sokka's shoulder who smiles.]

title: The Guru
text: So what about you? Are you nervous to meet this guru?

title: The Guru
text: Not at all. I'm ready to master the Avatar State. I'll do whatever it takes. [Sokka gets off Appa.] See you in a week. Yip yip!

title: The Guru
