text: Growing up in the South Pole, waterbenders are totally at home surrounded by snow and ice and seas. But as you probably noticed on your travels, that isn't the case wherever you go.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I know! When we were stranded in the desert, I felt like there was almost nothing I could do.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Stops walking.] That's why you have to learn to control water wherever it exists.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I've even used my own sweat for waterbending.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Smiling.] That's very resourceful, Katara. You're thinking like a true master. But did you know you could even pull water out of thin air?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: In a quick movement of her right arm, Hama uses waterbending to manipulate the water vapor in the air, liquefying it and coating her fingertips.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: You have got to keep an open mind, Katara. [The water around her fingertips freezes, creating ice claws.] There's water in places you never think about.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: This has got to be the nicest natural setting in the Fire Nation. I don't see anything that would make a spirit mad around here.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The camera focuses on Toph and Sokka. Toph is standing casually near where Sokka is deeply inhaling the aroma of a bundle of flowers.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Maybe the Moon Spirit just turned mean.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Angrily.] The Moon Spirit is a gentle, loving lady. She rules the sky with compassion and ... lunar goodness!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Catches sight of a villager walking past.] Excuse me, sir. Can you tell us anything about the spirit that's been stealing people?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Only one man ever saw it and lived and that's Old Man Ding.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Where does Old Man Ding live?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The scene changes to a field of fire lilies, where Hama continues to tutor Katara in waterbending.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Wow, these flowers are beautiful.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: They're called fire lilies. They only bloom a few weeks a year, but they're one of my favorite things about living here. And like all plants and all living things, they're filled with water.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I met a waterbender who lived in a swamp and could control the vines by bending the water inside.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: You can take it even further.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: In a sharp, swiveling motion, she draws water from dozens of the surrounding fire lilies and slices a nearby rock clean through.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: That was incredible! [Sees the wilted lilies.] It's a shame about the lilies, though.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: They're just flowers. When you're a waterbender in a strange land, you do what you must to survive. Tonight I'll teach you the ultimate technique of waterbending. It can only be done during the full moon, when your bending is at its peak.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Cautiously.] But isn't that dangerous? I thought people have been disappearing around here during the full moon.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Oh, Katara. Two master waterbenders beneath a full moon? [Begins walking away.] I don't think we have anything to worry about.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The two exit the field. The scene fades to later that night, where Aang, Sokka, and Toph are approaching Old Man Ding, who is boarding up his windows.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Old Man Ding?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Huh? [Accidentally hammers his thumb.] Ow, dang blame it! What? Can't you see I'm busy? Got a full moon rising. And why does everyone call me that? I'm not that old! [Attempts to lift a wooden plank off the ground, but fails to do so. Sighs.] Well, I'm young at heart.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Aang approaches and helps Ding lift the board.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Not ready to get snapped up by some moon monster yet at least.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Proceeds to nail the board to the window frame.] We wanted to ask you about that.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Did you get a good look at the spirit that took you?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Didn't see no spirit, just felt something come over me, like I was possessed. Forced me to start walking toward the mountain. [Points to the mountain.] I tried to fight it, but I couldn't control my own limbs. It just about had me into a cave up there. [Imitates a walking puppet.] And I looked up at the moon for what I thought would be my last glimpse of light. [Cuts to shot of the trio, Sokka quivering in fear.] But then the sun started to rise and I got control of myself again! I just high-tailed it away from that mountain as quick as I could!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Why would a spirit want to take people to a mountain?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Oh no! [Sokka and Aang assume defensive positions.] I did hear people screaming under the mountain. The missing villagers must still be there!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: They all stare at the mountain. The scene changes to where Aang, Sokka, and Toph are racing through the dark forest in search of the imprisoned villagers.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Feels the ground with her hand.] I can hear them. They're this way!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The trio proceeds to sprint toward the mountain. Meanwhile, Hama and Katara venture into the moonlit forest.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Can you feel the power the full moon brings?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: She inhales deeply through her nose and stretches her arms outward, flexing her limbs which causes her veins to bulge out, while Katara looks on in disgust.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: For generations it has blessed waterbenders with its glow, allowing us to do incredible things!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The camera depicts a shot of her standing beneath the full moon.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Extreme close-up; in a sinister tone.] I've never felt more alive.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The scene changes to Aang, Sokka, and Toph, who have arrived at the mountain and are standing before the mouth of the cave.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: This is the place.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I can't see anything down there.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Grabs Sokka's hand.] That's why you have me. Let's go!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The three descend into the dark cave and approach a solid metal door, torches nearby. Using metalbending, Toph breaks it down, while the trio proceeds to make their way through the tunnel, Aang and Sokka lighting their path with the torches. They arrive to see several villagers chained to the walls of the cave.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: We're saved!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Toph unfastens her meteor bracelet and begins to unlock the prisoners' shackles.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I didn't know spirits made prisons like this. Who brought you here?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: It was no spirit.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: It was a witch!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: A witch? What do you mean?

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Speaking, as Toph unlocks her shackles.] She seems like a normal old woman, but she controls people like some dark puppetmaster!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Gritting.] Hama!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Yes, the innkeeper!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I knew there was something creepy about her!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: We have to stop Hama!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: I'll get these people out of here. You go!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Aang and Sokka flee from the scene, while Toph stays behind. The scene switches to the forest. A cat owl hoots and flies away. The camera focuses on Hama and Katara, their backs facing the camera, the wind blowing their hair slightly, looking toward the moon.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: What I'm about to show you, [Cuts to close-up of Hama glaring menacingly.] I discovered in that wretched Fire Nation prison.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The scene fades to a flashback of a younger Hama imprisoned within a cage. She peers through the bars of her cell and looks down mournfully. The camera zooms out to the entire prison room.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Voice-over.] The guards were always very careful to keep any water away from us. They piped in dry air and had us suspended away from the ground. Before giving us any water, they would bind our hands and feet so we couldn't bend. [A side-view is shown of Fire Nation guards giving water to a tied up prisoner.] Any sign of trouble was met with cruel retribution. [Cuts to shot of the full moon in the sky during present day.] And yet each month, I felt the full moon enriching me with its energy. [Cuts to shot of Hama.] There had to be something I could do to escape. [Scene fades to flashback of the prison.] Then I realized that where there is life, there is water. [A younger Hama is shown bending the water inside an elephant rat that had wandered its way into her cage.] The rats that scurried across the floor of my cage were nothing more than skins filled with liquid and I passed years developing the skill that would lead to my escape. [A close-up is shown of Hama smiling at her discovery. The scene fades back to present day. Ominously.] Bloodbending. [Cut to a scared Katara.] Controlling the water in another body, [Cut to ground shot of both Hama and Katara.] enforcing your own will over theirs. [The scene fades back to a flashback of young Hama controlling a horde of rats using bloodbending.] Once I had mastered the rats, I was ready for the men.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The camera switches over to show a Fire Nation guard strolling past the cages when a sudden feeling comes over him. Using bloodbending, Hama forces the guard to grab hold of his keys and unlock her cell, thus marking her escape.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Voice-over.] And during the next full moon, I walked free for the first time in decades. [The guard attempts to get up, but Hama quickly forces him back down to the ground. She walks unsteadily away.] My cell unlocked by the very guards assigned to keep me in. [Scene changes back to present day; camera focuses on a close-up of Hama.] Once you perfect this technique, you can control anything or [Looks at Katara from the corner of her eyes sadistically.] anyone.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Unsure.] But ... to reach inside someone and control them? [Casts unsure glance off to the side.] I don't know if I want that kind of power.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Camera zooms out to the two standing in the forest.] The choice is not yours. The power exists. And it's your duty to use the gifts you've been given to win this war. [Closes up to Hama.] Katara, they tried to wipe us out, our entire culture, your mother!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Close-up of her face.] I know.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Camera changes back to Hama.] Then you should understand what I'm talking about! We're the last two waterbenders of the Southern Tribe. [Camera focuses on Katara; off-camera.] We have to fight these people whenever we can, wherever they are, with any means necessary!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Widens eyes in realization.] It's you ... [Angrily.] You're the one who's been making people disappear during the full moons!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Close-up of her face, as she tilts her head downward.] They threw me in prison to rot, along with my brothers and sisters! They deserve the same! You must carry on my work!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Points to Hama, stretching out her left hand.] I won't! I won't use bloodbending and I won't allow you to keep terrorizing this town! [Her hand suddenly twists to one side. She tries desperately to stop it, but fails to do so.]

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Now using bloodbending to subdue to her.] You should've learned the technique before you turned against me! [Forces Katara into a strained position.] It's impossible to fight your way out of my grip! I control every muscle, every vein in your body!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: With swift motions of her hands and arms, Hama uses bloodbending to twist Katara around and throw her from side to side. She positions Katara directly before her and uses a downward motion of her hand to force her into a submissive state.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Tearfully.] Stop! Please ...

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Hama laughs cruelly and keeps Katara subdued. The shot is showing the full moon slowly fades to a close-up of Katara's face as she is crying. Several moments pass as the young waterbender begins to break free from Hama's grip. Hama stares in shock as Katara inhales deeply and rises, now free from her grasp.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Determined.] You're not the only one who draws power from the moon! [Assumes a fighting stance.] My bending is more powerful than yours, Hama. Your technique is useless on me!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: A waterbending duel ensues between the two. Katara pulls a ring of water around her waist and sends the stream of water at Hama, who halts it and sends it back to Katara. In a swift spinning motion, Katara sends the stream toward Hama again, who draws water from nearby trees, deflects the attack and sends a highly pressurized water jet at her. Katara uses her hands to block the attack, disintegrating the water into droplets. Upon seeing Katara's bending prowess, Hama becomes shocked, allowing for her opponent to use waterbending to knock her to the ground.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Shouts.] Aahhh!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Sokka and Aang approach the scene as Hama rises to her knees.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: We know what you've been doing, Hama!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Give up! [Takes a fighting stance.] You're outnumbered!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: No! [Rising.] You've outnumbered yourselves.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: She begins bloodbending Aang and Sokka, who yell in fear, and sends them in Katara's direction. Katara pushes them out of her way and draws water from the ground, sending a stream at Hama, who in turn draws water from a vine and uses a water wheel to deflect the attack.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Unwillingly draws his sword.] Katara, look out! [Forced to walk like a puppet, while waving the blade back and forth rapidly.] It's like my brain has a mind of its own! Stop it arm, stop it!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Katara pulls up a ring of water and pushes Sokka away.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: This feels weird!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Using waterbending to freeze him to a nearby tree.] I'm sorry, Aang!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: It's okay!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: She catches sight of Sokka, still under Hama's power, unwillingly prepared to strike her with his sword. She draws water from a vine and freezes his sword and hand to a tree as well.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Sinisterly.] Don't hurt your friends, Katara! And don't let them hurt each other!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: She uses bloodbending to break Aang and Sokka free from their ice encasement and send them colliding straight into one another with Sokka's sword pointing straight at Aang.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: [Horrified.] No!

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Aang and Sokka abruptly halt in their tracks and look at their hands in confusion. The camera focuses in on Hama, who has suddenly stiffened, and cuts to Katara, an unsure look on her face as she uses bloodbending to subdue the elder. Focusing first on Hama, who grunts in discomfort, the camera turns to show the imprisoned villagers and Toph approaching the scene before cutting to moments later when the elderly waterbender is arrested, handcuffs placed around her wrists.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: You're going to be locked away forever.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: My work is done. [Turns to Katara.] Congratulations, Katara. You're a bloodbender.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: The camera focuses on Katara, who is clearly distressed and breaks down in tears. Hama is shown laughing evilly as she is dragged away by the villagers. The camera returns to focus on Katara, who is crying underneath the full moon as Aang, arm around her, and Sokka, hand on her back, attempt to comfort her. Fades to credits.

title: The Puppetmaster
text: Aang

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Some koala sheep are sleeping, as Katara, Sokka, Aang, Toph, and Appa come out of the bushes. Sokka looks at a map, while everyone else looks around. Momo jumps over on Aang's shoulder, as Aang scratches his head.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Somewhat excitedly.] This is it! The official rendezvous point for the invasion force.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The camera pans to the left, showing a vast area of the place.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: How did you pick this place?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Before we split up, my dad and I found this island on the map. It's uninhabited, and the harbors surrounded by the cliffs seemed like the perfect secluded place.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Nice choice, Sokka. And we're here four days ahead of schedule.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Anxiously.] Wait! Four days? The invasion's in four days?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Yawns.] Whatever. That's like four days from now. Let's just calm down and-

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka falls asleep and begins snoring.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka's got the right idea, Aang. We're here. We're ready. The best thing we can do now is get plenty of rest. [Lies down.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Half-heartedly.] I guess.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [He makes some fast and dramatic ninja-like moves as he speaks.] Your days of tyranny are over, Fire Lord! I'm bringing you down.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Cut to close-up of the Fire Lord, who is about to take a bite of a bundle of grapes with his eyes closed. Hearing Aang's words, he stops and opens his eyes to look down at his adversary. The camera pans out quickly to reveal he is actually a giant when compared to Aang and surrounded by a pit of fire.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Really? [Brings his face close to Aang.] How do you plan on doing that when you're not even wearing pants?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Cut to Aang's scared face, as he looks down to see that Ozai was telling the truth, and screams.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Oh no!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang quickly covers himself with a white Air Nomad shield pulled out of thin air. The camera zooms out to a larger shot of Aang shaking with embarrassment. Suddenly, giant eyes begin to appear all around him. The eye's close and disappear. Cut to shot of the giant Fire Lord laughing, as Aang slowly backs out the door. The Fire Lord raises his arms to the ceiling, while surrounded by flames, laughing heartily. Aang wakes up and starts touching his pants. Momo is seen awake as well.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: It was just a dream, Momo. I still have my pants. [Stands up.] Well, I better keep training.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang walks over to a bush and starts kicking it. Momo gets bored of watching him, and soon falls back asleep. Scene changes to the Fire Nation Palace, where Zuko is getting dressed and ready, with help from his servants.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Fresh fruit, Prince Zuko?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko puts out his hand and shakes his head respectfully.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: May I wash your feet, sir?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko respectfully puts his hand out and shakes his head again.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Head massage?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko shakes his head again.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Hot towel?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko looks at the towels for a moment and takes one. He is seen wiping his forehead before walking out of the room. The two servants bow behind him. Zuko walks out the palace gates, with Fire Nation citizens waiting for him. One woman becomes overly excited at seeing Zuko, and is taken away by the palace guards.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Prince Zuko, is something wrong? You didn't take the palanquin.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I'm just going to Mai's house. It's not far.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: It's not a prince's place to walk anywhere, sir.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Hey. How long have you been up?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: A couple hours. I got a lot more skills to refine if I'm gonna fight Ozai.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Aang stops, panting.] You know, there is such a thing as over-training.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang hits the tree one last time, which sends a vibration throughout his body and makes him fall down, with all of the leaves off the tree collapsing on him. Katara just gazes down at him, and Sokka, holding his map, and Toph, who is facing the other direction, look out from behind her. Aang comes out from under the leaves and walks around Katara in a fighting stance.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You don't get it, do you? My form is bad, I'm sloppy, and I still don't know any firebending. Not even the basics.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang's left eye twitches a little bit after saying this. Katara brings Aang's hand down, with a forced smile on her face. Sokka is seen, lying down, still looking at the map.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: That's okay, Aang. The eclipse will block off firebending anyway. You don't need to know it. [Looking at Aang.] Plus, it's a stupid element.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Okay, well I still have to work on everything else. I better spend the whole day training.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang bows quickly toward Sokka, followed by Katara, and rides off on an air scooter. Sokka moves the map up in front of his face to hide behind it. The view changes to the blue sky, which changes to a starry night. Aang is walking back from his training, now exhausted. Everyone else is asleep. Aang rubs his eyes and yawns before collapsing.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Wide shot of the group on the cliffside with the camera slowly zooming out.] Good night, Katara. Good night, Sokka. Good night, Toph. Good night, Appa. Good night, Momo. Good night, Appa and Mo-

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [With chibi face in a speech bubble that appears above her; angrily.] Go to sleep already! [Clenches her teeth.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Cut to Aang, who flinched upon hearing Toph, but goes back into his normal position and closes his eyes. The camera pans up.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Frontal shot as he points outward.] Your days of tyranny are over, Fire Lord. [Scowls.] I'm bringing you down! [Looks down momentarily; confidently.] And this time, I brought pants.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Camera shows a view of some chains wrapping around Aang's clothing, including his pants. The shot turns to Ozai.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: So it seems, but are you prepared for your ... mathematics test?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: A giant abacus lands behind Aang. Camera turns to show Aang's worried face.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Math test? Oh no! I forgot all about the math test!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Ozai is heard laughing in the background as Aang is screaming while being pulled backward and crushed by some beads on the abacus. He suddenly wakes up.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I've gotta be ready.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang gets up and walks away. He is seen pacing around some sleeping koala sheep. Katara comes over to talk to him.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang, it's the middle of the night. You need to go back to sleep.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: But I forgot my pants and my math test.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Katara sighs and grabs Aang's shoulder.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang, sleep. Please. For me.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Tell me, if you could have anything you want right now, what would it be?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Hm ... A big fancy fruit tart, with rose petals on top.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You know, being a prince and all, I might just be able to make that happen.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Chuckles.] That would be impressive.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [To the servants.] Do you think you could find a fresh fruit tart for the lady, with rose petals on top?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Excellent choice, sir.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I guess there's some nice perks that come with being royalty. [Pushing him Zuko to lay down with her.] Though there's annoying stuff, too. Like that all-day war meeting coming up.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Sitting up, followed by Mai.] War meeting? What are you talking about?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Azula mentioned something. I-I assumed you were going, too.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I guess I wasn't invited.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The two look away from each other. The scene changes back to the Black Cliffs, where Aang is still sleeping.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Wake up, Aang. Wake up, sleepy head! [Cut to an out of focus swaying shot of the Fire Lord standing over Aang.] Rise and shine! You overslept. [The Fire Lord bends in close and then even closer.] You missed the invasion.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Ozai begins to laugh, and is seen riding a giant, flying hippo cow, which breathes out fire at Aang, making him move from his spot. He watches as Ozai flies away, still laughing. Aang quickly wakes up, and goes to wake up Sokka.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka, get up! I needa know what day it is!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What? Who's talking?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka grabs his sword and jumps up, but hits his head on a nearby rock and falls down. Toph and Katara are seen waking up.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Relax! It's still two days before the invasion!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang begins pulling on Sokka's legs, trying to get him up.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka, you've gotta get up drill your rock-climbing exercises.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: In one of my dreams, you were running from Fire Nation soldiers, trying to climb this cliff, [Camera turns to show an annoyed look on Sokka's face.] but you were too slow and they got you!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka stands up quickly and steps in front of Aang.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: But that was just a dream. I'm a great climber!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [While pointing at the cliff nearby.] Then climb that cliff! Climb it fast!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Camera turns to show the size of the cliff. When it sets back on Sokka, he looks at Aang, pointing to the cliff. Aang nods fast, and Sokka reluctantly begins to climb it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Stupid Avatar! Stupid cliff! Stupid dream! I can climb fast!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang is seen looking up at Sokka with an anxious smile, before frowning at seeing how slowly he was going. Toph tries to get a drink of water.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Turning around to her.] Don't drink that!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka is seen behind Aang falling off the cliff after hearing Aang. Toph spits out the water onto Katara, who waterbends it off her.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Why? Is it poisoned?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: In my dream, we were right in the middle of the invasion, and you had to stop to use the bathroom! [He puts his hands between his legs and squeezes them together.] We died because of your tiny bladder. [He turns to Katara.] And you need to start wearing your hair up. In my dream, your hair got caught in a train, and-.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Putting a hand on the side of his face.] Aang! I know you're just trying to help, but you really need to get a grip. You're unraveling.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [He takes a deep breath before finally speaking.] You're right. I'm losing my mind.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka is still climbing the cliff, and almost reaches the top, but is seen sliding down. Cut to the sun in the sky. Cut to Aang's face, his eye twitching, as he paces around, stressed. Cut to his hands rotating between putting his thumb and finger together before alternating to the opposites on the other hand.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: It's like every time I think about how stressed I am, I just end up more stressed. I'm like a big growing snowball of nerves.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: As he paces, Katara sits, concerned, petting Momo and watching Aang, while Sokka hammers away at a piece of armor for Appa. Toph lies resting against a sleeping Appa.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Turning to look at Aang.] Of course you are. That's 'cause you gotta fight the Fire Lord, the baddest man on the planet. And you better win or we're all done for.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Approaching Sokka, annoyed.] Sokka! You're not helping!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Standing.] What? It's true. That's the deal. He knows it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Katara pushes down Sokka to sit, before looking over at Aang, who is nervously shaking. She walks over to him and touches his shoulders.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You know what, I've got just the thing! Get ready to be de-stressified!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Scene changes to Aang and Katara in a mountain doing some yoga. Steaming water in the middle of the room.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: These yoga stretches can really work wonders if you do them in extreme heat. Reach up. [Katara puts her hands above her head together, Aang follows along.] Reach for the sun. [They wave their hands and upper bodies side to side.] Feel your chi paths clearing. [Both bend over so their heads touch the ground, grabbing their legs.] Now close your eyes. How are you feeling?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Close-up of Aang sweating.] I feel ... really warm.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Good, good. Go on.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Like there's this warm feeling all around me. This heat. [Becoming frantic again.] Like I'm in the Fire Lord's palace and he's shooting a bunch of fireballs at me! And the whole world is being engulfed in flames!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: An orange flame is seen circling around, covering the view, before disappearing. Aang gets out of his position and lands on his back, panting.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Maybe your stress is the kind you need to talk out.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Scene changes to Sokka, in his Wang Fire outfit, and Aang lying on a koala sheep.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [In his Wang Fire voice.] Why don't you get right down to business and tell me what's been bothering you.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You know what's bothering me. I have to fight the Fire Lord in a few days.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [He nods upon hearing Aang's explanation.] Tell me more about this "Fire Lord". Why are you so afraid of him?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You said it yourself! He's the baddest man on the planet! I'm supposed to defeat him and save the world!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Nodding in agreement.] Life does feel that way sometimes, doesn't it? Like we're all trying to save the world from evil.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Okay! But what can I do to feel better?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [While handing Aang a koala sheep.] Want to try screaming into this pillow?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang does so. Once his face is out of the wool, the koala sheep makes a noise at him. After Sokka scratches his head, he does a thumbs-up while nodding. Aang shakes his head so Sokka nods faster, but Aang shakes his head faster. Scene changes to Azula at the royal spa, getting her hair done. Zuko comes in and walks up to her.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Hello, Zuzu. If you've come for a royal hair-combing, I'm afraid you'll have to wait.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: So I guess there's a big war meeting coming up, huh? And apparently I'm not welcome there.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What do you mean? Of course you're welcome there!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Oh, yeah?! I guess that's why no one bothered to tell me about it!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Oh, Zuko. Don't be so dramatic. I'm certain Dad wants you there. You probably just weren't invited because it's so obvious you're supposed to be there.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Well, were you invited?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Of course! I'm the princess.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: And I'm the prince!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Exactly, so stop acting like a paranoid child! Just go to the meeting.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Forget it! I'm not going!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko turns around and walks away. The scene changes to Aang lying down on some pillars.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: All right! What you need is a good old-fashioned back pounding to relieve your stress.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Looking up at her.] Pound away.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Toph begins stomping fiercely, causing the pillars to move up and down in various order.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [The pillars causing him pain.] Ow! Toph ... I ... think ... this ... is ... bruising ... me!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Toph stops, and Aang begins sliding to the left, off the pillars.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sorry. I forgot you had baby skin. [Aang grabs onto the edge of the pillars and gets up.] Well, there's one other thing we can try. [She stomps the ground, sending a distant boar-q-pine to her. She catches it and holds it out to Aang with a wide grin.] Acupuncture!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The boar-q-pine's quills stick out, and Aang runs away. Scene changes back to the Fire Nation Palace, where Zuko is looking out a window. Mai comes up to him.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko, it's just a dumb meeting. Who cares?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I don't.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Well, good. You shouldn't. I mean, why would you even want to go? Just think about how things went the last meeting you went to.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Sighs.] I know.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You know what will make you feel better? [Zuko turns his head slightly.] Ordering some servants around. I might be hungry for a whole tray of fruit tarts. And maybe a little palanquin ride around town. Double time.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: She turns Zuko's face to look at her, but he quickly looks away, making Mai let go of him. Scene changes back to the Black Cliffs. Aang is sitting up, holding his knees.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Thanks for everything, guys.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: So, do you feel less stressed? Ready for a good night's sleep?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [He turns his head away.] Uh, I kinda think I sorta might slightly feel a little better. [He looks back at his friends.] Maybe.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Then our work here is done.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka, Katara, and Toph stretch and yawn before lying down. Aang slowly lies down, and closes his eyes, leading to another dream. It begins with a thunderstorm, with Aang riding on Appa through it. They fly by a giant Momo, who tries hitting them down, and grabs them in his hand. It changes to an image of the Fire Nation Royal Palace, and Aang emerges in the water, and is pushed forward into the palace. He looks in all directions, waiting for something to happen. Toph is seen rotating around. Her bangs move to reveal that her eyes are blank. She falls down under the floor in front of Aang, who becomes scared. Sokka tries running away, but some wet earth closes around him. Katara is seen surrounded by fire. Aang tries to go save her, but his feet are frozen to the ground. Ice crawls up his body, and he reaches out, but he's completely frozen. The ground that he was on becomes completely ice. Ozai, as a fire monster, begins laughing and melts the ice, which makes Aang fall down. He is released from his form and falls into some water, where he sinks to the bottom and looks through the floor, seeing Zuko as if he was standing above. The comet is seen passing by behind Zuko. Aang is seen still holding his breath. The comet is shown rushing down. Momo is seen telling someone to be quiet. Aang is standing on grass and seeing bushes and mountains when the comet strikes the ground, and everything is scorched and on fire. He quickly wakes up, screaming and waking everyone else up. Appa becomes scared, and Momo slides off him. Everyone rushes over to him.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What happened, Aang?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Turns away on hands and knees.] It's the nightmares. They just get worse and worse.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Looks like it's time for another ... [He turns around and puts his Wang Fire disguise on and voice.] therapy session.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Momentarily looking back.] No. That won't help. Nothing helps. There's only one thing I can do! I'm going to stay awake straight through to the invasion!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang starts shaking upon this, and everyone behind him is shocked, except for Toph, who just smiles. Sokka's Wang Fire disguise falls off him. The scene changes to the next day, where Katara is doing some exercises on the edge of the cliff. Aang is pacing nervously behind her, which makes her stop.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Invasion. All aboard for the invasion.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Approaching.] You don't look so good. You sure you can't just lie down for a little nap?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I told you, I can't go back to sleep.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang, staying up all night can't be good for you.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Walking toward the cliff edge. Katara turns and moves a bit to follow.] Actually, staying up all night has given me some time to think. And I've realized some big things, Katara.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What big things?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I see everything so clearly now. What really matters. Why I'm really doing this. [He turns around to look at Katara.] I'm doing it to save the world. But more than that. I'm doing it for the people I love. [Side shot of Aang and Katara near each other.] I'm doing it for you, Katara.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang, what are you saying?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I'm saying, I love you! [He kisses her. After he pulls back, she embraces and kisses him back.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [After kissing for a while she pulls back, whispering slightly.] What are we doing?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What our hearts have been telling us to do for a long, long time. Baby, [He moves Katara down to the side.] you're my forever girl. [Aang puckers up his lips for another kiss.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang! [Aang realizes he was just daydreaming, and realizes he is not holding Katara anymore.] I was just saying you should take a nap.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [He quickly turns around to face Katara.] Oh, I guess I kinda drifted off into a daydream.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What was your dream about?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [He pauses to think for a moment.] Uh, living underwater?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Initially confused, she smiles back.] Sounds neat!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang nervously laughs. Katara walks away, and he lets out a sigh of relief. The scene changes back to Mai's house. Zuko is lying down on the arm of the couch, while Mai is making tea. Just as she is about to give him a cup, someone calls for him.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Prince Zuko, [He bows before the prince.] everyone's waiting for you.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Mai and Zuko walk over to the servant to see what he's talking about.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: What?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The high admirals, the high generals, the war ministers, and the princess have all arrived. You're the only person missing.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: So, my dad wants me at the meeting?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The Fire Lord said he would not start until you arrived, sir.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko smiles, and looks at Mai, who is also smiling. The scene changes back to the Black Cliffs, where Aang is hiding behind a bush in his Fire Nation uniform. He jumps out and rolls behind a rock, before stepping up from behind the rock.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Put 'em up, Fire Lord!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang jumps out from behind the rock and starts shooting air blasts at the noodle picture of Fire Lord Ozai tied to a tree. One of the shots goes too far and hits Sokka, who is working on a golden arrow.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Hey! I'm tryin' build Appa some armor here so he doesn't have to go into the invasion naked. He's your bison.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Standing in front of the "Ozai" tree in a fighting stance.] Ozai's defense is impeccable. I'll have to try a different approach.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang jumps up and shoots more air blasts, but they all miss. Aang lands on his feet and looks at the picture. Only a leaf falls. Aang runs up in front of the picture.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You think you're untouchable, don't you, Mr. Fire Lord?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Off-screen.] Boy, you are really starting to lose it, kid.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang quickly becomes surprised upon hearing the voice, and quickly turns around to face Momo.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Momo, did you hear something? [Turns back.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Off-screen.] No, but I said something. [Aang becomes shocked and gets close to Momo.] You, my friend, are just a few plums short of a fruit pie. [Aang stares at Momo in disbelief, his jaw wide open. He quickly stands up, shakes his head, and covers his eyes. He peeks through them, at which point Momo begins chittering normally again. Aang walks up to him and pets him.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: That's more like it. I'm so tired that for a second there, I imagined you were talking to me. [Momo tilts his head in confusion. Everyone is seen walking forward and watching Aang.] Oh, Momo, let me explain. [Aang begins chattering like Momo. Katara and Sokka share a look of confusion, as Toph merely stands there with a slightly annoyed look. Momo chitters back, in which Aang laughs before chittering again. Katara interrupts him.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang? We're all starting to get a little worried about you.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You've been awake too long.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: And you're acting downright weird.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You've got to take care of yourself. You can't go on like this.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Sighs.] Look, I appreciate what you guys are saying, but the stress and the nightmares. They were just too much. Staying awake is the best way for me to deal with it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Standing and pointing at Appa.] Yeah! Leave the kid alone!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Pointing back.] Hey, who asked you? [The two begin to fight.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You guys, come on.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: No! I am sick of this guy always mouthing me and telling me what to do!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Oh, you don't like it? Well, let's go right now!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang runs over to Sokka for help, not realizing that his friends don't see anything.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka, what do we do?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Confused.] About what?

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Pointing.] About that!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Sokka looks in the direction Aang was pointing. Momo is seen in a purple samurai outfit with the fur between his ears tied in a topknot. Appa is seen with orange and dark red armor and a helmet, with three swords. Momo takes out his one sword, and the two charge at each other. Momo parries Appa's three swords with his single one. Some koala sheep start cheering on the two.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Cut to a group of koala sheep.] Appa! Appa! Appa! [Cut to another group.] Momo! Momo! Momo!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Appa takes out another sword, and twists in a twister toward Momo, who blocks the attacks. Aang walks forward and tries stopping them.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Come on, guys. We're all on the same side.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Guru Pathik appears on a cloud with six arms, holding two cups of onion and banana juice, and playing a veena.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Singing.] Chakras, chakras, everybody loves chakras. Chakras, chakras, chakras sandwich tastes good. Yum!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Momo and Appa continue fighting. Momo keeps trying to strike Appa, but Appa keeps jumping away.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Cut to some koala sheep.] Yay! Yay! Yay! Yay! Yay!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang begins sweating. Rocks, in a snake like formation, begin to slide in and around Aang, before sliding away. The koala sheep continue cheering on Momo and Appa. The tree with Ozai's noodle picture begins dancing. A ring of rocks surrounds Aang, as do the koala sheep. Three lines of rocks are seen on each side of Aang, as Momo and Appa continue to fight.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I just need to jump in a cold waterfall!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: He screams and runs away from the scene. The scene changes to the Royal Palace, where Mai is waiting for Zuko after the meeting, who is exiting.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: So, how did it go? [They walk on together.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: When I got to the meeting, everyone welcomed me. My father had saved me a seat. He wanted me next to him. I was literally at his right hand.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Zuko, that's wonderful! You must be happy.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The two stop at a picture of Ozai. Zuko gazes at it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: During the meeting, I was the perfect prince. The son my father wanted. [Looks down, eyes closed.] But I wasn't me.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Scene changes back to the Black Cliffs. It is nighttime, and Aang is tired. A mist of fog surrounds koala sheep wool. Aang looks at it and begins touching it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Oh, look. Another hallucination. An imaginary bed made out of clouds.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Pan right to see Katara, Toph, and Sokka standing nearby, with a flock of sheared koala sheep.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Hey! It's real! We spent hours working on it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: We made it for you. A good night's sleep will probably take the crazy away. We hope.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Look! You guys keep telling me that I need to sleep, but I can't! The invasion's tomorrow!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Concerned.] Aang ...

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: No, Katara! There's still so much I haven't learned. I don't need sleep. What I need is practice. Quick, hit me! [He begins to wobble.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: I'm not going to hit you.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You want me to do it? [Sokka nudges her back.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Approaching Aang, placing a hand on his shoulder.] Listen to me. You've been training for this since the day we met. [Moves behind him, talking over his shoulder.] I've seen your progress. You're smart, brave, and strong enough.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You really think so? [Katara nods.]

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: We all do. You can do this. You're ready.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: You're the man, Twinkle Toes!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Thanks, guys. [He nods, yawns, and rubs his eyes. Katara aids him to the bed, where he lies down.] You know what? I think I am ready. [The other three watch as he falls asleep quickly. He falls into another dream, meeting with Ozai again.] Your days of tyranny are over, Fire Lord!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Really? You're gonna take me out? You're not even wearing pants!

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: [Smiles smugly.] No, Fire Lord Ozai. You're not wearing any pants.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Ozai looks down and sees Aang is right. He quickly pulls over a shield with the Fire Nation emblem on it.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: No! My royal parts are showing.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: The view goes outside, where it is seen that the palace is up on a rock in the sky. The scene fades back to the Black Cliffs with Ozai screaming to Aang, who is seen smiling upon his success in the dream. Fade to credits.

title: Nightmares and Daydreams
text: Aang

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The episode starts in the Black Cliffs, with the scene cutting to a shot of three maps lying splayed out on the ground. Cut to Sokka who ponders over the maps intensely. He closes his eyes and rubs his forehead, seemingly confused. Two gloved hands suddenly appear, one holding a cup and the other moving Sokka's hand aside from his forehead to hand him the cup. The hand comes to rest on his shoulders comfortingly. Cut to zoomed out shot of Sokka sitting by a cliff-edge, the maps laid out before him. Katara is kneeling right beside him, having been the one to hand him the cup. Toph can be seen in the background, sitting idly on a rock. Aang suddenly appears on-screen, leaping into the air and landing beside Toph.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Momo jumps onto his shoulder; cheerfully.] Top of the morning, Momo!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Rises and places hands on hips.] Sounds like you slept well.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Moves his hand aside in a sweeping motion.] Like a baby moose lion. [Assumes a fighting stance and raises fists; exuberantly.] I'm ready to face the Fire Lord.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: So, what's your strategy for taking him down? [Smiling and raises her hands to her eyes, her fingers wiggling outward in a mimicry of the Avatar State.] Gonna get your glow on and [Punches the air with a determined expression on her face.] hit him with a little Avatar State action?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Looks down sorrowfully.] I can't. [Cut to side-view of him, the camera panning slightly to the left.] When Azula shot me with lightning, [Close his eyes briefly.] my seventh chakra was locked, cutting off my connection to all the cosmic energy in the universe. [Cut back to shot of him and Toph.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You know what I just heard? [Holds up one hand and opens and closes it in a "gibber-gabber" expression.] Blah, blah, spiritual mumbo jumbo blah, blah, something about space. [Bored.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Cut to a wide shot of the ocean; thick fog is visible on the horizon.] Oh, no. [Cut to a shot of Katara, appearing concerned.] Sokka, do you think the fog will delay the invasion?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Stands up.] No. [Cut to close-up of the fog, five Water Tribe ships suddenly appearing from amid the mist.] That is the invasion!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Cut to shot of Hakoda standing on the deck of one ship, peering through a telescope; Bato stands in the background. Hakoda lowers the telescope and smiles confidently. Scene fades to shot of the shoreline where Aang and Toph stand in the background by the water. They utilize earthbending to raise rock from beneath the water and form a dock. Cut to overhead shot of the Black Cliffs to show four Water Tribe ships already docked. The last Water Tribe ship is seen coming into port. Cut to closer shot of one ship by the dock, Hakoda standing nearby. Katara and Sokka run over to him.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You made it, Dad! [Cut to shot of Katara embracing her father happily.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Spirited.] Were you able to locate everyone I told you to find?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I did. [Two members of the Foggy Swamp Tribe disembark. Doubtfully.] But I'm a little worried, Sokka. Some of these men aren't exactly the "warrior type". [Turns head slightly toward the two swamp dwellers.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Cut to frontal shot of Tho and Due as they descend the wooden ramp from the ship.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Enthusiastically, swinging his arm.] Oooh-whee! [Cut to shot of the two men standing on the dock.] This place ain't nothing like a swamp. [Points accusingly to a rock in the water.] What you reckon that is, Tho? Some sort of Fire Nation exploding trap what eat ya?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Impartial.] It's just a rock, Due.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Grins.] Well, I'll be. [Scratching his head.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Is it just me, or are those fellas a little loose in the leaf-hat?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Walks past, behind the chief and his family, stopping beside Sokka.] I just wish they would wear pants.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Cut to shot of Huu standing alone on the dock. Scratches his stomach.] Pants are an illusion, and so is death.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Cut to shot of the Hakoda, Katara, and Bato appearing less than reassured; Sokka, on the other hand, grins widely. Scene fades to far shot of Katara, Aang, Toph, and several Foggy Swamp members clustered by the shore, talking among themselves. A pair of legs appears on screen, boasting Earth Kingdom clothing. A voice speaks.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Off-screen.] Hi, Katara. [Cut to close-up of the figure who reveals himself to be Haru; he smiles, now sporting a small mustache and goatee.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Cut to zoomed out shot of Haru.] Haru! [Runs over and embraces him.] It's so good to see you!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Appears on screen with Toph.] Toph, this is Haru. When we met him, his town was controlled by the Fire Nation. So he had to hide his earthbending.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [With Katara resting a hand on his shoulder.] Katara inspired me and my father to take back our village. [Turns to Katara who blushes and looks away.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Tyro appears and lays his hands on Haru's and Katara's shoulders.] You helped us find our courage, Katara. [Katara turns to him.] Now we're here to help you.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Toph suddenly senses someone on her left. She angrily turns and takes a fighting stance.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: No way! Is that-

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: She is lifted off the ground by two big arms. The camera shows that the arms actually belong to the Big Bad Hippo, a former competitor at Earth Rumble VI. He is joined by the Boulder, another former competitor. The Hippo hugs Toph.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Hippo happy to see Blind Bandit!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Angrily.] You guys here for a rematch?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Negatory. The Boulder and The Hippo no longer fight for others' entertainment. Now, we fight for our kingdom!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Smiling.] Sweet.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The camera cuts to Sokka, while The Hippo puts Toph down. He turns to his dad. Suddenly, a bomb explodes on a boat, making Sokka, Hakoda, and Aang run toward it. The mechanist appears from below deck, coughing. Teo leaves the boat, followed immediately by his father, and Pipsqueak carrying The Duke on his shoulder.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Was that a new invention?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Teo licking his fingers clean.] Yes, but unfortunately the incendiary capabilities of peanut sauce prove to be a failure.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [The others seems disgusted.] You're making peanut sauce bombs?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: They're destructive.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: And delicious. [They both lick the sauce that splashed all over their faces. Momo flies over to Pipsqueak and starts licking his face, much to his and The Duke's amusement.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Where you able to complete work on the plans I send you?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Yes, I was, and I think the Fire Nation will be quite surprised.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Aang, my dad and I made this for you.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Hands a staff to Aang. Aang taps it on the ground and it opens, revealing a brand new glider.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: A new glider! This is amazing!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: And as a special feature, I added the snack compartment. [Rotates the handle, making the snacks come out.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Oh ... well, I'm sure that will come in handy.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to the Fire Nation prison where Iroh was sent to.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I bet you're tired of being in this cell old man. Well too bad. [Camera shows Iroh's face.] You're never stepping outside these walls again.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Enters.] Breakfast.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Stands.] Careful, Ming, don't get too close. His stench will knock you right out. [Leaves, laughing.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Looks at Poon contemptuously and approaches Iroh.] I snuck in some white jade tea. I know you like rare teas.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Ming places the tray of tea inside Iroh's cell.] Thank you, Ming. Ever since I was put in here, you have been very kind to me.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show a very nervous Sokka standing on a podium with his father and Team Avatar

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Don't worry, you'll do great.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Good morning everyone. Ahh! [Trips on stage.] Umm ... so, as you know, today, we're invading the Fire Nation! I mean I know you know that because otherwise why else would you be here? [Laughs nervously.] Uh anyway, [Dropping scrolls. Unraveling one on a board.] the Fire Lord's palace is here [Points at map, realizing it isn't the map, flips the chart several times until it is the map.]. Uh nope, uh wait, uh wait, uh wait, it's here, [Brief shot of Due scratching his head.] and uh, there's an eclipse today and Aang's gonna fight the Fire Lord and the firebenders won't have any fire to use so that's good for us! [Brief shot of Teo and the mechanist looking on.] And ... um ... I'm sorry let me start at the beginning [Stands up straight, and begins talking very fast.]. Katara and I discovered Aang frozen in an iceberg, now I didn't like Aang at first but grew to love him over time, then we went to the Southern Air Temple where Aang used to live and then we met Suki, [Water Tribe warrior yawns.] who's a Kyoshi warrior. She dressed me like a woman and then she kissed me, and then Aang's friend was a crazy old king and ...

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Cut to Katara speaking over Sokka as he continues talking.] Wow, when he says the beginning he means the beginning beginning. [Hakoda gets up and approaches Sokka.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: ... And then Katara got Haru arrested and then now he's grown a mustache which if you look at him in the front row you can see it ...

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Interrupting.] Thank you, Sokka. It's okay why don't you take a break? [Sokka leaves the stage to sit down, disappointed in himself. Hakoda addresses the crowd.] Let me just clarify a few points for everyone. [Shot of Haru stroking his chin. Everyone pays attention to Hakoda.] Today, is the day of black sun, and I want to thank you all for your self-sacrifice, and your courage. There are two steps to the invasion, a naval stage, and then a land stage. [Shot of Sokka looking down, sad, Katara, Momo and Aang looking at Hakoda and Toph.] To gain sea access to the Fire Nation capital, we need to get past our first major obstacle here, [Points at map.] The Great Gates of Azulon. Next, we hit the land, and we hit hard. We must fight past their battlements and secure the plaza tower. Once we do that, it's up to the Royal Palace. At that point, the eclipse will begin.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Excuse me. The Boulder is confused. Isn't the point to invade during the eclipse, when the firebenders are powerless?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The eclipse only lasts eight minutes, not enough time for the whole invasion. And the Royal Palace is heavily guarded by firebenders. So that's where we'll need the eclipse's advantage the most. When this is finished, the Avatar will have defeated the Fire Lord. We will have control of the Fire Nation capital, and this war will be over!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The entire crowd cheers, and Sokka looks dismayed.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show the team preparing for the upcoming battle. Katara is bending four streams of water into water skins, Toph is putting on her Blind Bandit battle armor, Hakoda is putting on a black Water Tribe helmet, Appa is shown fully dressed in his armor which Sokka made, and Aang is shaving his head to show his Air Nomad tattoos. He is joined by a koala sheep. The scene cuts again to the Fire Nation Palace. Zuko takes off his head piece and armor, revealing the clothes underneath it and letting his hair hang down. He sits and starts to write a letter. The camera cuts once again to show Sokka, still dismayed, standing on the cliff side and Aang flying up to him.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: We've been looking everywhere for you. The boats are ready to leave.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I messed up, Aang.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: What?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The invasion plan was my moment of truth and I completely flubbed it. I just fell apart.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Approaches, putting a hand on his shoulder.] Sokka, that speech wasn't your moment of truth. That was just public speaking, and nobody's really good at that.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: My dad is! He explained the plan perfectly and inspired everyone, like a real leader should.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Look, your moment of truth isn't gonna be in front of some map; it's gonna be out there on the battlefield.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You seem so confident about everything, how do you know we're gonna win?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Because I already failed the world once at Ba Sing Se. I won't let myself fail again.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Camera cuts to show the fleet of ships traveling across the sea. Cut to a view through a Bato's telescope.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: There they are, the Great Gates of Azulon.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I don't see any gates.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Cut to Katara and Hakoda's boat.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Katara, you and the swamp benders whip up a fog cover.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: We'll sneak by them statues just like we sneak by that Fire Navy blockade!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Cut to show Katara, Due, and other swamp benders waterbending a thick fog cover.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Keep it up, we're almost through!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Suddenly a bell rings as a huge net rises out of the water and is set on fire. Sokka and the others are shocked to see patrol boats racing toward them

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Everyone below deck! [Everyone goes into the boats; to Sokka.] Let's hope your invention works.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Camera shows several Fire Nation soldiers climbing onto the boats. They are shown to search the boats thoroughly, but find no one.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: No one's on board, sir.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Where'd they go?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Several submarines are shown traveling beneath the gates. Inside, waterbenders are moving the subs. Cut inside a sub as the mechanist is sitting at the front. Hakoda, Sokka, Pipsqueak, and Bato are standing behind him.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Placing a hand on Sokka's shoulder.] You've really outdone yourself this time, son.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Cut to Toph, who is sitting on the floor behind them with the Duke. She is getting seasick.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Sarcastically.] Yeah, congratulations, Sokka. You managed to invent a worse way of travel than flying. [She holds her mouth, about to throw up.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Takes off his helmet and offers it to Toph.] Helmet?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Toph accepts his offer and vomits into the helmet. The Duke just places his hand on Toph's back, trying to comfort her.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Well, I just came up with the idea. The mechanist did all the work.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Now don't sell yourself short, my boy. [Cut briefly to Katara and Huu waterbending.] It was your idea to use waterbending to make the subs sink and float, brilliant! [Cuts back to the mechanist opening a scroll, revealing a very crude drawing of a submarine.] Though your original designs were a bit difficult to decipher. Unfortunately there is one problem I couldn't fix. [Cut to outside of submarine as the submarines swim past, along with Aang on Appa.] The subs have a limited air supply. Before we land on the beaches, we'll need to resurface.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show Ming coming back into Iroh's cell.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Lunchtime, General Iroh. [Whispers and looks back.] And this time, I brought you an extra bowl of rice.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Thank you, Ming. Your little gestures of kindness have made my days in prison bearable. [Thinks for a moment and smiles.] I think you should take the rest of the day off.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Confused.] What?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You don't look well. Maybe you should go home and rest.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: No, I feel fine.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Brief close-up of his face.] Trust me. It is better that you are not here this afternoon.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Ming nods, indicating that she understands. She gets up and walks out. The scene cuts to show the fleet of submarines surfaced on the water. The Duke is dipping his helmet into the water, trying to wash out Toph's vomit. Everyone is stretching as Aang lands on the submarine from Appa.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [To Toph, Sokka, and Katara, who approach him.] So, this is it huh?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Are you ready for the Fire Nation to know the Avatar is alive?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I'm ready. [Sokka and Aang shake hands and the group hugs.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I hope you kick some serious Fire Lord butt, Twinkle Toes.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Everyone listen up. [Team Avatar comes out of the hug.] The next time we resurface, it'll be on the beaches. So stay alert, and fight smart. Now break time's over, back in the subs. [Sokka, Toph, and Momo leave Katara and Aang standing alone together.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Turning to see Katara.] Katara, I ...

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Speaking at the same time.] Aang, I ...

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You go first.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: We've been through so many things together, and I've seen you grow up so much. You're not that little goofy kid I found in the iceberg anymore. [Aang blushes.] I guess what I'm trying to say is, I'm really proud of you.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Everything's gonna be different after today, isn't it.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Yes, it is.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: What if ... what if I don't come back?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Aang, don't say that, of course you'll- [Katara is cut off as Aang kisses her. After the kiss, Katara blushes and stares sadly after Aang as he confidently snaps his glider and flies away.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Katara, what are you doing? It's time to submerge.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: What? Right, I'm on it. [Jumps onto Appa and waterbends a sphere of water around his head before submerging.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show Zuko walking into Mai's room. He looks at a painting of them and becomes downcast.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I'm sorry Mai.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: He leaves a note on her bed and leaves. The scene cuts to show Aang flying over land. His stomach growls, and he rotates the handle of his glider to release food.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: What do you know? It did come in handy.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show the submarine fleet approaching land. The other end of a periscope emerges above water, looking around. Cut to inside the sub, Hakoda manning the periscope. Realizing where they are he turns around to address the earthbenders.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Everyone in position. Earthbenders, into your tanks. This is gonna be a rough ride.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Toph and other earthbenders climb down a ladder in the sub and get ready. Cut to an overview of the Fire Nation port. An alarm goes off as the subs approach the gate. Several harpoons are launched at the subs, but most miss. One hits, causing a leak which is quickly sealed by a foggy swamp waterbender turning the water to ice, and pulls the attached sub out of the water. Katara quickly responds by piloting Appa out of the water and using waterbending to slice through the chain, dropping the sub back down.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Ready the torpedo. [An ice-covered torpedo is loaded.] Launch!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Huu launches the torpedo with waterbending. Cut outside as six torpedoes make holes in the underwater barrier, making it possible for the subs to pass through.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show Toph, the Boulder, and other earthbenders standing in a metal tank. Cut to Water Tribe warriors and foggy swamp waterbenders with Sokka among them, he lets out a sigh. Cut to the subs rising from the water, being instantly attacked by missiles. The subs open and several tanks exit while the other soldiers yell and charge out. The battle commences as they make their way inland, destroying battlements as they go. Earthbenders use rocks provided by a truck containing many rocks. Appa arrives and Katara jumps off as Fire Nation tanks appear. Teo is seen inside an earthbender tank before it destroys a battlement by crushing it. Another tank lifts its front up to slam down and crush a Fire Nation tank. More Fire Nation tanks arrive as the army pushes on. The swamp benders use water provided to destroy enemy tanks.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: We're a man down. Where in tarnation is Huu? [He and Due continue waterbending, launching a tank into the water.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Suddenly a large seaweed monster is shown coming out of the water and destroys several enemy tanks, throwing one into a battlement on the ledge above.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: [Waves.] Hey Huu! Where you been? [The seaweed opens to reveal Huu standing inside.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Communin' with nature. Takes a while to collect this much seaweed. [Closes the seaweed again as he sees a large fireball coming straight toward him.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Several Fire Nation soldiers on rhinos appear shooting fireballs at a group of Water Tribe warriors. They charge, and Sokka quickly disarms one of the riders and steals his rhino.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Dad, look out!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Hakoda grunts as he turns and deflects a fireball with his shield. He turns back to disarm a soldier and quickly defeats others before jumping on the rhino to join Sokka. The vehicle full of rocks for earthbenders is destroyed. Huu, inside the seaweed, is shown destroying more tanks. An earthbender tank is destroyed by a battlement above. Cut to Hakoda and Sokka who saw this happen.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Sokka, we've gotta take out those battlements! It's our only chance.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I've got an idea.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Sokka, Hakoda, and Katara are shown riding a fully armored Appa. Sokka draws his sword and slices the end of a missile launcher off. As they fly past another, Hakoda throws two bombs inside the battlement. Cut to two soldiers running out as it explodes. Cut back to Appa as Katara breaks two barrels of water attached to either side of Appa as it forms around her arms. They fly past another battlement she freezes the soldier and launcher inside. Appa lands between two still operational battlements. The three jump off Appa.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You two take out that battlement. [Pointing to a battlement in the distance before leaving to another.] I got this one. Watch each other's backs. [Cut to Sokka and Katara, shown breaking into their battlement, Katara freezing the soldiers inside. Sokka uses his sword to cut through the launcher, causing part of it to fall out and explode outside as Katara and Sokka exit the battlement. They see Hakoda on the roof of his as he climbs inside. They hear noises from the ensuing fight until the launcher shoots and explodes, hearing Hakoda yelling out in pain. Cut to Sokka and Katara's worried faces as Hakoda exits, wounded, and falls to the ground.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Dad?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Dad! [The two run to his side.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The camera cuts again to show Zuko kneeling at a painting of his mother.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: I know I've made some bad choices, but today, I'm gonna set things right. [He rises, picks up his sword, covers his head with the hood of his robe, turns his back to the camera and leaves.]

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: The scene cuts to show Appa landing on the edge of the battlefield. Sokka and Katara help Hakoda onto the ground, and Katara starts trying to heal him.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: How does that feel, dad?

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: Ah, a little, better. I need, to get back to the troops. [Attempts to stand but is too weak to.] Ahh!

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
text: You're hurt, badly. You can't fight anymore.

title: The Day of Black Sun, Part 1: The Invasion
