text: So far, this intermission is the best part of the play.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Walks down the stairs holding a bag of flaming fire flakes and sits next to Suki.] Apparently, the playwright thinks I'm an idiot who tells bad jokes about meat all the time!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Hint of sarcasm.] Yeah, you tell bad jokes about plenty of other topics.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Eats a fire flake.] I know!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Angry.] At least the Sokka actor kind of looks like you. That woman playing the Avatar doesn't resemble me at all!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I don't know, you are more in touch with your feminine side than most guys.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Standing up.] Argh!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Relax, Aang. They're not accurate portrayals. It's not like I'm a preachy crybaby who can't resist giving overemotional speeches about hope all the time. [Everyone looks at her.] What?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Turns around and sits down. Sarcastically.] Yeah, that's not you at all.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Listen friends, it's obvious that the playwright did his research. I know it must hurt, but what you're seeing up there on that stage is the truth.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Fade to a painted background with Earth Kingdom buildings. The Team Avatar players stand next to a large rock.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Well, here we are in the Earth Kingdom!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Opens up her miniature air glider prop.] I'd better have a look around to see if I can find an earthbending teacher! [Jumps up into the air with a cable lifting her up.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: This is it, this must be where I come in!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actress Aang flies around the theater, over the audience, and returns to the stage.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I flew all over town, but I couldn't find a single earthbending master!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Here it comes ...

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Enters the stage from a trapdoor beneath the rock prop and holds it above his head.] You can't find an earthbending master in the sky, you have to look underground! [Throws away the prop.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Aang, Sokka, Suki, and Katara laugh. Zuko looks up from a piece of paper, stunned. And Toph is still looking eager.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Who are you?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Spits.] My name's Toph, [Flexes.] because it sounds like tough, and that's just what I am! [Audience laughs.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Wait a minute, [Picks at her ear with her pinky.] I sound like a guy. A really buff guy.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Well Toph, what you hear up there is the truth. It hurts, doesn't it?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Are you kidding me? I wouldn't have cast it any other way! [Laughs as Katara looks away in dismay.] At least it's not a flying bald lady! [Camera pans to Aang, who turns toward the stage in annoyance.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: So, you're blind? [Waves hand in front of Actor Toph's eyes.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Laughs.] I can see you doing that. I see everything that you see, except I don't "see" like you do. I release a sonic wave from my mouth. [Screams very loudly at the Team Avatar players. The audience and Team Avatar grimace at the scream; Aang claps his hands over his ears, Zuko grips the railing in front of him, Suki and Sokka hug each other in terror, and Katara grits her teeth while Toph looks excited.] There. I got a pretty good look at you. [Actress Aang and the audience claps.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to a stagehand operating a light. The shot changes to show the Actors Zuko and Iroh.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Zuko, it's time we had a talk ... [Points to Zuko, who now wears a large wig.] about your hair, it's gone too far!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Maybe it's best if we ... split ... up! [Actors Zuko and Iroh walk away from each other.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to the Team Avatar players and Actors Zuko and Iroh cornering Actress Azula.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Azula, my sister, what are you doing here?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You caught me. Wait, what's that? [Points in the distance.] I think it's your honor!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Where? [Everybody looks while Actress Azula escapes through a door.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Turning to audience.] She escaped, but how?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Fade to a stagehand sitting on a stool while he rotates a lever. Shot changes to show the a large drill prop which Actress Azula stands on while it drills through a wall that Actress Aang attempts stands on. One stagehands dressed in black clothing shakes the wall while another waves smoke onto the stage.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: If she continues drilling, this wall will come down for sure!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: A stagehand offers Actress Aang a rock prop, which she throws at Actress Azula.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Blocks the rock prop.] Haha, yes! Continue drilling! The city of Ba Sing Se can hide no longer!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actress Aang throws two more rock props at Azula. The shot changes to show members of the audience yawning and falling asleep.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: No, Jet! What did they do to you?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Must ... serve ... Earth King! [Begins swinging his hook hand wildly at Actress Aang and Actor Sokka.] Must ... destroy!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: A stage hand is seen throws a hollow rock prop which floats down. Actor Jet falls down so that he lands underneath the prop and crawls all the way under.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Did Jet just ... die?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You know, it was really unclear.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Fade to Actress Katara with the stage background painted as the Crystal Catacombs.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I have to admit Prince Zuko, I really find you attractive!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Shot changes to show him sitting on a rock bench.] You don't have to make fun of me.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: But I mean it! [Sits down with Actor Zuko.] I've had eyes for you since the day you first captured me! [Zuko and Katara inch away from each other, slightly uncomfortable. Aang narrows his eyebrows.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Stands up.] Wait, I thought you were the Avatar's girl! [Aang nods.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Laughs.] The Avatar? [Stands up and walks toward Actor Zuko.] Why, he's like a little brother to me! [Laughs.] I certainly don't think of him in a romantic way. [Aang grows concerned.] Besides, how could he ever find out about ... this? [Actress Katara and Actor Zuko embrace and hold hands while Actress Katara pops up one leg. Aang gets up.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Whispering.] Oh, you're getting up? [As Aang leaves.] Can you get me some fire flakes? [Puts his arm around Suki, but whispers to Aang again.] Ooh, and fire gummies! [Puts his arm back around Suki, who looks slightly annoyed.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to Actor Zuko standing between Actor Azula, who has a Fire Nation flag behind her, and Actor Iroh, who has an Earth Kingdom flag behind him. A light shines on Actor Zuko.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Well, my brother, what's it going to be? Your nation, or a life of treachery?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Stops drinking from a cup.] Choose treachery, it's more fun! [Winks and gives a thumbs up sign.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actor Zuko walks toward Actor Iroh.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: No way!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Pushes Actor Iroh over and walks to Actress Azula.] I hate you, Uncle! You smell, and I hate you for all time!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The Earth Kingdom flag falls on Actor Iroh as Actress Azula and Actor Iroh exit.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [To Zuko.] You didn't really say that, did you?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I might as well have.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to Actress Mai, who pulls a sword out of her hair and gives it to a ninja, who takes a guard away. The shot changes to show the stage is set up to resemble the Earth King's throne room. Actress Ty Lee jumps to the other guard, kisses her finger and touches the guard's shoulder, causing him to fall over. Actress Azula jumps behind Actress Ty Lee and they pose. The audience applauds. Actress Aang jumps in from behind the set.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Avatar State, yip yip!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The stage light shines on Actress Aang, causing her tattoos to glow. A stagehand runs across the stage and ties a rope to Actress Aang. Actress Aang closes her eyes, and her eyelids glow too while the rope lifts her into the air. Actress Azula jumps on stage from behind the smoke.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Not if my lightning can help it!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actress Aang peeks from behind her closed eye and grabs blue streamer, shaking and screaming in feigned pain. The audience looks at the scene in shock. Actress Aang's limp body is slowly lowered to the stage. Actresses Ty Lee and Mai pose on both sides of Actress Azula, who stands in front of Actress Aang.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The Avatar is no more!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Audience applauds loudly, while Team Avatar again gives disgusted looks.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: It seems like every time there's a big battle, you guys barely make it out alive. I mean, you guys lose a lot!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You're one to talk, Suki. Didn't Azula take you captive? That's right, she did!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Looks at Sokka seriously.] Are you trying to get on my bad side?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I'm just saying ...

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Does anyone know where Aang is?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: He left to get me fire gummies, like, ten minutes ago. And I'm still waiting!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I'm gonna check outside.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to Aang standing alone on a balcony. Katara enters and walks up to him.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Are you all right?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Angered.] No, I'm not! I hate this play! [Yanks his hat off and throws it on the ground.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I know it's upsetting, but it sounds like you're overreacting.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Overreacting? If I hadn't blocked my chakra, I'd probably be in the Avatar State right now!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to the rest of Team Avatar inside the building. A kid wearing an Aang costume runs by.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Suki, what are the chances you can get me backstage? I got some jokes I want to give to the actor me.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Seriously.] I'm an elite warrior who's trained for many years in the art of stealth. [Smiling.] I think I could get you backstage! [Sokka and Suki leave.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [To Zuko, after observing everyone's reactions.] Geez, everyone's getting so upset about their characters. Even you seem more down than usual, and that's saying something!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You don't get it, it's different for you. You get a muscly version of yourself, taking down ten bad guys at once, and making sassy remarks.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Yeah, that's pretty great!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: But for me, it takes all the mistakes I've made in my life, and shoves them back in my face. My uncle, he's always been on my side, even when things were bad. He was there for me, he taught me so much, and how do I repay him? With a knife in his back. It's my greatest regret, and I may never get to redeem myself.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Sits down next to him.] You have redeemed yourself to your uncle. You don't realize it, but you already have.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: How do you know?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Because I once had a long conversation with the guy, and all he would talk about was you.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Really?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Yeah, and it was kind of annoying.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Oh, sorry.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: But it was also very sweet. All your uncle wanted was for you to find your own path, and see the light. Now you're here with us. He'd be proud. [Punches Zuko on the shoulder.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Ow! What was that for?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: That's how I show affection.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The same boy with the Aang costume comes by and sees Zuko.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Your Zuko costume's pretty good, but your scar's on the wrong side. [Runs off.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The scar's not on the wrong side! [Covers his face with his hood.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to backstage as the actors talk with each other and prepare their costumes. Sokka and Suki peek backstage and spot Actor Sokka.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: He's coming this way!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Sokka jumps out in front of Actor Sokka.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Can I help you?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actually, I think I can help you. I'm a big Sokka fan, but I don't think you're representing him quite as well as you could be.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Starts walking away.] Aww no, another fan with ideas.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Runs in front of him.] Just hear me out. [Pulls out some cards.] Here's something I think the real Sokka would say. [Clears throat.] What does the cabbage merchant use to fix his cabbages? A cabbage patch!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Suki gives herself a face palm in the background.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Chuckles.] That's actually pretty good! Let me see those! [Takes the cards from Sokka. Reads one and laughs.] "A rocky relationship" ... not bad!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Puts his arm around Actor Sokka's shoulder.] Also, don't be afraid to make up some phrases, especially before an attack. Something like ... "Flying kick-a-pow!". [The two begin to walk away.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Who are you, anyway?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I'm just a guy who likes comedy.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to the full moon. The shot changes to show Katara and Aang alone on the balcony.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Katara, did you really mean what you said in there?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: In where? What are you talking about?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: On stage, when you said I was just like a ... brother to you, and you didn't have feelings for me.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I didn't say that. An actor said that.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: But it's true, isn't it? We kissed at the Invasion, and I thought we were gonna be together. But we're not.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Aang, I don't know.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Why don't you know?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Because, we're in the middle of a war, and, we have other things to worry about. This isn't the right time.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Well, when is the right time?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Aang, I'm sorry, but right now I'm just a little confused.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Aang tries to kiss Katara.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I just said I was confused! I'm going inside. [Exits the balcony.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Ugh, I'm such an idiot! [Puts down his head on the balcony railing.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Fade to back inside the theater. Aang returns to the rest of the group and sits in the back row with Suki and Sokka.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Here's what you missed ... we went to the Fire Nation, and you got better, and Katara was the Painted Lady, and I got a sword, and I think Combustion Man died. Oh, look, the Invasion's about to start! Shhh!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to Actresses Katara and Aang standing on one of the submarines.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I just wanted to let you know, Aang, that I'll always love you. Like a brother.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Punching the air.] I wouldn't want it any other way!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The two shake hands. Actress Aang opens his miniature glider and flies up via a rope. Actress Katara waves. Aang curls up and uses his hat to cover his face. Actress Katara and Actors Toph and Sokka looking around on top of the submarine.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Hey Toph, would you say you and Aang have a "rocky relationship"? [Audience laughs.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Laughs hysterically at Suki and Aang. Lifts up Aang's hat.] I told him to say that!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I hope everyone's ready for the Invasion! Slap-a-pow! [The audience and Sokka laugh.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The curtain rises, two stagehands clad in black finish pushing the Royal Palace prop and run off stage. Actress Katara and Actors Toph and Sokka enter from the sides of the stage, while Actress Aang is dropped in from above the stage.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: We finally made it to the Royal Palace, but no one's home!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Enter Actor Zuko, stage right and Actor Sokka raises his boomerang.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actually, I'm home, and I want to join you!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Lowers his boomerang.] I guess we have no choice. Come on! [All exit stage left, except for Actress Aang, who is lifted off stage.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Stands up and stretches.] I guess that's it. The play's caught up to the present now.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Wait, the play's not over!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Sits back down.] But it is over, unless ... [Dramatically.] this is the future.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Cut to Actor Ozai on stage. The shot changes to show him standing on the Royal Palace prop. An orange lantern held by a small cable with paper flames slowly moves across the stage.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: With the energy harnessed from that comet, no one will be able to stop ... [Lifts his hands in the air.] the Fire Nation!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actress Azula enters.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Father, Zuko and the Avatar are at the Palace. They're trying to stop you!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You take care of Zuko. I shall face the Avatar myself! [Disappears behind a smokescreen.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actor Zuko jumps on stage and a rope lowers Actress Aang on stage as he holds his miniature glider prop.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Aang! You find the Fire Lord, I'll hold her off!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The cable lifts Actress Aang off stage.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You are no longer my brother. You are an enemy!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: No! I am the rightful heir to the throne!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: We'll see!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actress Azula pulls out her blue streamer and snaps it at Zuko who ducks out of the way. Actor Zuko holds two red streamers and jumps to the other side of Actress Azula. He throws his two red streamers at her and Actress Azula jumps over him. Actress Azula raises her hand not holding the blue streamer. Five red paper resembling flames shot from the ground starting at Actress Azula, the last one covering Actor Zuko so that only his silhouette can be seen.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Honor! [He drops off stage through a trapdoor with the flames.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actress Azula bows. The audience cheers. Zuko looks worried and the rest of Team Avatar looks at him. The shot changes to show the stage, which has small paper flames fluttering upstage. Actress Aang walks across the stage and looks around while Actor Ozai sits on his throne beneath the Sozin's Comet prop.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: So, you have mastered all four elements?

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Pointing her staff prop at him.] Yeah, and now you're going down!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: No! It is you who are going down! [Stands up.] You see, you are too late! The comet is already here, [Actress Aang looks in concern at the audience. Aang widens his eyes.] and I'm unstoppable!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Actor Ozai wields two red streamers. He attacks Actress Aang, who jumps out of the way. Actress Aang opens her glider, which now has two small blue banners pop out. She twirls the weapon. Actor Ozai circles his streamers while Actress Aang jumps over him with the help of a rope. She tries to get close to Actor Ozai, but Actor Ozai makes her back away using his red streamers. Actress Aang jumps over Actor Ozai, who fires a constant stream of red streamers at her. When Actress Aang lands, Actor Ozai sends a large red sheet painted as fire at her. A black clad stagehand lets go of the prop and runs away.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Becomes wrapped in the fire blanket.] Noooo ...! [Falls to the stage with her eyes closed.]

title: The Ember Island Players
text: It is over, Father. We've done it!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Yes! We have done it! The dreams of my father, [Large fire sheets rise behind him and a platform lifts him up.] and my father's father, have now been realized! [A Fire Nation flag drops.] The world ... is ... mine!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: The audience, except Team Avatar, cheers loudly and gives a standing ovation. Team Avatar is noticeably concerned by the events.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: That ... wasn't a good play.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: I'll say.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: No kidding.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Horrible.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: You said it.

title: The Ember Island Players
text: [Walking with Suki.] But the effects were decent!

title: The Ember Island Players
text: Fade to credits.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The episode opens on Ember Island outside Ozai's beach house. Aang practices firebending punches. Zuko watches him with his arms crossed.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: More ferocious! Imagine striking through your opponent's heart!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Stops firebending and turns to Zuko while growling in irritance.] I'm trying.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Now let me hear you roar like a tigerdillo! [Aang gives a light roar as fire bursts come out of his hands and mouth; cuts to a front scene of his embarrassed grin.] That sounded pathetic! I said roar!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang roars even louder, as three bursts of fire come out of his hands and mouth. Momo runs and hides behind Zuko's leg in fear. Zuko nods approvingly.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Holding up two watermelons.] Who wants a nice cool glass of watermelon juice?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Brightens up upon hearing this.] Ooh, ooh! Me, me, me! [Runs to Katara.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Zuko's hand comes into screen and grabs Aang by the shirt of his robes.] Hey! [Aang keeps trying to run off, but it is useless.] Your lesson's not over yet! Get back here! [Holds Aang up.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Lounging on stairs with Sokka.]Â Come on, Zuko. Just take a break. What's the big deal?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Lets Aang go.] Fine! [Aang happily runs off and takes a watermelon.] If you want to lounge around like a bunch of snail sloths all day, then go ahead! [Walks away.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Maybe Zuko's right. Sitting around the house has made us pretty lazy. But I know [Lays his watermelon aside and stands up slowly.] just the thing to change all that. [Takes off his robe, revealing a bathing suit.] Beach party!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Dives excitedly out of the camera's view. Camera changes scene to the ocean to show that he entered the water with a splash. Sokka surfaces with seaweed on his head and he blows water from his mouth. He grins goofily. Katara uses waterbending to create an ice surfboard and surfs on the water. Cut to Suki, watching Sokka grab some seaweed and bring it to an area. He takes two buckets and fills them with water. Aang sticks the last piece of wood on a life-sized sand sculpture of Appa, finishing the last horn.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Check out my Appa sand sculpture. [Appa roars at the sculpture.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Not bad, baldy, [Aang jumps off the sculpture.] but I've been working on my sandbending. [Cracks her fingers.] You're gonna love this.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Toph cracks her knuckles and uses sandbending to create a sand replica of the city of Ba Sing Se. Aang peers down at the replica's details.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Amazed.] Whoa! Wow, you've even made a little Earth King and Bosco.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sokka works hard on a sculpture.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Try and top that, Sokka.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Reveals a grotesque looking sculpture with seaweed for hair, a starfish for a nose, and rocks and shells for eyes and mouth.] Ta da!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Is that a blubbering blob monster?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Defensively.] No, it's Suki!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang looks at him with an animated shocked and surprised look until he and Toph both laugh hysterically.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Suki, we'll all understand if you break up with him over this.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Sitting on a beach towel.] I think it's sweet.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sokka runs and slides into screen on his knees as he grabs Suki by her shoulders and kisses her on the cheek.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: But it doesn't even look like- Aah!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: He is cut off by a fire blast that destroys the sculpture. Zuko appears and chases after Aang, blasting at him with firebending. Aang jumps over the sand replica of Ba Sing Se and Zuko destroys the replica. Aang hides behind his Appa sand sculpture.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Peeking out from behind the sculpture fearfully.] What are you doing?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Teaching you a lesson!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Zuko destroys Aang's Appa sculpture with a fire blast. Aang jumps back up to the house. Zuko goes after him, continually firing blasts at him. Katara comes back to shore and sees the destruction.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What happened?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [While rebuilding his sculpture.] Zuko's gone crazy! I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it! [Pauses a moment.] Oh, and he's attacking Aang.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Katara, Toph, and Suki run after them, the latter dragging Sokka. Zuko chases Aang onto a tree and sends another fire blast at him, forcing him to jump onto the roof of the beach house. Zuko subsequently climbs onto the roof with him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Get a grip before I blast you off this roof!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Go ahead and do it!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Zuko blasts fire at him. Aang slides down the roof and into the house. He hides behind a dresser. Zuko breaks the roof with firebending and drops into the room. He takes a fighting stance and looks around for Aang. Aang kicks the dresser at him, but Zuko destroys it. Aang runs into the hall. Zuko augments fire into the hallway. Aang clears his part of the hallway from the fire using airbending.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Enough!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang airbends Zuko out of the house. Everyone approaches Zuko.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Worried.] What's wrong with you? You could have hurt Aang!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What's wrong with me? What's wrong with all of you? How can you sit around having beach parties when Sozin's Comet is only three days away? [Everybody looks at Zuko.] Why are you all looking at me like I'm crazy?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: About Sozin's Comet ... I was actually gonna wait to fight the Fire Lord until after it came.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Shocked.] After?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I'm not ready. I need more time to master firebending.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: And frankly, your earthbending could still use some work too. [Aang grimaces.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: So, you all knew Aang was going to wait?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Honestly, if Aang tries to fight the Fire Lord now, he's going to lose. [Aang looks over to Sokka as he says this, frowns, and closes his eyes in defeat. To Aang.] No offense.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The whole point of fighting the Fire Lord before the Comet was to stop the Fire Nation from winning the War, but they pretty much won the War when they took Ba Sing Se. Things can't get any worse.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: You're wrong. [Turns away from them.] It's about to get worse than you can even imagine. [Flashes back to one day before the Day of Black Sun. Servants help Zuko get dressed on his way to a meeting. Once done, they stay behind and bow to him as he walks on. Voice-over.] The day before the eclipse, my father asked me to attend an important war meeting. It was what I dreamed about for so many years. My father had finally accepted me back.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Welcome, Prince Zuko. We waited for you. [Zuko walks up to his father. He bows to Ozai and sits down next to him.] General Shinu, your report.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Thank you, sir. [Stands up and walks up to the opposite side of Ozai across the table.] Ba Sing Se is still under our control. However, earthbender rebellions have prevented us from achieving total victory in the Earth Kingdom.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What is your recommendation?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Our army is spread too thin, but once the eclipse is over and the invasion defeated, we should transfer more domestic forces into the Earth Kingdom.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Hmm. Prince Zuko, you've been among the Earth Kingdom commoners. Do you think that adding more troops will stop these rebellions?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The people of the Earth Kingdom are proud and strong. They can endure anything, as long as they have hope.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Yes, you're right. We need to destroy their hope.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Well, that's not exactly what I-

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I think you should take their precious hope and the rest of their land and burn it all to the ground.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Yes ... [Cuts to Azula looking pleased.]Â Yes you're right, Azula. [Stands up and walks to the world map.] Sozin's Comet is almost upon us, and on that day, it will endow us with the strength and power of a hundred suns. No bender will stand a chance against us.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What are you suggesting, sir?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: When the comet last came, my grandfather, Fire Lord Sozin, used it to wipe out the Air Nomads. [Cut to Zuko.] Now, I will use its power to end the Earth Kingdom ... [Zuko looks astonished. Cut back to Ozai smiling.] permanently. [The shot changes to an aerial view of the map which Ozai walks to the center.] From our airships, we will rain fire over their lands, a fire that will destroy everything; and out of the ashes, a new world will be born, a world in which all the lands are Fire Nation and I am the supreme ruler of everything! [War generals applaud.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Voice-over.] I wanted to speak out against this horrifying plan, but I'm ashamed to say I didn't. [Fade to the present.] My whole life, I struggled to gain my father's love and acceptance, but once I had it, I realized I'd lost myself getting there. I'd forgotten who I was.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Sinks to her knees.] I can't believe this.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I always knew the Fire Lord was a bad guy, but his plan is just pure evil.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What am I gonna do?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Stands up from his rock seat and walks to Aang.] I know you're scared, and I know you're not ready to save the world, but if you don't defeat the Fire Lord before the comet comes, there won't be a world to save anymore.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Why didn't you tell me about your dad's crazy plan sooner? [Walks away.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I didn't think I had to. I assumed you were still going to fight him before the comet. No one told me you decided to wait.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Holding his head with both hands.] This is bad. [Sinks down to his knees.] This is really, really bad.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang, you don't have to do this alone.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Toph, Zuko, Sokka, and Suki stand next to Katara.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Yeah, if we all fight the Fire Lord together, we got a shot at taking him down.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: All right! Team Avatar is back! Air. [Shot of Aang.] Water. [Shot of Katara.] Earth. [Shot of Toph.] Fire. [Shot of Zuko. Sokka gives Suki a clump of leaves and holds up a large leaf.] Fan and sword! [Sokka's leaf wilts.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Fighting the Fire Lord is going to be the hardest thing we've ever done together, but I wouldn't want to do it any other way.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Everybody except Zuko laughs and walks over to Aang for a group hug.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Yeah.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: All right.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Get over here, Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: With a resigned look on his face, Zuko joins the hug. Appa flies in, knocking the entire group over. The camera cuts to the beach house courtyard in another lesson between Aang and Zuko. Under the pavilion, Katara watches with Momo at her side.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: There's one technique you need to know before facing my father - how to redirect lightning. [Aang smiles.] If you let the energy in your own body flow, the lightning will follow it. [Uses his fingers to show how the energy should flow through the body.] You turn your opponents' energy against them.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: That's like waterbending. [Joins Zuko in practicing the lightning redirection form.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Exactly. My uncle invented this technique himself by studying waterbenders.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: So, have you ever redirected lightning before?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Once, against my father.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What did it feel like?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Stops practicing the lightning redirection form.] Exhilarating ... [Flashes back to the moment for a few seconds.] but terrifying. You feel so powerful holding that much energy in your body, but you know if you make the wrong move, it's over.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Chuckles.] Well, not over over. I mean there's always Katara and a little Spirit Water action, [Turns to Katara.] am I right?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Actually, I used it all up after Azula shot you.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Disappointed.] Oh.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: You'll have to take the Fire Lord's life before he takes yours.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Yeah, I'll just do that.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The scene changes to the rocky cliffs near the beach.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Gather round, Team Avatar. [Puts a carved melon on a draped mannequin.] In order to take out the Fire Lord - or in this case, the Melon Lord - our timing has to be perfect. [Kneels down on the ground and uses a stick to draw a line heading toward the Melon Lord symbol.] First, Suki and I will draw his fire. Then, Katara and Zuko charge in with some liquidy hot offense, [Draws another line.] and while the Melon Lord is distracted, [Draws a third line.] Aang swoops in ... and bam! [Destroys the Melon Lord symbol with the line.] He delivers the final blow.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Uh ... what about me?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: For now, you're the Melon Lord's forces.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Excited.] So I get to chuck flaming rocks at all of you?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Whatever makes the training feel more realistic.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sweetness.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Fade to the Melon Lord. The camera pulls back to show Toph surrounded by boulder coated in grease with small bowls of fire set out in front of each boulder.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Mwah-ha-ha-ha!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Katara and Sokka look at Aang and Momo who look at Suki and Sokka. Sokka signals to the others to start moving. Sokka and Suki run toward the Melon Lord, but become confronted by stone Fire Nation soldiers, who suddenly rise out of the ground. Sokka cuts one stone soldier in half and Suki kicks down another one. They keep running, but a large burning rock boulder falls out of the sky, blocking the camera's view of them. Suki jumps over the boulder. Sokka finds himself fallen down just a few inches away from the flaming boulder and jumps up.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Watch it, Toph!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I am not Toph. I am Melon Lord! Mwah-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Toph lights a second boulder on fire and sends it through the air at Zuko and Katara. They run around the boulder and become surrounded by a circle of stone Fire Nation soldiers, which they quickly destroy.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Now, Aang!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang jumps, preparing to strike the Melon Lord with his glider staff. Aang looks at the Melon Lord and changes expressions from anger to uncertainty. When he lands, Aang stops his attack just before smashing the Melon Lord. He backs away.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What are you waiting for? Take him out!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Shaking his head.] I can't.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Walks up to Aang.] What's wrong with you? If this was the real deal, you'd be shot full of lightning right now.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I'm sorry, but it just didn't feel right. I didn't feel like myself.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sokka takes out his sword. Cut to Aang, wincing as he hears squishing sounds.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Off-camera.] There, that's how it's done.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: A piece of melon falls on the ground near the Melon Lord. Momo slurps some melon juice out of the piece. The camera zooms toward Aang, who is horrified at the scene. Later that night, Team Avatar shares a meal outside. Aang faces away from the rest of the group.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Holding a scroll.] I have a surprise for everyone!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I knew it! You did have a secret thing with Haru! [She smiles while Sokka, Suki, and Zuko look at her strangely.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Uh, no. [Everybody else starts eating again.] I was looking for cooking pots in the attic, and I found this! [Unravels the scroll showing a painting of a happy dark-haired baby playing at the beach.] Look at baby Zuko. Isn't he cute?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Everybody except Zuko laughs.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [To Zuko.] Oh, lighten up. I'm just teasing.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: That's not me. It's my father.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Katara rolls up the scroll.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: But he looks so sweet and innocent.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Well, that sweet little kid grew up to be a monster, and the worst father in the history of fathers.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [The camera pans to him.] But he's still a human being.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: You're going to defend him?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: No, I agree with you. [Stands up.] Fire Lord Ozai is a horrible person, and the world would probably be better off without him, but there's got to be another way.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Like what?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I don't know. [Perking up.] Maybe we can make some big pots of glue, and then I can use gluebending to stick his arms and legs together so he can't bend anymore.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Sarcastically.] Yeah, then you can show him his baby pictures, and all those happy memories will make him good again. [Suki and Sokka laugh in the background.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Excitedly.]Â Do you really think that would work?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Bluntly.] No!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Sighs. Paces back and forth.] This goes against everything I learned from the monks. I can't just go around wiping out people I don't like.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sure you can. You're the Avatar. If it's in the name of keeping balance, I'm pretty sure the universe will forgive you.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Turns back to Sokka; losing his temper.] This isn't a joke, Sokka! None of you understand the position I'm in.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang, we do understand. It's just ...

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Just what, Katara? What?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: We're trying to help!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Then, when you figure out a way for me to beat the Fire Lord without taking his life, I'd love to hear it! [Walks away.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang, don't walk away from this. [Walks toward Aang.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Puts a hand on Katara's shoulder to stop her.] Let him go. He needs time to sort it out by himself.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang meditates at the beach house porch in front of four candles, some berries, a plate of fruit, and a small cup of water. Momo flies in front of Aang.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Stroking the lemur's head.]Â Hey, Momo. I don't suppose you know what I should do. [Momo squawks.] I didn't think so.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Momo lays down to rest, and soon Aang falls asleep too after the candles have burnt out. The camera pans out from the beach house to an island. Aang wakes up to chanting and walks toward the mysterious island, barely awake with Momo following him. Aang starts swimming when he reaches the water. The scene changes to the next morning and the mysterious island is gone. Appa eats some hay while Sokka sits on his saddle.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Okay, that's everything.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: No, it's not. Where's Aang?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Team Avatar runs to the beach house.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang? Aang!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Come on, lazy bones, let's go.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Suki and Katara run to check one side of the beach house. Sokka, Zuko, and Toph run to check the other side. Zuko opens a door, but does not find Aang. Toph shrugs to show Zuko she has not found him either. Zuko checks the porch, scratching his head. He spots Aang's staff as Katara and Suki follow him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: He left his staff. [Picks up the staff.] That's so strange.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Walks onto the porch with Toph.] Aang's not in the house. Let's check the beach. [Turns his head toward the beach.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Fade to the beach.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Look, there's his footprints. [The camera pans up toward Aang's footprints, which stop at the beach.] The trail ends here.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: So, he went for a midnight swim and never came back?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Maybe he was captured.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I don't think so. [Examining the footprints.] There's no sign of a struggle.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I bet he ran away again.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Uh-uh. He left behind his glider and Appa.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Then what do you think happened to him, oh sleuthy one?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: It's pretty obvious. Aang mysteriously disappears before an important battle? He's definitely on a Spirit World journey.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: But if he was, wouldn't his body still be here?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Downcast.] Oh, yeah. Forgot about that.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Then he's got to be somewhere on Ember Island. Let's split up and look for him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Toph latches onto Zuko's arm. Zuko blushes.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I'm going with Zuko! [Sokka, Suki, and Katara stare at her.] What?! Everyone else went on a life-changing field trip with Zuko. Now it's my turn.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sokka rides on Appa, searching the shores for Aang. In Harbor City, Suki and Katara approach a group of people gathered in a circle.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Chanting.] Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! Aang! [Shocked, Katara and Suki glance at each other and simultaneously run into the circle.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [In the center of the crowd.] Avatar State! [Actor Toph lifts her up in the air.] Yip-yip! [Crowd cheers.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Suki and Katara become frustrated by the false lead. The scene changes to Toph and Zuko walking along the beach.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: And then when I was nine, I ran away again.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Uh-huh.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I know I shouldn't complain. My parents gave me everything I ever asked for, but they never gave me the one thing I really wanted, their love. You know what I mean?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Sighs and stops walking.] Look, I know you had a really rough childhood, but we should really focus on finding Aang. [Continues walking.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: This is the worst field trip ever. [Sighs and continues walking.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Later, back at the beach house, Toph, Zuko, Suki, and Katara sit on the beach house stairs. Sokka lands Appa below the stairs.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Judging by the looks on your faces, I'm guessing you guys didn't find Aang, either. [Jumps off Appa.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: No. It's like he just ... disappeared.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Hey, wait a minute. Has anyone noticed that Momo is missing, too?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Turns back to Appa.] Oh no! I knew it was only a matter of time! [Jumps down to Appa.] Appa ate Momo! [Lifts up Appa's mouth.] Momo, I'm coming for you, buddy.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sokka, Appa didn't eat Momo. He's probably with Aang.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: That's just what Appa wants you to think. [Climbs into Appa's mouth.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Get out of the bison's mouth, Sokka. We have a real problem here. Aang is nowhere to be found and the comet is only two days away.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: What should we do Zuko?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Katara, Suki, and Toph turn to stare at Zuko. In the background, Sokka slips out of Appa's mouth, covered in bison saliva.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Stands up.] I don't know. [They keep staring.] Why are you all looking at me?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Well, you are kind of the expert on tracking Aang.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Yeah, if anyone's got experience hunting the Avatar ... it's you.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Sokka tries standing up in the background, but falls back down. Zuko nods. The scene changes to Appa flying along the coast, led by Zuko.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Zuko, I don't wanna tell you how to do your job, but why are we heading towards the Earth Kingdom? There's no way Aang's there.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Just trust me.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: An aerial shot of the Royal Palace. Ozai and Azula travel in palanquins to a ship.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [To her palanquin bearers.] Come on slowpokes! Faster!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Ozai walks out of his palanquin and up the stairs. Azula runs behind him and gets on one knee to bow.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Pants.] Sorry I'm late, father. Good palanquin bearers are so hard to come by these days. So, is everything ready for our departure?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Facing the ship.] There has been a change of plans, Azula.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Worried.] What?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: I've decided to lead the fleet of airships to Ba Sing Se alone. You will remain here in the Fire Nation.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: But I thought we were going to do this together.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: My decision is final.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: You ... you can't treat me like this! [Rising.] You can't treat me like Zuko!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Azula, silence yourself.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: But it was my idea to burn everything to the ground! I deserve to be by your side!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Azula! [She bows her head.] Listen to me. I need you here to watch over the homeland. It's a very important job that I can only entrust to you.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Really?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: And for your loyalty, I've decided to declare you the new Fire Lord.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Fire Lord Azula? It does seem appropriate, but what about you?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Fire Lord Ozai is no more. Just as the world will be reborn in fire, I shall be reborn as the supreme ruler of the world. [Three Fire Sages help Ozai put on his new royal garments.] From this moment on, I will be known as ... [Raises his arms in the air.] the Phoenix King.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Servants pull up the phoenix emblem behind Ozai. Soldiers raise the phoenix flags beside the Fire Nation flags. Two more soldiers firebend into the base of the flag pole, causing fire to shoot out at the sides. The crowd bows before their new king. The camera cuts to Ozai and zooms out. Cut to an aerial view of a tavern as Team Avatar approaches. Inside the tavern, lively music plays. Zuko enters, followed by Katara, Sokka, Suki, and Toph.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: And the reason you've brought us to a seedy Earth Kingdom tavern is what now?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Pointing.] June.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The camera zooms toward June, who holds a drink. A thug tries to attack her, but she makes him fall down and uses him as a foot rest. Another thug tries to punch her, but she dodges every punch, still holding her drink.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Off-camera.] Oh yeah, that weird bounty hunter with the giant mole.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Off-camera.] Mole? Her skin is flawless.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: No, she has this giant mole creature she rides around on.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The shirshu. It's the only animal that can track Aang's scent anywhere in the world. It's the one shot we have of finding him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: The second thug continues punching June. She throws her drink into the air, throws the thug at a table, catches her drink and takes a sip.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Stepping forward, grinning broadly.] I don't know who this June lady is, but I like her.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Cut to Aang sleeping on a mysterious island, while Momo licks his cheek.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: [Waking up.] Hey, Momo. I just had the strangest dream. [Looks around surprised at his new setting.] Wait. [The camera pans toward the ocean and shows an aerial shot of the island.] Where are we?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Fade to credits.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 1: The Phoenix King
text: Aang

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: The episode opens at night to a wide shot of the Earth Kingdom tavern, Appa resting outside. Cut inside to frontal view of Team Avatar, sans Aang. June kicks a chair in the foreground and sits down and begins drinking her tea.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [To Zuko.] Hey, I remember her! [Cut to frontal view of Zuko, Sokka standing behind.] She helped you attack us!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Yup. [Walks forward.] Back in the good old days.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to wide shot as they all walk up to June.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Oh great. It's Prince Pouty. [Close-up.] Where's your creepy grandpa?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view of Katara and Zuko.] He's my uncle. And he's not here.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up.] I see you worked things out with your girlfriend.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to Zuko and Katara who become flustered and embarrassed, looking at each other as they speak, before cutting to June.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Angrily.] I'm not his girlfriend!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Speaking at the same time.] She's not my girlfriend!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] Okay, okay. Sheesh. I was only teasing. So what do you want?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view of June with Zuko and Suki behind.] I need your help finding the Avatar.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Hm. Doesn't sound too fun. [Sips her tea.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Angrily; leans closer, while clenching his fists.] Does the end of the world sound like more fun?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to side-view of Appa and Nyla growling at each other. Appa licks Nyla, and they lay down. They both stand up as the gang and June walking toward them. Cut to frontal view of the approaching group as June holds up a piece of meat.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Shaking the piece of meat.] Nyla. [She throws the meat to Nyla. Cut to frontal view of Nyla, who catches it in his mouth and starts chewing it before swallowing it; June walks up to him and starts petting him.] Who's my little, hmm, Snuffly-Wuffly? [Nyla sticks his toxins-coated tongue out and she dodges it and forces his mouth closed.] Whoa! Careful there. [To Team Avatar.] Okay. So who's got something with the Avatar's scent on it?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to Katara standing on Appa's back.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Pulls out Aang's glider from Appa's saddle.] I have Aang's staff.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to Nyla as June approaches and holds the staff out in front of Nyla. He sniffs it. Cut to wide-view of the group as Nyla begins to walk around in circles, trying to sniff the scent out somewhere else. Cut to overhead view. Cut to closer view of the group as Nyla returns to June and continues sniffing. Cut to frontal view as Nyla lies back down and covers his nose.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] Well, what does that mean?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view. Petting Nyla.] Means your friend's gone.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] We know he's gone. That's why we're trying to find him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up as June stands up.] No, I mean he's gone gone. [Turns to face everyone else.] He doesn't exist.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to the others as the look on with worry and confusion. The camera cuts to a mysterious island. Cut inside the forestry as Momo is chasing a squirrel creature in a tree. Camera pans across the branch as Momo chases the squirrel and Aang is seen walking around.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Where are we, Momo? [Cut to view of the sky through the trees as dragonflies fly past. The camera pans down as Aang speaks.] Maybe I'm in the Spirit World? [Cut to frontal view of Aang stepping under a branch.] But wait. You can see me. [Momo approaches on the branch. Cut to a close-up of Momo.] We could both be in the Spirit World. [Cut back to Aang. He uses airbending and the camera pans across as he moves.] Nope. My bending works. [Momo lands on him. Points to the hilltop. Cut to path up a hill. Camera pans up as Aang talks.] Maybe if we climb to the top of the island, we can figure out where we are.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to close-up of Sokka.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [To June.] What do you mean Aang doesn't exist? [Side-view of the group.] Do you mean he's ... you know, dead?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view as she pets Nyla.] Nope. We could find him if he were dead. Wow, it's a real head-scratcher. See ya. [Cut to a wide-view of the group as she starts climbing on top of Nyla.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Sarcastically.] Helpful. Real helpful.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [To June.] Wait. I have another idea. [Frontal view.] There's only one other person in this world who can help us face the Fire Lord. I'll be right back with a smell sample.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to close-up of a sandal that Zuko holds up. Camera zooms out quickly to show the members of Team Avatar are holding their noses in disgust, except for Zuko and Toph. Zuko looks embarrassed.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: You saved your uncle's sweaty sandal? Ugh! [Pinches nose even tighter.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Smiles.] I think it's kind of sweet.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to June as Nyla jumps forward. Cut to side-view of Zuko and Nyla as the latter sniffs the sandal.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view. Determined.] Let's do this. [Cut to wide-view as she and Nyla run off.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Hey! Wait up!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: They all quickly get on Appa. Cut to behind Appa as his tail hits the ground he takes off in the same direction. Cut to side-view of Nyla running up a hill as Appa flies behind. Fade to a shot behind Nyla as he jumps over a cliff edge. Camera pans to the right slightly as Appa follows closely behind. Fade to frontal view of Nyla running along with Appa close behind before Nyla jumps forward toward the camera. Cut to wide-view of Appa and Nyla approaching the destroyed Outer Wall of Ba Sing Se. Cut to frontal view of the wall as Nyla jumps in front of the camera and the camera pans up to show Appa above. Cut to close-up aerial view. The camera pans out as the group stops near the rubble. Appa lands and Nyla starts digging at the wreckage.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: We're going to Ba Sing Se?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Cut to side-view of the group as Nyla continues scratching the wall.] Your uncle's somewhere beyond the wall. [Nyla stops digging and walks away.] Nyla's getting twitchy so he can't be too far. [Close-up.] Good luck.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to side-view of Zuko as Nyla and June leave and he turns to watch. As they disappear over the hill he turns away to the others.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: It's been a long day. [Aerial view. Camera zooms out.] Let's camp and start our search again at dawn.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut back to the island. The camera pans down from trees to Aang and Momo as they approach a strange, flat rock-formation. Cut to a frontal view of Aang looking at the rock-formation. Cut to an aerial view of the entire clearing as Aang steps on to it.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: It's a hexagon. [Cut to Aang's feet as Momo jumps off his shoulder. Bends down to place a hand on the ground.] It doesn't seem like normal rock. [Stands back up. Cut to a side-view as he attempts earthbending, but nothing happens.] It's not made of earth. [Sits down.] This is so strange. [Frontal view of Aang with Momo in the foreground, his back to the camera.] I wish I had some help right now. I wish I had Roku. [Suddenly realizes something.] I do have Roku! [Takes a deep breath and starts meditating. Fade to close-up of Aang. Cut to side-view as Momo runs off and the spirit of Avatar Roku appears before Aang.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: You're right, Aang. [Close-up.] All the past Avatars, all their experience and wisdom, is available to you [Cut to close-up of Aang.] if you look deep inside yourself.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Looking around.] So where am I, Roku? What is this place?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Side-view.] I ... don't know, Aang. [Close-up of Aang.] But I see you are lost in more ways than one right now.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: I am. I need to figure out what to do once I face the Fire Lord.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: The camera cuts to Appa. The camera pans to the right to show Zuko, Katara, Suki, and Sokka asleep on Appa's legs and tail. Cut to Toph, who is sleeping in an earth tent.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Surprised.] Huh? [She suddenly senses something and wakes up. Cut to outside her rock tent as it begins to low.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: The camera zooms out as the group is surrounded by a wall of fire. Cut to an aerial view of the area showing Team Avatar is trapped. Cut behind the group as the camera pans across to left. The group turn and look up to see Piandao, Jeong Jeong, Pakku, and Bumi. The camera zooms in on Piandao before panning to left to focus on Jeong Jeong, before panning again to Pakku, and finally to Bumi.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Well, look who's here! [Starts laughing and snorting.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut to Team Avatar looking confused, except for Katara and Sokka, who are both excited.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Everyone expects me to take the Fire Lord's life, [Side-view.] but I just don't know if I can do that.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] In my life, I tried to be disciplined and show restraint, but it backfired when Fire Lord Sozin took advantage of my restraint and mercy. [Fade to a flashback of Sozin, close-up shot. Sozin moves forward and the camera cuts to a side-view of him attempting to attack Roku from behind. The camera pans left to show the flames engulf Roku. Cut to a shot inside the flames as they dissipate to reveal Roku gone. Fade to a close-up shot of Sozin from behind looking at his army. Fade to a panning shot of air temples on fire. Overlaid shot of close-up Sozin.] If I had been more decisive and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin and stopped the war before it started. [Cut back to side-view of Aang and Roku.] I offer you this wisdom, Aang: You must be decisive. [Cut behind Roku as he vanishes. Cut close-up to Aang, disappointed.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut back to Outer Walls of Ba Sing Se. Wide shot of the entire group now joined by the masters.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Confused.] What's going on? [Cut to closer view from behind the masters.] We're surrounded by old people.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Not just any old people. [Walks up to Pakku. Side-view of the masters.] These are great masters and friends of ours. [Camera pans and zooms in on Katara and Pakku as she bows to Pakku.] Pakku.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Bows back.] It is respectful to bow to an old master, [Frontal view. Extends his arms out.] but how about a hug for your new grandfather?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view. Surprised and overjoyed, as is Sokka behind her.] That's so exciting! [Frontal view of Pakku as she hugs Pakku.] You and Gran-Gran must be so happy to have found each other again!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: I made her a new betrothal necklace and everything.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Runs up and hugs Pakku. Camera zooms in on Pakku.] Welcome to the family, Gramp-Gramp!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Gently pushes Sokka away; slightly annoyed.] You can still just call me Pakku.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] How about Grand-Pakku?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up. Not amused.] No. [Side-view of Zuko and Pakku as Sokka walks away behind Katara sadly. Camera zooms out to show Jeong Jeong.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Zuko walks up to Jeong Jeong.] And this was Aang's first firebending teacher.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up. Bows.] Jeong Jeong.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Side-view. Bows to Piandao.] Master Piandao.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Bows back.] Hello, Sokka.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Cut to over-head view from behind the masters.] So wait. How do you all know each other?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up side-view.] All old people know each other. Don't you know that? [Laughs and snorts.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: We're all part of the same ancient secret society. A group that transcends the divisions of the four nations.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] The Order of the White Lotus.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view of Piandao and Jeong Jeong. Bumi slides in front of the camera.] That's the one. [Slides off camera.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: The White Lotus has always been about philosophy and beauty and truth. [Aerial view.] But about a month ago, a call went out that we were needed for something important.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Cut close-up behind Zuko with Pakku and Katara in the background. To Zuko.] It came from a Grand Lotus: your uncle, [Close-up of Zuko.] Iroh of the Fire Nation. [Zuko smiles.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Camera zooms out to show Toph behind Zuko.] Well, that's who we're looking for.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Frontal view.] Then we'll take you to him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Appears behind Piandao and Jeong Jeong and pushes them out of the way.] Wait! Someone's missing from your group. [Walks up to the camera.] Someone very important. [Walks right up to the camera.] Where's Momo?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Side-view. Leaning backward almost all the way, as Bumi is right in his face.] He's gone. [Pauses.] And so is Aang.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Camera zooms out.] Oh well. [Pats Sokka on the chest, which causes him to almost fall back.] So long as they have each other, I'm sure we have nothing to worry about. Let's go! [Slams in to the ground. Cut to underneath Bumi as he launches himself away using earthbending while laughing and snorting.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut back on the island. Cut to Momo behind a branch before flying off. Cut to frontal view of Aang who is meditating as Momo arrives next to him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Avatar Kyoshi. I need your wisdom.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Momo runs off. Fade to close-up of Aang. Side-view as the spirit of Avatar Kyoshi appears before him and the camera pans right to where she sits.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: In my day, [Flashback to frontal view of Chin the Conqueror. Cut to close-up of Avatar Kyoshi.] Chin the Conqueror threatened to throw the world out of balance. [Kyoshi enters the Avatar State briefly and begins to earthbend. Cut to wide shot as a dust cloud appears as she separates the land.] I stopped him. [Cut to side-view of Kyoshi as she uses airbending to push the land apart.] And the world entered a great era of peace. [Cut to aerial view of the land separating.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Voice-over; Side-view of Chin as he falls to his death.] You didn't really kill Chin. [Camera cuts back to close-up view looking up at Aang.] Technically, he fell to his own doom because he was too stubborn to get out of the way.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up side-view.] Personally, I don't really see the difference, but I assure you, I would have done whatever it took to stop Chin. [Frontal view.] I offer you this wisdom, Aang: Only justice will bring peace. [Vanishes.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up. Disappointed. Side-view as he leans back.] I knew I shouldn't have asked Kyoshi.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut back to the rest of the group as the camera pans right to show the group walking with the White Lotus members to their campsite.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: So, Bumi ... [Cut closer, side-view. Camera follows them as they walk.] how did you end up escaping your imprisonment in Omashu?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Escape? I didn't escape. Everybody else escaped. [Close-up.] There I was back in Omashu, [Flashback of Omashu while under control of the Fire Nation during the Day of Black Sun.] waiting for just the right moment. [Cut to close-up of Bumi suspended in a metal box.] I didn't know what or when, but I knew I'd know it when I knew it. [Camera pans round as he looks up to see the solar eclipse. Speaking in flashback.] An eclipse. That'll do it.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Cut close-up as he begins twitching his face. Cut to buildings beginning to crumble and break. Cut back to Bumi in the cage as the camera zooms in with pieces of earth heading to the cage. Frontal view of the cage as Bumi uses the broken pieces of the buildings to break himself free. Cut to the ground below as Bumi drops down and firebenders quickly show up to confront him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: What do you think you're doing? [Zooms in on the firebender.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: The firebenders attempt to blast Bumi, but are powerless due to the eclipse. They look at Bumi in horror. Cut to frontal view of Bumi, who smiles evilly.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Taking back my city! You've got no firepower. And it's payback time!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Bumi launches himself forward. Cut behind Bumi as he launches himself off the platform. Frontal view of Bumi as he lands. He uses earthbending and lifts a large piece of earth up. Cut to side-view of a building being separated by the pillar of earth. Cut back to Bumi, and back to the building as he moves the building with the use of the pillar. Cut to frontal view of firebenders running away. Camera pans up to reveal entire buildings beginning to move. Cut to Bumi running to left and stops to earthbend again sending more buildings flying. Cut to wide-view of Omashu. Cut to side-view of the entrance to Omashu as Fire Nation soldiers flee.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Amazed.] Wow! You took back your whole city all by yourself!

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Side-view of entire group.] So what about you guys? Did you do anything interesting on the day of the eclipse?

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Side-view of Sokka and Zuko, who look at each other.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Nonchalantly.] Nah.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Nonchalantly.] No, not really.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: The camera cuts to close-up of Aang, who is becoming irritated.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: I need to look deep inside myself.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: Close-up frontal view as Aang starts meditating. Side-view of Aang as the spirit of Avatar Kuruk, a male Avatar from the Northern Water Tribe, appears before him.

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
text: [Close-up.] I am Avatar Kuruk. [Cut to flashback to a close-up view of a younger Avatar Kuruk. The camera zooms out to show him surfing.] When I was young, I was always a go-with-the-flow kind of Avatar. [The camera pans round to follow his movements on the wave before holding steady as he surfs away.] People seemed to work out their own problems, and there was peace and good times in the world. [Cut to shot of the sun and the camera pans down to Kuruk with Ummi and they kiss.] But then, [Fade to a side-view of Koh in the Spirit World. Koh moves in front of the camera to reveal the face of Ummi.] I lost the woman I loved to Koh, the Face Stealer. [Fade back to close-up side-view of present-day Kuruk.] It was my fault. If I had been more attentive and more active, [Close-up of Aang.] I could've saved her. Aang, [Close-up of Kuruk.] you must actively shape your own destiny and the destiny of the world. [Vanishes. Frontal view of Aang, even more disappointed as he places his head in his hands.]

title: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters
